item.title: Demi Lovato cancels Birmingham gig after pulling out of London show as she battles swollen vocal chords
item.description: The 25-year-old singer tweeted that she was cancelling Tuesday's show at Birmingham Arena, an announcement she made hours after pulling out of her gig at London's O2 Arena on Sunday.
item.content:encoded:
Demi Lovato has been forced to cancel a second date on the European leg of her Tell Me You Love Me World Tour. 

The 25-year-old singer tweeted that she was cancelling Tuesday's show at Birmingham Arena, an announcement she made hours after pulling out of her gig at London's O2 Arena on Sunday.

The Heart Attack hitmaker has been battling swollen vocal chords, and amid fears she could overexert herself and jeopardise her entire tour she has been advised to cancel certain dates. 

She tweeted her fans on Monday: 'I’m literally gutted that I have to postpone this next show in Birmingham.. I’ve never had to miss shows due to my vocal chords or being sick in my LIFE'.

Demi continued: 'This seriously sucks.. haven’t left my hotel room in 2 days now. Sick, bored and bummed out.

'Most exciting part of my day? Getting a camera shoved up my nose and down my throat to look at my vocal chords'.

The Camp Rock star thanked her fans for their support and well wishes, noting the ones who had arrived for her London gig on Sunday, despite it not going ahead. 

She wrote: 'My fans are seriously the best... I can’t believe how much love and support I’ve received today.. the video of my fans singing skyscraper outside of the venue made me cry'. 

Demi revealed she was battling with swollen vocal chords over the weekend after she was forced to cancel her London tour date at the 02 Arena hours before she was meant to perform.   

In an emotional text post and video posted to her social media, Demi - who had performed the day before at Capital FM's Summertime ball - detailed how if she tried to carry on, there was a good chance she would have to cancel the rest of her world tour.

Explaining about her current condition, Demi wrote: 'I write this through tears of frustration and sadness that I have to postpone my concert in London at the 02 tonight due to being very, very sick and with swollen vocal chords that were examined by an ENT (dr.)

'If I go on tonight and injure my vocal chords any more I could potentially have to cancel the rest of my tour.' 

The Sorry Not Sorry hitmaker apologised to those who had made huge efforts to see her in concert, and explained how heartbroken she was to cancel the performance. 

 Demi continued: 'I’m so so so sorry to disappoint any of my fans in London that have travelled hours to be here by plane or car, and to all the fans that got these tickets for their birthday, holiday or any other special occasion. 

'It just breaks my heart to let you down. Just know I feel your frustration and I wouldn’t do this unless I absolutely had to.' 

Signing off, Demi reassured fans she would be rescheduling the show for 25th June and thanked fans for their understanding. 

Clearly very upset by the decision, Demi also shared a video with her followers explaining her need to rest.

Looking tired and incredibly emotional, the singer clutched onto her throat as she strained to speak with a hoarse voice.

Demi reiterated: 'I can’t do the show tonight because I have no voice, and I always wanted to play the 02 so I’m really upset.

'I’m really sad to let my fans down because I know that some of you traveled hours and some of you flew to the show but I really can’t go on and I’m really sorry.

'We are rescheduling and I’m just very very sick right now and hopefully, I’ll be able to perform at the 02 again, I'm very sorry.' 

Just a day before, the former Disney star was all smiles as she arrived for Capital's Summertime Ball at Wembley Stadium, London and performed in front of a 80,000-strong crowd.   

Demi is slated to perform at AFAS Live in Amsterdam on June 18.
item.dc:abstract: Demi Lovato has been forced to cancel a second date on the European leg of her Tell Me You Love Me World Tour. The 25-year-old singer tweeted that she was cancelling Tuesday's show at Birmingham Arena, an announcement she made hours after pulling out of her gig at London's O2 Arena on Sunday. The Heart Attack hitmaker has been battling swollen vocal chords, and amid fears she could overexert herself and jeopardise her entire tour she has been advised to cancel certain dates.

item.title: Love Island PICTURE EXCLUSIVE: Megan Barton Hanson poses NUDE in racy photoshoot... as she comes clean about working as a stripper
item.description: The legal secretary turned glamour model leaves nothing to the imagination in a shoot by celebrity photographer Gavin Glave for Sixty6 Magazine.
item.content:encoded:
She's got the single boys in the villa eating out of the palm of her hand.

And it certainly isn't hard to see why Love Island newcomer Megan Barton Hanson is proving so popular, with the blonde beauty showing off her jaw-dropping figure in a seductive photoshoot.

The legal secretary turned glamour model leaves nothing to the imagination in a shoot by celebrity photographer Gavin Glave for Sixty6 Magazine.

The racy images, taken before entering the villa, show the gorgeous star wearing nothing but a pair of leopard print heels.

Posing provocatively on an antique chair, Megan quaffs a glass of champagne while putting her peachy derriere on display.

Just about covering her modesty, the stunner gazes seductively into the camera lens.

Megan has set her sights on self-confessed 'spiritual' hippie Eyal since entering the villa, after toying briefly with the idea of dating Niall and unlucky-in-love Dr Alex.

Viewers were furious with Eyal on Monday night's episode after he interrupted Alex and Megan's intimate chat at a crucial moment - just after the blonde had opened up to him about why she turned to stripping to make money.

Feeling comfortable with the softly-spoken hunk, Megan discussed her past as an exotic dancer, and how she gave up her 9-5 job as a legal PA.

But their intimate moment didn't last long as Eyal quickly dived in and left Alex feeling deflated by the situation.

'I could really do with a break' the A&E doctor admitted.

Eyal wasn't going to let the forlorn doc persuade him to leave Megan alone, and confessed in the Beach hut: 'All is fair in love and war, there'll be some c*** blocking. If Megan is into him then I'll hold my hands up, but I'm going to try, I'm a tryer.'

Feeling completely blindsided, Alex divulged: 'I'm surprised that Eyal approached in that situation, it wasn't as if we'd been there for 20 minutes, half an hour, I'd literally been with her for a few moments and he just came on over. That didn't sit so well with me.'

item.title: Coronation Street star Bill Roache reveals he felt 'married' to co-star Anne Kirkbride before her tragic death
item.description: Coronation Street legend Bill Roache has revealed he felt 'married' to co-star Anne Kirkbride before her unexpected death in 2015, along with recalling the last moment he saw her before she passed away.
item.content:encoded:
Coronation Street legend Bill Roache has revealed he felt 'married' to co-star Anne Kirkbride before her unexpected death in 2015.

Speaking in his autobiography Life and Soul, the 86-year-old actor reflected on his close relationship with Anne off-screen, along with the last time he saw her before she passed away from cancer.

Bill's character Ken Barlow and Anne's Deirdre were considered the golden couple of soap in a relationship spanning four decades, with their 1981 wedding even receiving more viewers then that of Prince Charles and Diana's just two days later.

Speaking in his memoir Bill recalled the heart-breaking moment he saw a 'frail' Anne just hours before her death from breast cancer.

He said: 'I had been at her bedside that night, Monday, January 19, 2015, along with others close to her. When I’d arrived at the hospital, I’d been told, ''She’s lost a lot of weight. Be prepared.''

'Annie was frail, but she looked so beautiful – the weight loss had revealed her exquisite bone structure. All I could see was her beauty.'

Following Anne's death, Bill left viewers in tears with a heartbreaking tribute to his on-screen wife at the National Television Awards. 

And with such a close friendship away from the cameras, Bill admitted that despite having their own spouses off-screen, they still felt like a married couple.

He added: 'With Annie, it felt like being married in a parallel life – Ken and Deirdre – even though we’d go our separate ways in the evenings. The vicar who married us on screen, Frank Topping, was a minister in real life.'

Ken and Deirdre's relationship on Corrie was nothing short of rocky, tying the knot in 1981 before splitting in 1992 when Ken confessed to having an affair with colleague Wendy Crozier. 

Many fans will also remember Deirdre's famous affair with Mike Baldwin, which led to a furious confrontation and Ken violently pushing Deirdre against the wall, with the harrowing scenes going down in soap history.

Luckily the couple rekindled their romance and married again in 2005, and stayed together until Deirdre was revealed to have passed away on-screen six months after Anne's real-life death.

Speaking in his autobiography Life and Soul, the 86-year-old actor reflected on his close relationship with Anne off-screen, along with the last time he saw her before she passed away from cancer. Bill's character Ken Barlow and Anne's Deirdre were considered the golden couple of soap in a relationship spanning four decades, with their 1981 wedding even receiving more viewers then that of Prince Charles and Diana's just two days later.

item.title: Hailey Baldwin and Justin Bieber continue to fuel romantic reconciliation rumours during cinema date in Miami
item.description: Hailey Baldwin and Justin Bieber, who dated briefly in 2015, were spotted enjoying each other's company during a long day in Miami, Florida.
item.content:encoded:
They have set tongues wagging over a possible romantic reconciliation in recent days. 

And Hailey Baldwin and Justin Bieber, who dated briefly in 2015, were spotted enjoying each other's company once again during a long day in Miami, Florida. 

The stunning model, 21, who flashed her toned abs in a crop top, joined the Canadian hitmaker, 24, for a cinema date before embarking on a casual stroll around Miami's South Beach neighbourhood. 

Hailey showed off her flair for fashion for the outing as she highlighted her toned stomach in a clingy white crop top. 

The catwalk queen, who is the daughter of actor Stephen Baldwin, teamed the sexy look with an oversized denim jacket. 

Vous branded sweatpants added to the super cool vibe, as did a pair of comfortable trainers. 

Hailey, who was recently linked to Shawn Mendes, opted for a simple slick of make-up and showed off her features further by pulling her locks into a tight bun. 

Justin also made for a trend-setting display, ensuring to clash prints and colours for a bold look. 

The star made a statement in an 'Enjoy The Great Outdoors' top, which he teamed with black baggy bottoms. 

A Vous white baseball cap tamed his overgrown blonde locks in place as he continued to spend quality time with Hailey.

This outing comes just weeks after Hailey, 21, revealed to The Sunday Times that she and Justin dealt with some post split 'weirdness.'

'We didn't speak for quite some time and there was a lot of weirdness that went on,' she said. 'But we've moved past that.'

Baldwin continued: 'I'd never been through [a high-profile relationship] like that. But it brought both of us to the realization that we just work much better as friends.

'He's somebody I really cherish. Now it's a very mature situation. It's good.'

The former couple were hot and heavy in 2015 before calling it quits in early 2016 as Justin embarked on his Purpose world tour.

Despite their breakup, Hailey's dad, Stephen Baldwin, still thinks highly of the Biebs.

'I love Justin,' Stephen told The Hollywood Fix on the streets of Los Angeles. 'I'm praying for him everyday. He's wonderful.'

item.title: Kelly Rowland splashes out $3.5 million on lavish five bedroom LA home complete with swimming pool and spa
item.description: She's rumoured to be considering quitting The Voice Australia. And Kelly has made another big life choice recently, splashing out $3.45 million on a lavish new home in Sherman Oaks.
item.content:encoded:
She's rumoured to be considering quitting The Voice Australia. 

And Kelly Rowland has made another big life choice recently, splashing out $3.45 million on a lavish new home in the posh Sherman Oaks suburb of Los Angeles.

The 37-year-old former Destiny's Child star, who shares son Titan, three with her husband Tim Witherspoon has dropped a small fortune on the sprawling property, that boasts five bedrooms and seven bathrooms, within the modern exterior of the house.

The singing sensations was no doubt drawn in by the stunning features boasted by the 4285-square-foot home, which rests behind gates for privacy, and is full of modern appliances as it is newly built.    

The open-plan home features an elegant dining room and a living room with a custom fireplace, whilst the brand-new kitchen has professional, top-of-the-line appliances, an oversized quartz stone island, custom tile, and a breakfast nook.

Upstairs in the sprawling manor, the master bedroom boasts a large en-suite bathroom complete with a deep soaking tub, large shower, and his and hers sinks.

And there isn't a shortage of entertaining spaces for sociable Kelly, as the outside of the home hosts a large stone patio, perfect for having guests over in the Los Angeles sunshine, which also overlooks a sparkling swimming pool and even a spa.

Kelly's change of scenery comes amid reports that she is also considering a change of career after becoming frustrated with her acts' lack of success and has been left feeling 'robbed' after her team favourites were voted out on The Voice Australia.

New Idea magazine reported on Monday that the former Destiny's Child superstar is said to have threatened to 'walk out,' upset her talent isn't doing better, with an insider telling the publication that the grievance began after her contestant Fasika Ayallew failed to win last year, which reportedly left her reeling.

'She feels robbed after her contestant Fasika came third last year,' the publication reported, and nearly 12 months on, the source reportedly added that it's still a sore point for the usually bubbly Commander singer.

'She is still moaning about it now and says she can't understand what happened,' the source is reported to have told the women's magazine.

Kelly resides in Australia with her husband and son during her time on The Voice, but for the Atlanta resident, her permanent space is in Los Angeles. However, a move to Down Under at some point in the future may not have been ruled out, with the singer recently gushing about living in Bondi Beach. 

Speaking with Confidential, Kelly said she fell in love with Bondi because of how respectful the residents are to celebrities like her, explaining: 'I really love it here. People are really respectful, particularly when I am out with me son.

'One time another mother was talking to my son and then she looked up to me and realised who I was and she quickly said 'I am such a fan', then we just got back to talking like mums.'  

Speaking about her family recently, the Stole hitmaker gushed over her three-year-old child, admitting he has changed her life.  

Speaking to Herald Sun about the impact of welcoming Titan with husband Tim Witherspoon in 2014, Kelly revealed that motherhood forced her to see herself in a different light.

She also described her son as 'the greatest thing to happen to her', explaining: 'Having Titan has made me see myself in a different way. He made me see myself stronger. I want to [create music] he would be proud of. He really is the greatest thing that ever happened to me.'

item.title: Married At First Sight star Tracey Jewel looks decidedly glum as she heads out solo and makeup-free in Brisbane ahead of her book launch
item.description: The Married At First Sight star has had plenty to smile about of late, launching her third book and enjoying a new romance. But, Tracey Jewel looked glum in Brisbane on Tuesday.
item.content:encoded:
The former Married At First Sight star has had plenty to smile about of late - celebrating the launch of her third book and beginning a new romance.

But Tracey Jewel was seen looking glum on Tuesday, as she cut a casual figure in a cosy, activewear ensemble.

The makeup-free single mother, 35, was far from joyous as she took a solo stroll around Brisbane ahead of her book launch in the city.

Tracey appeared in her own head as she pounded the pavement ahead of her public appearance, choosing to place her headphones in as she walked.

The reality TV star wore a grey knit over tight leggings, as she placed her brunette locks up into a low ponytail.

While touring the nation for her This Goddess Means Business book launch events, her former co-stars have attended to show their support.

Luckily for Tracey, there was no chance of running into her Brisbane-based MAFS love rival Davina Rankin, as she recently jetted to America to 'explore other opportunities'.

Meanwhile, Tracey recently announced she was back with ex-partner Patrick Kedemos, the man she dated before going on MAFS.

The announcement came three-weeks after she confirmed her split with co-star Sean Thomsen, citing his penchant for 'partying'.

Patrick and Tracey first began dating back in 2016 but reportedly split in late June 2017, before Tracey's appearance on Married At First Sight.

However, despite Tracey gushing over her reunion with Patrick in recent weeks, former 'husband' Dean Wells was busted ogling at Tracey during her book launch in Melbourne. 

The former couple were clearly happy to see each other at the event, which was attended by several members of the MAFS alum.

Dean also cheekily suggested in a photo caption from the night: 'Got a couple of sneaky text messages from this one earlier today though.'

Whether Dean was simply joking, or referring to their infamous leaked text exchange is unclear - if so, specifying the messages were sent 'earlier today' was odd. 

Several fans were certain the comment was a joke, made in an attempt to 'stir the pot' now that Tracey is happily back with her former flame Patrick

item.title: Paris Hilton hints she will televise her lavish wedding to fiancé Chris Zylka in reality TV comeback
item.description: The Simple Life star has hinted she will televise her wedding to her fiancé Chris Zylka, 33, after being inundated with offers from networks.
item.content:encoded:
Her beau popped the question with an eye-watering $2million engagement ring while on the slopes of Colarado. 

And Paris Hilton has hinted she will televise her wedding to her fiancé Chris Zylka, 33, after being inundated with offers from networks.

The hotel heiress, 37, who starred in The Simple Life with Nicole Richie 10 years ago, could make her return to reality TV and let fans into her big day.

She told E! News: 'We've been getting a lot of calls and a lot of offers from different networks, pitching that show so maybe', before the reality star coyly said 'yes' when asked if she would ever take up one of their offers.

The socialite then gushed about her husband-to-be, as she said: 'It's the best feeling in the world just to find the one person who is your best friend, I trust him so much. 

'He's so supportive and loving and like an angel, I feel like he saved me and I can't imagine my life with anyone else.' 

The star also revealed the couple's next step in life was to have babies, so her children could play with her sister Nicky's two daughters. 

Of her television offers, she previously told DailyMailTV: 'We'll see what happens. Every day, we're getting different calls, because everyone is obviously really excited about the wedding, so I've been looking at a lot of different offers of networks and producers who want to do a show on Chris and I and the wedding and everything.'

Paris and Zylka first met eight years ago at an Oscars party at Chateau Marmont but didn't start dating until 2016, finally making it official on social media in February 2017.  

Family insiders told DailyMail they will wed in the same church that her parents were married in nearly 40 years ago.

While Paris has remained quiet over the details of her upcoming wedding, the source revealed the couple, will say 'I Do' at the historic Roman Catholic 'Church of the Good Shepherd' in Beverly Hills, on November 11.

Paris previously told DailyMailTV that she had picked her 'Disney inspired', custom made wedding gown, calling it 'iconic' and adding: 'I can't wait for everyone to see!'

She also revealed that she will wear a different dress for the reception by Moschino creative director and designer Jeremy Scott. 

Paris has insisted that having Zylka by her side ​'every night​' for globe-trotting work events has ​drastically changed her life​ in the limelight. 

She admitted her fame has been a living nightmare at times​, often​ being surrounded by strangers in foreign cities.

'I started filming this movie almost two years ago, so it was before Chris – before and during,' she said. 'But before I was with him, it is lonely when you're alone traveling the world over 250 days a year.​

'I am never in one country at once. I don't really know anyone where I go, so that is lonely.'
item.dc:abstract: Her beau popped the question with an eye-watering $2million engagement ring while on the slopes of Colarado. And Paris Hilton has hinted she will televise her wedding to her fiancé Chris Zylka, 33, after being inundated with offers from networks. The hotel heiress, 37, who starred in The Simple Life with Nicole Richie 10 years ago, could make her return to reality TV by letting fans into her big day.

item.title: Alessandra Ambrosio highlights her svelte model frame in matching sports bra and skintight leggings as she works up a sweat in LA
item.description: The 37-year-old supermodel flaunted her enviably gym-honed body as she slipped into a vibrant green, grey and yellow zig zag print sports bra.
item.content:encoded:
She hung up her Victoria's Secret angel wings last year following 17 years with the lingerie brand.

Despite closing that chapter of her life, Alessandra Ambrosio continued to flaunt her incredible figure in her midriff-baring workout gear as she left a yoga class in Los Angeles on Monday.   

The 37-year-old supermodel flaunted her enviably gym-honed body as she slipped into a vibrant green, grey and yellow zig zag print sports bra.

The mother-of-two's sporty crop top accentuated her slender arms and drew attention to her taut abs as she left the yoga studio in her flip flops.

Continuing her workout look, she donned a pair of matching high-waisted leggings which made the most of her slender legs and pert posterior. 

While she accessorised the sporty ensemble with a pair of Ray-ban shades and a tan-coloured shoulder bag. 

Working her brunette tresses back into a messy bun, Alessandra slung a yoga mat under her arm and carried a coconut water away from the gym.  

Alessandra, who retired from Victoria's Secret after 17 years, previously discussed her intensive fitness regime. 

She told W Magazine back in October: 'I train the whole year, and right before I start to train a bit more than the rest of the year, I love to workout, and I love to do Tracy Anderson.

'I get very focused on being fit and feeling good for the runway. I try to go three times a week to Tracy Anderson, then I will for a hike one day of the week or do yoga.' 

It's been a tough few months for the mode who recently she announced her split from former fiance Jamie Mazur, 37, who she shares two children with.

'They [have] been trying to keep their split on the down low, but Alessandra has been out and about ready to mingle and hasn't been taking Jamie to anything,' a source told Us Weekly at in March when the separation announcement was made.

Since their split, the duo have been amicable and have been seen together at such occasions as family gatherings.

Neither Jamie nor Alessandra, who got engaged in 2008, publicly confirmed the breakup reports when they surfaced this March, though equally they did not dismiss them.

In 2013, the model was forced to deny any reports of a split, simply saying they were 'all good'.
item.dc:abstract: She hung up her Victoria's Secret angel wings last year following 17 years with the lingerie brand. Despite closing that chapter of her life, Alessandra Ambrosio continued to flaunt her incredible figure in her midriff-baring workout gear as she left a yoga class in Los Angeles on Monday.

item.title: Love Island EXCLUSIVE: Adam Collard's birth certificate proves his TRUE age... as viewers are convinced he's lying about being 22
item.description: MailOnline can put an end to the conspiracy theories since the Geordie lad's birth certificate proves he is telling the truth about his age.
item.content:encoded:
Adam Collard will be called out by love interest Rosie on Tuesday night's episode of Love Island.

And fans are convinced the reason for the explosive showdown teased at the end of Monday's installment could be the Welsh beauty finding out Adam's real age, with speculation rife online that he's far older than his 22 years.

However, MailOnline can put an end to the conspiracy theories since the Geordie lad's birth certificate proves he IS telling the truth about his age.

The 6 foot 5hunk was born on October 26 1995, meaning he is four months shy of his 23rd birthday.

The personal trainer, who hails from Newcastle upon Tyne, has surprised viewers and his fellow islanders alike with his confidence since entering the villa - making him seem older than his 22 years. 

It was revealed on Monday that air hostess Laura Anderson is definitely 29 after viewers also accused her of 'lying' about her age.

Fans have been taking to Twitter in their droves since last night - with countless people joking that Adam's scandalous secret will be that he's been lying to Rosie about his age.

One social media user posted, 'I have a feeling tomorrow's show is about Adam's real age. Not 22 #loveisland', while another joked, 'Reckon Adam’s revealed he’s not 22 he’s actually 43 and that’s why Rosie’s kicking off #loveisland'.

A third wrote: 'It's finally going to come out tomorrow that Adam is actually 36, married with 2 kids & not 22 years old....#IveSussedYou @LoveIsland #LoveIsland;

Other viewers are baffled about how many of the contestants look older than they really are this year.

'Sent a pic of Adam to my friend who doesn't watch #LoveIsland and asked how old he thought Adam was and he said 37. Was shocked when I said he was 22', one Twitter user shared.

Another wrote: 'Am I the only one who is more bothered by the fact that Adam is 22 & looks 30 than Laura being whatever age she is? #LoveIsland #justsaying'.   

Monday night's episode of Love Island teased a massive falling-out between Adam and Rosie. 

In tumultuous scenes set to air on Tuesday, the Welsh beauty will confront the hunk about a huge secret he's been keeping - and fans are struggling to wait to find out the truth. 

In the promo clip, Rosie is comforted by villa pal Georgia Steel, who appears shocked about what the brunette beauty reveals, gasping, 'Are you serious?'

Narrator Iain Stirling hints further at the bust-up, as he asks: 'Is someone hiding a secret?'

Rosie walks up to Adam in front of all the islanders and confronts him face-to-face.

The tearful solicitor declares: 'Do you want to tell me something?'

Rosie continues: 'Something that happened today that you should have perhaps had the balls to tell me before.'

Adam then sheepishly asks: 'What you on about?' while the rest of the islanders look on in confusion. 

Doing her best to keep a level head, Rosie responds: 'I dunno, what am I on about? Everyone else in the group knows about it, you may as well share it. The group's waiting.'

Clearly devastated by the secret Adam's been concealing, Rosie breaks down in front of the other girls, sobbing,'I don't get why I'm not enough for someone...'

Viewers at home have been scratching their heads trying to figure out what the secret could possibly be.

'What a shocker. Adam snakes Rosie according to tomorrow's episode' one unsurprised fan wrote on Twitter.  'Can we just find out what Adam has done now pls' commented another.  

Many fans have been guessing that Rosie had caught him texting villa newbie Megan, who entered just the day before.

'I have a feeling that on the sly Adam text Megan and Rosie caught him' quizzed one fan, while another concurred writing: 'I think Adam has text Megan at 4am asking if "she's up" whilst in bed with Rosie'.

Adam earned his bad boy status after dumping Kendall Rae-Knight and quickly latching onto Rosie, who he was spotted kissing just moments after leaving Kendall's side.
item.dc:abstract: Adam Collard will be called out by love interest Rosie on Tuesday night's episode of Love Island. And fans are convinced the reason for the explosive showdown teased at the end of Monday's installment could be the Welsh beauty finding out Adam's real age, with speculation rife online that he's far older than his 22 years. However, MailOnline can put an end to the conspiracy theories since the Geordie lad's birth certificate proves he IS telling the truth about his age.
item.dc:creator: Kate Thomas
item.mi:shortTitle: Love Island: Adam Collard's birth certificate proves he IS 22

item.title: Kirsty Gallacher, 42, was 'flirty and tactile' with X Factor winner Myles Stephenson, 26, at Soccer Aid afterparty
item.description: Kirsty Gallacher, 42, reportedly got cosy with X-Factor's Myles Stephenson, 26, at the Soccer Aid after party on Monday night.
item.content:encoded:
She reportedly enjoyed a night of passion with her pal Jack Whitehall, 29, two month ago.

But Kirsty Gallacher, 42, has appeared to have caught the eye of another young new suitor, as The Sun have reported that she got cosy with X-Factor's Myles Stephenson, 26, at the Soccer Aid after party on Monday night. 

The TV presenter was said to be flirting with the hunk, who won the last series of the talent competition as part of boy band RAK-SU, with further sources reporting there was 'obvious chemistry between them.' 

Kirsty and Myles both found themselves at the after-party at Cloud 23 at Manchester’s Hilton Hotel, with it being reported: 'They clearly couldn’t stay away from each other and were really tactile and flirty.

'There was obvious chemistry between them as Kirsty could stop giggling at everything Myles was telling her,' it was noted. 

Speaking of their night in more detail, it was continued: 'They’re both newly single and they didn’t seem to care which of the other party-goers saw how close they were getting.'

MailOnline has contacted representatives for Kirsty for further comment. 

The flirty sighting comes after Kirsty recently made headlines after she reportedly enjoyed a steamy 'romp' with her 29-year-old friend Jack Whitehall, at a star-studded bash two month ago. 

The Sun reported that the chemistry between Kirsty and Jack reached boiling point at a star-studded event, which reportedly resulted in a 'romp'.

The publication claimed that the single duo started at Groucho Club in London’s West End and then things got steamy when they took some of their friends to a party at a flat.

A source told the newspaper: 'The chemistry between them was brewing all night. They had the hots for each other. When they got there, they ramped things up and weren’t trying to hide it.

'They were kissing and being very touchy-feely before heading off for some privacy. Everybody there knew what was going on.' 

Last autumn, Kirsty reemerged on the London social circuit, weeks after she was banned from driving for two years, following a shocking drink-driving conviction.

The mother-of-two had consumed so much booze on a night out that she was three times the legal limit at 11am the next day when she went to meet her two sons in Berkshire.        

Former Strictly Come Dancing contestant Kirsty had been drinking until 3am before she drove her £40,000 BMW X4 eight hours later and was pulled over for driving erratically.

Moving on from the ban, the host revealed that booze is all but a distant memory from her dietary menu, as she now enjoys consumes 'tons of water' and very little else.

In an interview with Lisa Snowdon's website You Glow Girl, the stunning TV personality revealed her top tips for maintaining her beauty, saying: 'One of them is to drink tonnes of water! I don’t really drink anything else.'

She added: 'I put lemon and ginger in my water quite a lot. It’s tastes great and is good for detoxing and cleansing, and also alkalises your system.'

The TV presenter was said to be flirting with the hunk, who won the last series of the talent competition as part of boy band RAK-SU, with further sources reporting there was 'obvious chemistry between them.'

item.title: Kate Mara is a doting stepmom as she carries husband Jamie Bell's son on casual lunch outing in LA
item.description: Mara wore a white cap bearing the logo of the New York Giants, the NFL franchise founded by her paternal great-grandfather Timothy Mara and co-owned by her uncle, John Mara.
item.content:encoded:
Kate Mara held her four-year-old stepson as she headed for lunch with husband Jamie Bell in Los Angeles on Monday.

The 35-year-old Chappaquiddick actress wore a denim blue top over a white top with black horizontal stripes and black sweatpants with black sneakers.

Mara, who's also appeared in Brokeback Mountain, House of Cards and 24, rounded out her ensemble with sunglasses and a white cap bearing the logo of the New York Giants, the NFL franchise founded by her paternal great-grandfather Timothy Mara and co-owned by her uncle, John Mara.

Scroll below for video 

Bell, 32, who fathered his son with ex-wife, Westworld actress Evan Rachel Wood, wore a navy blue Real Madrid soccer jersey (reading 'Fly Emirates' across the chest) with black sweatpants and black trainers, with sunglasses.

The Billy Elliot star's son, whose name has been kept private by his parents, wore a green camouflage shirt with navy blue shorts as Kate held him while they walked down the street.

Mara and Bell first met filming Fantastic Four, the 2015 Marvel film in which Kate played Sue Storm and Bell played Ben Grimm/The Thing. They began dating in the fall of 2015, and tied the knot in 2017.

Speaking to SHAPE in April, Kate opened up about her bliss after tying the knot with Bell last year.

'I love knowing that I have a partner for life,' she told the magazine. 'I feel very proud to call Jamie my husband and to have made that commitment to him.'

The Pose actress opened up about the rest of her family, which includes actress Rooney Mara of The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo fame, and mother Kathleen McNulty Rooney, who's involved in real estate.

'My sister, Rooney, lives in L.A., and we see each other as much as we possibly can,' she said. 'My mom is in New York, but she’s always flying out to visit us.

'We’re a very close-knit group. And now that Jamie is legally part of my family, it’s such an incredible thing.'

The actress said she's 'very protective' of her marriage to Bell, and the pair have made a special pact to preserve their union amid their busy careers.

'All the traveling we both have to do for work can make it hard, but we have a rule that we will never go longer than two weeks without seeing each other,' she said. 'Even if we have to spend all day traveling to have just 24 hours together, it’s worth it in order to have a strong relationship.'
item.dc:abstract: Kate Mara held her four-year-old stepson as she headed for lunch with husband Jamie Bell in Los Angeles on Monday. Mara, who's also appeared in Brokeback Mountain, House of Cards and 24, rounded out her ensemble with sunglasses and a white cap bearing the logo of the New York Giants, the NFL franchise founded by her paternal great-grandfather Timothy Mara and co-owned by her uncle, John Mara.

item.title: 'Very excited to meet this mystery woman': Bachelor In Paradise's Michael Turnbull reveals a fan spent a whopping $6,000 to go on a date with him
item.description: Michael Turnbull has been unsuccessful in his pursuit for love on reality television.
item.content:encoded:
Michael Turnbull has been unsuccessful in his pursuit for love on reality television.  

But perhaps a switch up in his method may ensue romance, given a fan has forked out a whopping six thousand dollars for a single date with the former Bachelor In Paradise star.

Raising funds for Cure Cancer Australia, the star shared his mass winnings on his Instagram story on Tuesday.

 

'Such a generous winner of my VIP charity date bidding $6,000 for a date with me,' he wrote along with a picture of plate and a bunch of red roses. 

Eager to discover if his charitable date will lend a helping hand to love, Michael posted a following snap that featured the silhouette of a woman.

Adding a 'question mark' and red rose sticker, he wrote: 'Excited to meet this very generous mystery woman.'

He then offered fans a shirtless selfie, thanking his bidders for their support in his 'VIP date' charity event.

'Thank you for all your support and to everyone who bid,' he wrote.

'Let's hope this gets us all one step closer to helping those battling with cancer win and fight and stay with loved ones.' 

On Monday, Michael clarified rumours that he was dating Sam Frost - three years after she brutally dumped him during the finale of The Bachelorette.

Attempting to diffuse romance rumours, the former pro-soccer player wrote: 'For everyone asking... We are not dating but Sam is an incredible woman'.

He sweetly added: 'I'm so proud of what she has achieved.'
item.dc:abstract: Michael Turnbull has been unsuccessful in his pursuit for love on reality television. But perhaps a switch up in his method may ensue romance, given a fan has forked out a whopping six thousand dollars for a single date with the former Bachelor In Paradise star. Raising funds for Cure Cancer Australia, the star shared his mass winnings on his Instagram story on Tuesday.

item.title: Hilary Duff reveals wardrobe person on Younger was first to learn of pregnancy
item.description: The 30-year-old actress revealed during a chat show appearance on Monday just how close the bond is between a star and her stylist.
item.content:encoded:
Hilary Duff revealed during a chat show appearance on Monday just how close the bond is between a star and her stylist.

The 30-year-old actress while on The Late Late Show said the first person she told about her second pregnancy was her wardrobe person on Younger.

She explained that there are 'jeans with no stretch created by the devil himself' that she no longer could wear while pregnant. 

'Gotta cool it with the jeans with no stretch,' Hilary recalled telling her wardrobe person on the TV Land show.

The Lizzie McGuire star took to social media last week to announce that she was expecting a baby daughter with her boyfriend Matthew Koma. 

Hilary also has a six-year-old son Luca with ex-husband Mike Comrie, 37.

The former couple married in August 2010 in Santa Barbara, California and announced their separation in January 2014.

Hilary filed for divorce in February 2015 citing irreconcilable differences and their divorce was finalized in February 2016.

The Texas native was promoting the fifth season of Younger that premiered last week on TV Land.

She portrays beautiful and sophisticated book editor Kelsey Peters who is friends with series protagonist Liza Miller, played by Sutton Foster, 43. 

Hilary said that more people during season five start to figure out Liza's secret that she's age 47 posing as 27 at Empirical Press.

Younger premiered on March 31, 2015 on TV Land.

The comedy-drama series also stars Debi Mazar, Miriam Shor, Nico Tortorella and Peter Hermann.

item.title: TOWIE's Amber Turner flaunts her ample cleavage and tiny waist in an array of bikinis in Santorini
item.description: The TOWIE star, 24, couldn't resist showing off her incredible figure in an array of skimpy swimwear as she soaked up the sunshine in Santorini over the last few days.
item.content:encoded:
She's been enjoying a blissful getaway with her gal pals including ex MIC star Nicola Hughes.

And Amber Turner couldn't resist showing off her incredible figure in an array of skimpy swimwear as she soaked up the sunshine in Santorini over the last few days.

The TOWIE star, 24, put her ample assets and impossibly tiny waist on display in a red crochet bikini, striking a pose on a sun lounger.

Amber also slipped into a hot pink two-piece with heart motif on the bust, putting on a playful display with fellow reality star Nicola.

Not one to shy away from a photo opportunity, Amber was captured posing on an inflatable unicorn in the same beachwear.

She then modelled a gold embellished bikini, ensuring her curves took centre stage as she posed in the shallow end of a swimming pool.

The stunner captioned one seductive snap, 'Living my best life', and another, 'Life is better in a cute bikini'.  

Amber has been documenting her trip extensively on social media and as soon as she arrived in her hotel room, she threw on a very sexy neon orange bikini.

Shimmying in the racy two-piece, Amber pulled down the straps of her top, showing off as much of her golden tan as possible. 

The beauty was away for five days and showed fans on Instagram stories that she has had a pedicure ahead of going away, calling it 'Santorini prep.'

She then shared a quick peek of her suitcase before heading to the sunny destination, where there was an array of rolled up sundresses neatly packed.

Amber then showed off her new eyelash extensions, putting an angel filter on. 

Clearly having some time on her hands at the airport, she shared some kind comments from fans, writing that they were 'too cute.' 

She then showed off her designer travel accessories, including a Louis Vuitton holdall and Balenciaga trainers. 

Arriving at the holiday hotspot which is boasting a 27 degree temperature, Amber also shared a snap of her holiday nails, while with a diamanté embellishment. 

She gave fans a sneak peek of her villa, complete with glorious outdoor swimming pool, before slipping into her orange bikini. 

The trip away comes a week after Dan Edgar finally asked Amber to be his girlfriend on the TOWIE finale.   

After more than a year of casually dating and much heartache, the Lothario, 28, was finally ready to commit to the reality star.

He asked the question she had been waiting to hear at Tommy Mallet's birthday party.

He told her: 'We've gone around in circles long enough and I've been thinking a lot lately and I need to stop thinking about what everyone is saying. 

'I think personally we should things a go.'

item.title: All aboard! Newlyweds Anna Heinrich and Tim Robards turn their honeymoon cruise into a party boat with a group of friends
item.description: A friend on Tuesday posted a video to Instagram showing Anna and a large group of friends partying up a storm on a giant yacht in Turkey.
item.content:encoded:
Anna Heinrich and Tim Robards' honeymoon shows no sign of slowing down. 

On Tuesday, a friend of the couple posted a video to Instagram showing Anna and a large group of friends partying up a storm on a giant yacht in Turkey.

The raucous footage shows the bride and her pals dancing and singing, drinks in hand, on what is a week-long celebratory cruise as part of the couple's honeymoon. 

The video was captioned: 'Love these crazy ladies. The best.'

A group of shirtless blokes can been seen playing it cool in the background as the ladies blast the coastal idyll with bursts of laughter and song.

Anna and Tim are clearly intent on hosting a honeymoon to remember.

The practice of inviting friends on honeymoon has become an increasingly popular trend among celebrities.

After their stunning wedding in Puglia over the weekend, Anna and Tim jetted to Turkey, hiring a giant yacht to sail around the Aegean or Mediterranean sea with their closest mates.

The happy couple were surrounded by their nearest and dearest last Thursday when they exchanged vows in a romantic ceremony at the Masseria Potenti in Manduria.

According to an insider, the sunset ceremony took place at 6:30pm and 'Anna looked beautiful and totally at ease' as she walked towards Tim.

The newlyweds met in 2013 during the first season of The Bachelor Australia.

Anna beat out 24 other single ladies, including new Bachelorette Ali Oetjen, to capture Tim's heart.

The couple moved in together in mid-2014, and are currently based in the Sydney beachside suburb of Bondi.

Tim had proposed with a diamond ring rumoured to cost $173,000 while the couple were on holiday in Kimberley, WA in May 2017.

Anna told NW that she and Tim plan to have children 'within a year or two'.

item.title: Showing Troy what he's missing? Married At First Sight star Ashley Irvin flaunts her sizzling figure in a skimpy pink bikini during idyllic Bali holiday
item.description: Giving her fans a shameless dose of holiday envy, she captioned the snap: 'Another day in paradise #bali #bikinis #buckethat.'
item.content:encoded:
She was left furious when her Married At First Sight ex-husband Troy Delmege sparked up a romance with their co-star Carly Bowyer.

But Ashley Irvin certainly showed the 35-year-old goofball what he was missing on Tuesday, as she flaunted her incredible bikini body in a sizzling Instagram post.

Giving her fans a shameless dose of holiday envy, she captioned the snap: 'Another day in paradise #bali #bikinis #buckethat.'

Scroll down for video  

The 29-year-old flight attendant certainly turned heads in her baby pink swimwear, which perfectly offset her glowing tan.

Adding a Nineties edge to the look, she accessorised with a straw bucket hat with a pink band in a similar hue to her bikini.

The reality star styled her golden tresses in a sleek middle-parting and framed her features with a sweep of mascara and eyeliner. 

Troy and Ashley broke up on Married At First Sight after agreeing that they weren't a 'perfect match' for each other.

Troy shocked fans when he struck up a new romance with his MAFS co-star Carly Bowyer, 32, with the pair now living together in Melbourne.  

Carly recently confirmed the couple are still going strong amid rumours that they had split - and even confirmed to fans that Troy is 'no longer a virgin'.  

The reality star wrote: 'Sure, we can drive each other crazy and we do fight but we’re totally in love (and Troy is no longer a virgin).'

The subject of Troy's virginity has come under much scrutiny since he made his television debut in January. The star's sister, Tanya Delmege, told NW magazine her brother had never been sexually intimate.

Tanya claimed her brother is 'very churchy' and added: 'As far as I know, he’s on the V-plates.' 

She commented that he might be waiting until he is really married, as opposed to the commitment ceremony featured on MAFS. 

However, the kooky IT manager hit back, claiming he hadn't spoken to his estranged sister since he was 20-years-old - at which time, he may have still been a virgin.

item.title: Winona Ryder and David Harbour film Stranger Things 3 in Atlanta with new castmember Cary Elwes
item.description: Ryder, 46, was dressed in character in a purple striped shirt over a red top paired with blue jeans along with a floppy hat.
item.content:encoded:
She's enjoyed an incredible career resurgence thanks to her role as Joyce Byers on Netflix hit series Stranger Things.

And on Monday, Winona Ryder was spotted filming scenes for the upcoming third season in Atlanta, Georgia.

The actress, 46, was dressed in character in a purple striped shirt over a red top paired with blue jeans along with a floppy hat.  

Ryder's character of Joyce is pivotal to the show and she's reportedly being paid $350,000 an episode for the next season of the streaming series.

She's the single mother of sons Will and Jonathan Byers in the small Indiana town of Hawkins which has been terrorized by a monster from the Upside Down.

She went to school with the local police chief Jim Hopper, played by David Harbour, who helped to rescue Will following his mysterious disappearance in season 1.

In the second season, the pair, along with Will's friends and brother, worked to free him from the grip of the Mind Slayer. 

Harbour was also seen shooting scenes Monday.

He wore a pink and green patterned shirt and blue jeans for the show that's set in the 1980s.

The bearded actor, 43, was also made-up to appear to have a bloody gash on his forehead just above his left eye.

Also spotted was new cast member Cary Elwes who has been cast as the slick mayor of Hawkins.

Joining Elwes in the third season will be Jake Busey who will play a reporter for the local newspaper The Hawkins Post.

Meanwhile, the back story to the show will be explored in a new book set to be released in spring 2019 through Penguin Random House in partnerhsip with Netflix.

The Stranger Things prequel novel, written by author Gwenda Bond, will tell the story of Eleven’s mother and the MKUltra program, Deadline.com reported June 8.

Eleven, played by Millie Bobby Brown, is a girl who was raised in the top secret lab in Hawkins and possesses kinetic powers. 

Before the novel is published, fans of the series will have the chance to purchase two other titles set for release this fall: a behind-the-scenes companion book and a hardcover gift book for young readers offering offer 'advice, wisdom, and warnings from the Stranger Things world,'
item.dc:abstract: She's enjoyed an incredible career resurgence thanks to her role as Joyce Byers on Netflix hit series Stranger Things. item.title: Amy Smart exhibits her stellar style in chic patterned shirt dress at Yellowstone premiere
item.description: The actress looked darling at the premiere of the Paramount Network series Yellowstone in LA Monday. The Rat Race actress, 42, charmed in a patterned shirt dress that skimmed her thighs for a flirty effect.
item.content:encoded:
Amy Smart looked darling at the premiere of the Paramount Network series Yellowstone in LA Monday.

The Rat Race actress, 42, charmed in a patterned shirt dress that skimmed her thighs for a flirty effect.

The blonde added black heels on bottom and accessorized with triangular gold earrings.

She brushed her blonde curls to one side, while offering a bright smile at onlookers. 

Also at the event was series star Kevin Costner, who looked handsome in a sand colored suit.

Besides him creator Taylor Sheridan went for a classic black tie ensemble.

Star Kelly Reilly wowed in a low floral look with leggy slit. 

She added gleaming earrings and red heels for an extra touch.

Nicole Sheridan took the plunge in a daring black bodycon dress which she played up with red lipstick and a glittering pink clutch.

Annabeth Gish embraced her natural instincts in a leopard print dress. 

Katherine McNamara sizzled in a drapey red look with thigh-high slit.

Michaela Conlin wore a delicate chiffon top with sky colored slacks and see-through heels. 

Jessica Parker Kennedy paired cute shorts with heels and a floral silk shirt.

Yellowstone follows "the Dutton family, led by John Dutton, who controls the largest contiguous ranch in the United States, under constant attack by those it borders — land developers, an Indian reservation, and America’s first National Park.  

'It is the best and worst of America seen through the eyes of a family that represents both.'

Yellowstone premieres June 20 on Paramount Network.

The Rat Race actress, 42, charmed in a patterned shirt dress that skimmed her thighs for a flirty effect. The blonde added black heels and accessorized with triangular gold earrings.

item.mi:shortTitle: Amy Smart dons chic patterned shirt dress at Yellowstone premiere

item.title: From posing topless, flaunting her derriere in tiny G-string bikinis to reclining on luxury cars in PVC leather: See Love Island's sizzling new intruder Edyn 'Mac' Mackney's raunchiest snaps
item.description: From posing topless, flaunting her derriere in tiny G-string bikinis to reclining on luxury cars in PVC leather, the 22-year-old leaves little to the imagination.
item.content:encoded:
She's Love Island's sizzling new intruder who has established herself as a threat to the other female contestants after making her debut on Sunday night.

And it's not hard to see why, with Edyn 'Mac' Mackney's plastering a number of raunchy snaps across her social media. 

From posing topless, flaunting her derriere in tiny G-string bikinis to reclining on luxury cars in PVC leather, the 22-year-old leaves little to the imagination. 

In one saucy snap, the first-time reality star is seen stretching out on a luxury white car and posing in a racy PVC leather ensemble.

Propped up on the front of the automobile, the confident blonde wears a pair of mesh biker shorts and busty black bra.

In another racy picture, Edyn is seen flaunting her pert derriere in a skimpy G-string as she poses topless poolside.

Proving her flirtatious nature, the beauty is captured in yet another image wearing a fiery red two-piece set and offering fans a sneak peek of her assets.

Popping her peachy bottom out, Edyn is seen smiling while offering her 40.5 thousand (and growing) Instagram followers with a cheeky smile.

While the star's social media platforms ooze confidence, Eydn previously revealed her battle with an eating disorder in her teenage years.

In a YouTube video dated back to 2015, Edyn described how she became anorexic after a modelling agent urged her to lose weight off her already-tiny size 6 frame.

In the clip, Edyn revealed she would eat one carrot for dinner during her anorexia battle after being told she had to 'slim down her hips and legs'.

'The advice I was getting from the modelling industry led me to eating disorders,' Edyn said at the time. 

However, despite describing modelling as a 'corrupt industry', Edyn claimed she didn't have any 'regrets' about her past.

'I'm healthy and happy with my life now. We're our own harshest critics - we're all so hard on ourselves but I'm in a better head space than I was. I feel great.'

item.title: Kevin Hart and wife Eniko Parrish head to Kanye West's office as he gives away new Yeezy shoes
item.description: Hart, 38, sported a goatee as he wore a white T-shirt with ripped sweatpants and blue trainers with a black ball-cap worn backwards.
item.content:encoded:
Kevin Hart and wife Eniko Parrish on Monday were snapped visiting Kanye West's office in Calabasas, California, as the rapper was giving away pairs of his new Yeezy 500 Boost shoes to three people in the reality TV empire.

Hart, 38, sported a goatee as he wore a white T-shirt with ripped sweatpants and blue trainers with a black ball-cap worn backwards.

Enikko, 22, wore an orange tank top with black leggings and sandals, walking arm-in-arm with her husband on the sunny day. 

Scroll below for video 

She had her dark locks pulled back and wore sunglasses and earrings on the daytime trek to the luxe Southern California suburb that plays home-base to the Kardashians.

The Philadelphia-born funnyman and his lovely spouse were not the first celebs to stop by, as Kanye received visits from Kourtney Kardashian, Kendall Jenner and Kris Jenner's boyfriend Corey Gamble, all of them leaving with new shoes in hand.

The comic actor has had a busy few days, as he performed two shows in Canada and one in Idaho while on his Irresponsible tour.

On Thursday, he played at the Hollywood Bowl in what he called 'one of the biggest nights of [his] stand up comedy career' in an Instagram post.

And despite his enduring success in comedy and cinema - in which he's involved in two tent-pole franchises with Jumani and Ride Along - the ambitious entertainer made clear he's working harder than ever when it comes to his career.

'[I'm] nowhere near done damn it,' he wrote on Instagram, adding that he still has 'tons of goals that still need to be checked off of [his] list!!!'

Hart's schedule for June remains jam-packed, with multiple shows in Seattle, Portland, Denver and Salt Lake City, as well as a slated appearance at the BET Awards June 24.

item.title: Chrissy Teigen and John Legend enjoy a kid-free date night as they lead star arrivals at LA Dodgers Gala
item.description: She welcomed her second child with husband John Legend, 39, just last month. And new mom Chrissy Teigen enjoyed a date night with her man at the Fourth Annual Los
item.content:encoded:
She welcomed her second child, son, Miles Theodore, with husband John Legend, 39, just last month.

And new mom Chrissy Teigen enjoyed a date night with her man at the Fourth Annual Los Angeles Dodgers Foundation Blue Diamond Gala on Monday. 

The 32-year-old appeared to still have that pregnancy glow as she stunned in a floral shirt-dress.

Scroll down for video  

Chrissy turned heads with her stylish ensemble.

She drew attention to her incredible post-baby waist with a matching tie that cinched in her mid-section. 

The stunner added denim jeans underneath her flattering duster. 

Chrissy complimented her look with strappy nude heels. 

The model accessorized her look with a mustard colored head piece and large gold earrings. 

Her makeup showcased her incredibly radiant and luminous complexion while featuring a rosy pink cheeks and a nude lip. 

The Lip Sync Battle star's hair was left out and styled into lose waves.

John also looked incredibly dapper for the night out which saw him perform for the attendees.  

Matching his wife, he sported a blue tux on top of a open collared shirt.

He dressed down his look with fresh white sneakers. 

Long stand Dancing With The Stars judge Carrie Ann Inaba was also at the Gala. 

The beauty stunned in a chiffon black high-low dress. 

Her brunette locks were styled back into lose waves and she protected herself from the sun with tinted ombre sunglasses. 

Young And Hungry star Emily Osment and her actor brother Haley Joel were also in attendance. 

Emily kept to the blue theme with denim skinny jeans and a leather jacket of a sky shade. 

The 26-year-old added to her 5'3" height with nude platform heels.   

She accessorised her look with a multi-colored clutch and had her blonde locks out. 

Haley opted for a black suit jacket and dark wash denim jeans. 

He added shades to his look and donned a scruffy beard. 

Veteran diver and LGBT activist Greg Louganis also attended the annual event alongside actress Dawnn Lewis. 

Greg wore a patterned blue suit jacket and black trousers. 

Dawnn opted for a vibrant yellow top with spaghetti straps and form-fitting grey trousers. 

At one point, the Dream Girls star was seen hanging out with Chrissy Teigen. 

Talk show hosts George Lopez and Aesenio Hall were also spotted at the charity event. 

Actress Anne Winters was a breath of fresh air on the carpet too. 

The 13 Reasons Why actress dazzled in a ruffled green and blue gown. 

She accentuated her lean and toned legs with strappy nude heels. 

Her hair was left out and makeup luminous.  

And the Dodgers and other sports stars were out in full swing on Monday night too. 

Kenley Jansen was all smiles as he posed alongside heavily expectant wife Gianni. 

The pitcher sported a blue suit jacket with light wash denim jeans. 

Gianni looked like an angel in her complimentary crisp white off-the-shoulder ensemble. 

Former American Football quarterback and reality star Rodney Pete graced the carpet alongside wife Holly Robinson. 

He dressed in navy while Holly opted for a flattering royal blue gown.  

Although having to sit out from the rest of the season following his elbow surgery, Corey Seager, 24, still attended the Gala with girlfriend Madisyn Van Ham.  

Corey opted for a short sleeved shirt while Madisyn dressed like a princess in a floor-length satin frock. 

Dodgers manager Dave Roberts looked dapper in his checked suit jacket as he posed alongside wife Tricia.  

Tricia was seen in a floral blue dress.  

Clayton Kershaw who earned $36 million in 2016 put his cash to good use, making heads turn with wife Ellen on the carpet. 

He paired his blue suit jacket with black trousers and brown shoes.  

Ellen flashed her toned legs in a white dress and styled her hair back into an updo.   

Other attendees included: Matt Kemp and Sara De Boer, Justin and Kourtney Turner, Terry and Rebecca Crews, Normar Garciaparra and Mia Hamm, and Yasiel Puig and girlfriend Andrea de la Torre.

item.title: The Bachelorette: Becca Kufrin receives shock as suitor sent to intensive care after falling off bed
item.description: A suitor on The Bachelorette was raced to intensive care on a stretcher on Monday's episode as his fellow contestants feared he might die.
item.content:encoded:
A suitor on The Bachelorette was raced to intensive care on a stretcher on Monday's episode as his fellow contestants feared he might die.   

The latest episode of Becca Kufrin's season included chilling footage of David Ravitz, 25, covered in blood as he was carried from the house by paramedics in the middle of the night, his arms crossed and his head enclosed and tied to the stretcher.

'Please do not die,' fellow contestant Lincoln Adim, 26, said, calling it 'one of the scariest things I've ever seen.'

'There was blood everywhere. None of us know if he was going to make it.'

Football pro Colton Underwood, 26, meanwhile, recalled waking to screaming and seeing the venture capitalist 'laying there on the ground straight as a f***ing board,' adding: 'As they were putting him on the stretcher I was like, ''This dude looked like he just got attacked by a bear.''

At first, no one seemed sure what happened — with some suspicion pointing at house bad boy Jordan Kimball, 25, after they had a war of words earlier that night.

Male model Jordan even warned earlier: 'I would be worried if I was him. Karma is karma. People that go against me just end up hurt sometimes.'

However, when host Chris Harrison told Becca about the 'incident' he revealed a far more embarrassing reason — with David having fallen out of the top of a bunk bed.

'I'm so used to sleeping on a king size bed, roll over and boom! Hit the floor,' David explained in a call to Becca, who joked: 'You'll just look like a badass the next time I see you — we'll make up a good story.'

Jordan was later shown putting a barrier on David's bunk, then joking of his nemesis — who wore a chicken costume to first meet Becca — that 'chickens can't fly and I think we learned that last night. I feel bad for the guy but karma is karma.'

Their feud started with David already annoyed that Jordan previously interrupted his alone time with Becca by turning up just in his underwear, and he tried to get revenge by telling her how Jordan was bragging about having 4,000 matches on Tinder and a 100 percent success rate on the dating app.

When Becca teased him about it, Jordan turned to David and snapped: 'That's a bitch move. You're a bitch. You are the skeleton of a man, David.'

Some of the other guys initially tried to ignore their escalating war of words, but finally cracked into laughter after Jordan bragged: 'You think I'm a joke — I'm a Wilhelmina model.

'It's something some people consider the top. Attached to me is my professionality. It's my face. It's in everything I do — it's the way I walk and it's the way I talk, OK? So if you want to try to wreck my image you'll never succeed. You wanna know why? Because my image is me,' Jordan stated.

He had also warned in comments to camera: 'I talk to God all the time and God knows, if Jordan's got a problem with someone — 86 them. You put out that much bad energy something's bound to happen.'

David's fall was not the only unexpected injury of the episode, with professional football player Clay Harbor, 30, breaking his wrist on a group date — ironically playing football.

'I got hurt playing football on The Bachelorette - it's pretty funny,' he admitted, also having been taken to ER and arriving with his arm in a sling for the end of the evening part of the group date.

The athlete, who impressed with a late surge of winning plays, won the group date rose, with Becca saying he 'makes me feel like such a princess.'

But he was dealt devastating news the next day when further tests showed that he needed an operation soon if he was to continue his career on the football field, forcing him into the heartbreaking decision to quit the show.

He told Becca: 'My job is playing football and it really helps me take care of some people who are really important to me, my family. It's something I have to get fixed. Trust me I want to stay and see where this goes because I could see us having something great.

'But I know what I have to do. I regret it already, trust me,' Clay told her.

He insisted to camera: 'This decision is the hardest decision of my life. I'm building a real connection with Becca and she's the type of girl I've been looking for my whole life. I definitely think what I had with Becca was special.

'There was a chance I could have been the guy standing at the end with her, and that's something I'm always gonna wonder about. I 100 percent think I could have fallen in love with Becca. But being a man is making hard choices and tough decisions.'

Becca, who gushed about 'finding a spark with Clay' before his announcement, took the news hard.

She was in tears as he walked away, praising his 'big, big heart,' and ended the episode sobbing: 'I honestly feel like I have nothing left. I'm just done.'

Becca earlier took six guys on her other group date of the episode, but it was clearly all about just one, Colton Underwood, who had admitted previously dating her friend from her season on The Bachelor, Tia Booth.

Becca surprised him by bringing Tia as one of five of her friends from her season to be pampered by the guys clearly just to test how he reacted to seeing his ex.

It also gave Becca a chance to get Tia's side of the romance, with her friend telling her 'the most we did is kiss' — but not ruling out that he could have applied for the show hoping The Bachelorette was going to be Tia instead.

However, Becca seemed completely reassured when Colton later told her he felt nothing for Tia, and said of Becca: 'The emotions that I feel are so strong. It's there — the potential is there. I truly mean that when I say that.'

Becca stunned the other guys on the date by walking out and grabbing the rose to give to Colton early, telling him after numerous kisses: 'I am just looking forward to our story.'

She had started the group date embarrassed at forgetting banker Jason's name — but ended up kissing him during their one-on-one time after apologizing for their 'rocky start' and telling him: 'I have a little crush on you and you make me nervous.'

She also had rocky moments during her second one-on-one date of the season, taking Chris Randone, 29, to Capitol Records where Richard Marx was waiting alone at a piano to serenade them with his hit Right Here Waiting.

But Chris could not hide his nerves when the star challenged them to 'write your love song,' telling Chris: 'You've gotta be vulnerable, man.'

Chris was shown nervously sitting in the hallway, alone, calling it 'scary' to be so 'vulnerable' so early — and revealed that it brought back painful memories of writing to his dad, who left the house when Chris was just seven, and getting no reply.

'So putting all these feelings on paper, it's scary. Because I don't want to get hurt again,' he said.

However, a hug and words of encouragement from Becca left him writing words for the song that she said 'gave me chills' and left her 'blown away,' with Richard clapping and saying: 'He just dropped the mic.'

He later got a rose and kisses a the end of the night after telling Becca the backstory about his dad, with her saying: 'That breaks my heart to hear.'

They ended the night kissing while they slow danced to Richard playing for them again, with Chris insisting: 'I 100 percent think I could be the guy for Becca. When you look at a woman and she's everything you could ever imagine you trust her and you feel her energy, her passion, it feels amazing.

'I look at her and I definitely see a future wife.'

Becca said: 'I just love being in his arms and having him hold me and kiss me. It makes me so happy — I'm on cloud nine right now.'

But Blake Horstmann, 28, who went on the first one-on-one date with her, could not hide his pain at her going out with someone else, as well as making connections on the group dates.

'I consider myself a secure guy, a confident guy … and that's all gone out the window,' he admitted to camera. 'I do not want to share Becca.'

He later admitted it to her, too, telling her he finds it hard when he just wants to 'cuddle up with my girlfriend.'

'Blake called me his girlfriend tonight!' Becca gushed to camera later, admitting: 'I felt so giddy.'

The Bachelorette returns next week on ABC.

The latest episode of Becca Kufrin's season included chilling footage of David Ravitz, 25, covered in blood as he was carried from the house by paramedics in the middle of the night, his arms crossed and his head enclosed and tied to the stretcher. item.title: EXCLUSIVE: 'Hunty fell asleep on his way to school': Roxy Jacenko reveals the impact of letting her kids stay up late at night... but insists she wouldn't have it any other way
item.description: She previously revealed that she lets her four-year-old son Hunter go to bed at 11pm sometimes on a school night, which may raise eyebrows for some.
item.content:encoded:
She previously revealed that she lets her four-year-old son Hunter go to bed at 11pm sometimes on a school night, which may raise eyebrows for some. 

And on Tuesday, PR queen Roxy Jacenko revealed the impact of letting her kids stay up so late. 

Speaking to Daily Mail Australia, the 38-year-old said Hunter fell asleep on his way to school on Tuesday, but said she wouldn't have it any other way.

Scroll down for video 

Roxy defended her parenting and says she has an each-to-their own attitude. 

'I wont lie, Hunty fell asleep on his way to school today, but at the same time we were having a good laugh last night,' Roxy said. 

'We were playing and reading books.'

She added: 'He's four, he's not learning algebra right now.'

'If he's a little bit tired, so be it!'

Roxy hit back at critics, saying: 'I guess what I've learned since becoming a mother is that you have to parent in a way that best suits your family and your kids.'  

'There are no set rules for how you parent, you have to parent each child depending on who they are and what they are and what they best react to, as individuals.'

'My kids don't go to bed early. Are they tired in the morning? Yes they are. But do I get to spend great time with them when I get home at 6pm? Yes I do.' 

Roxy is mother to Hunter, four, and daughter Pixie, six, who she shares with husband Oliver Curtis.

item.title: Kim Kardashian and Kylie Jenner look like clones as they show off their IDENTICAL figures in skintight outfits and stilettos in Calabasas
item.description: They have both been genetically blessed with fabulous figures. And Kim Kardashian, 37, and sister Kylie Jenner, 20, proved they were cut from the same cloth as they looked like clones of each other.
item.content:encoded:
They have both been genetically blessed with fabulous figures.

And Kim Kardashian, 37, and sister Kylie Jenner, 20, proved they were cut from the same cloth as they looked like clones of each other while in Calabasas on Monday.

The reality stars flaunted their curves as they rocked skintight grey and black halter tops and leggings for their Southern California outing.

Daring to impress, the stunning sisters revealed their bountiful bosoms as the form fitting tops hugged their bodies tightly.

Their pert derrieres took center stage as the leggings provided lasting support from their lithe waists down to their ankles.

They both rocked retro-styled mirrored sunglasses as they kept a cool beverage handy on their outing.

Kim stomped the sidewalks in a set of turquoise stilettos as Kylie chose a dark shade of grey for her footwear.

Kylie accessorized the athletic ensemble with a light blue messenger bag that was strapped across her chest.

The two seemed to be full of beans as they looked to be working on a photo shoot together - perhaps for one of Kanye West's recent ventures with 2XU.

At one point, the gorgeous gals jumped into a vintage sport utility vehicle.

Later, the sensational sisters traded in their stilettos for thigh-grazing boots - Kim in light brown and Kylie in grey.

Kim rocked a black baggy top as Kyle opted for a skimpy black mini dress that stopped just below her rear.  

Kylie could be seen slipping on the saucy tall boots in a doorway as an assistant waited outside.

Meanwhile, Kim launched her new makeup collection on Friday as she appears to be taking on younger sister Kylie's dominance in the cosmetics department.

Kim took to her site kimkardashianwest.com last week to share a clip from the behind-the-scenes of the shoot to plug the new lipsticks and lip liners.

The looker appeared to be topless but she actually had on a see-through nude tube top that showcased her curves.

'I've been working on my KKW Beauty Crème Lipsticks and Liners for such a long time, and I'm so happy that I can finally share them with you,' began the reality TV star.

She added, 'We initially planned on releasing them a while back, but we held off because I wanted to make sure the formula and packaging were absolutely perfect.  

This comes after she said on Thursday that she has a cheat day for her diet every 10 days. 

She explained on the same website: 'I've been really strict with my diet, recently. When I grocery shop, I buy lean protein, carbs, fruits and veggies, but every once in a while, I like to treat myself and have a cheat meal.'

The beauty admitted it is not easy being good all the time.

'It can be so hard (and boring) to eat really clean all of the time. A cheat meal allows me to enjoy food without feeling like I'm overindulging. 

'My trainer, Mel, instructs that you should schedule a cheat meal about once every 10 days. This way you won't lose any of the progress you've made at the gym.' 

'When you do them too often, your body's hormones are thrown off,' she wrote. 'Your testosterone, which is a muscle-making and fat-loss hormone, can change if you're eating too many calories, which can make you gain weight.

'You can still enjoy your favorite food, as long as you get back on track the next day. Cheat meals work best when you avoid alcohol, since they're empty calories filled with sugar. 

'This part is easy for me since I don't really drink—which means I can just have an extra doughnut or two. Kidding!

'I do have a sweet tooth, though, so normally my cheat meals are desserts or other sweets.'

In April she tried to lose more weight when she hit the Met Gala in NYC.  

'I have the Met Gala coming up and I've worked so hard working out, but I started eating a lot of sweets and I wanted to just change my food patterns to eat healthier and cut sugar out of my life as much as I can,' she said at the time. 

'We always have sweets around and it's really hard when there are temptations everywhere.'

item.title: Lil Kim dons eye-popping leather and leopard look to the 3rd annual Power Of Influence Awards
item.description: She's never shied away from a sexy style. She's never shied away from a sexy style. And the rapper went for an ever-daring look during the 3rd annual Power Of Influence Awards in New York City.
item.content:encoded:
She's never shied away from a sexy style.

And Lil Kim went for an ever-daring look during the 3rd annual Power Of Influence Awards in New York City Monday.

The How Many Licks rapper, 42, commanded attention in a leather and lace look featuring lots of leopard print and leggy boots at the event hosted by Mayor Bill De Blasio and Councilman Andy l King.

Kim's look consisted of a semi-sheer leopard top and a curious studded leather suit that traveled between her cleavage and not upon it.

The star, real name Kimberly Denise Jones, added another flourish with studded thigh-high boots, fishnet tights and lacy trim.

For makeup, the rapper went with a golden glow and for hair she styled her raven locks in cascading waves.

Kim was seated besides legendary tailor Dapper Dan, another one of the day's honorees.

The Harlem native looked sharp in a black and red suit with matching bow-tie and embellished glasses for an extra kick.

Also at the event was Angela Simmons, shoe designer and daughter of Reverend Run of Run DMC.

The 30-year-old fashionista, who was also there to be honored, wowed in a tight floral look.

Angela's sister Vanessa Simmons, 34, was also there.

She opted for a simple daytime look, dressing up a white blouse and blue jeans with gem-encrusted heels and hoop earrings.
item.dc:abstract: She's never shied away from a sexy style. And the rapper went for an ever-daring look during the 3rd annual Power Of Influence Awards in New York City Monday. The How Many Licks rapper, 42, commanded attention in a leather and lace look featuring lots of leopard print.
