item.title: Change of heart? Paul Hogan is set to play himself in ANOTHER Crocodile Dundee film after revealing the franchise had run its course
item.description: He previously told the Today show's Richard Wilkins that he had no plans on playing himself in another Crocodile Dundee film.
item.content:encoded:
He told the Today show's Richard Wilkins earlier this year that the Crocodile Dundee franchise had run its course.

But it appears Paul Hogan has had a change of heart, as he's set to play himself in upcoming film, The Very Excellent Mr Dundee!

The 78-year-old will commence filming in July, in Australia, Los Angeles and Vancouver. 

Scroll down for video 

Paul will play himself in the semi-fictional movie, which will be produced by Transmission Films and directed by Dean Murphy.

About to receive a Knighthood for services to comedy, Paul's manager urges him to not 'mess this up,' but over the course of six weeks sees his reputation destroyed.

At this stage, no other cast announcements have been made. 

The news may be a pleasant surprise to some, with Paul having previously shut down the idea of starring in another Crocodile Dundee film.

Speaking to the Today show's Richard Wilkins earlier this year, the veteran actor said that the film franchise had well and truly run its course.   

During the interview, Richard asked Paul if he was thinking about another installment of the movie franchise following Tourism Australia's Super Bowl ad featuring Chris Hemsworth.

'Not really, no. The first one was the most successful independent film ever made,' Paul said.

'The second one did huge business, but the third one sort of died. I thought the third one was flogging a dead horse so I don't think I will be pushing for a fourth one.'

Rumours of a possible fourth Crocodile Dundee film began swirling after Tourism Australia's hilarious faux movie trailer aired during the Super Bowl earlier this year.

The advert, which cost $36 million, took the form of a fake movie trailer for a new Dundee film, and featured many of Australia's most famous exports.
item.dc:abstract: He told the Today show's Richard Wilkins earlier this year, that the franchise had run its course. But it appears Paul Hogan has had a change of heart, as he's set to play himself in upcoming film, The Very Excellent Mr Dundee! The 78-year-old will commence filming in July, in Australia, Los Angeles and Vancouver.

item.title: Making a comeback? Johnny Ruffo hints at returning to Home And Away as he continues to fight brain cancer
item.description: Johnny Ruffo left Home And Away back in 2016.
item.content:encoded:
Johnny Ruffo left Home And Away back in 2016. 

But it may well be that the former soap star, who played the role of Chris Harrington for three years, could return to Summer Bay.

During an interview with KIIS FM's Kyle and Jackie 'O' on Tuesday, Johnny, 30, teased his return to the long-running series.

Scroll down for video 

'Maybe, you will have to ask them (the producers),' he cheekily remarked.

The actor told the radio hosts his character's departure from the show was left open ended.

'He went to see his family, maybe he will come back,' he said. 

Last week Johnny sparked rumours of a return when he posted a snap of an on-set appearance to his Instagram account.

He shared a picture of himself cuddling up to veteran star of the show and close friend, Lynne McGranger.

Fans were quick to quiz the actor, with one writing: 'Omg Chris is coming back'.

Johnny is currently battling an aggressive form of brain cancer.

During the interview, the popular star gave fans an update on his recovery from the life-threatening disease.

'I still have it (Brain Cancer) and I'm still doing chemotherapy,' he told Kyle and Jackie.
item.dc:abstract: Johnny Ruffo left Home And Away back in 2016. But it may well be that the former soap star, who played the role of Chris Harrington for three years, could return to the Summer Bay. During an interview with KIIS FM's Kyle and Jackie 'O' on Tuesday, Johnny, 30, played coy on rumours about his return to the soap series.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: 'He's got the wrath of my tongue a few times!' Roxy Jacenko reveals what it's REALLY like having husband Oliver Curtis work for her
item.description: Roxy Jacenko has revealed what it's like having husband Oliver Curtis work with her at her Sweaty Betty PR business.
item.content:encoded:
Roxy Jacenko has revealed what it's really like having husband Oliver Curtis work with her at her Sweaty Betty PR business.

The 38-year-old told Daily Mail Australia on Tuesday that Oliver's appointment has no doubt been a 'shock to his system' and joked that she's had no qualms about telling him off. 

'He's got the wrath of my tongue a few times,' Roxy said with a laugh. 

Scroll down for video 

'And I have no doubt he's probably thought "what the f**k am I doing here?," she said. 

Roxy added: 'But as a team, it's hugely beneficial for me.'

'It means I have an opportunity to do what I'm good at and that is coming up with the creative ideas and running the business, rather than worrying the back end of finance and the finer details. But it's going to take time.'

'He's a smart boy, he's much smarter than me and brings to the table different elements,' Roxy said. 

Roxy added that Ollie has taken some time to adjust to his new gig after coming from the finance world.

'It's a shock to his system, there is no doubt about it,' she said.

'I said to him today, "one of my strengths Ollie when I started was the fact that I took on a task and didn't delegate it, I took a task and I did it.''

'And that is a powerful message in any business for anybody...He's not used to that.'

'He comes from the finance world where there is an assistant, for an assistant for an assistant. And that doesn't exist in the PR world.'

It was revealed last month that Oliver had started working at his wife's business following his release from prison for conspiracy to commit insider trading.

Roxy - who shares two children with Oliver - is set to reveal her top tips and tricks to fans at her  In Conversation with Roxy Jacenko seminar in Sydney on Wednesday.

The blonde businesswoman said she hopes to show fans that business and her life is not as glamorous as it seems.   

'Yes I want to bang my head against the f***ing desk every day because it's hard,' Roxy said with a laugh.

'I don't walk in and you know, it's a breeze. I walk in and want to cry because I'm like "why? Why is it so hard?'

'From the outside, everyone looks in and thinks, "oh wow, it looks so easy!"

The 38-year-old told Daily Mail Australia on Tuesday that Oliver's appointment has no doubt been a 'shock to his system,' and joked that she's had no qualms about telling him how it is. 'He's got the wrath of my tongue a few times,' Roxy said with a laugh.

item.title: 'That reeks!' Today host Karl Stefanovic gets slimed in the name of charity at Nine's Gold Telethon
item.description: Today host Karl Stefanovic gets slimed in the name of charity at Nine's Gold Telethon
item.content:encoded:
Today show host Karl Stefanovic got doused in thick green slime on Monday in the name of charity.

The 43-year-old TV star volunteered to be dunked in stinky green goo to help raise funds for the Sydney Children’s Hospital Foundation.

During the ninth Gold Telethon LIVE show, Karl received a good-old fashioned sliming by the ambassador of the annual appeal, nine-year-old Ollie Lynch.

Scroll down for video  

At the start of the segment, Karl was seen standing under a slime machine dressed in a white onsie.

'I do believe that it is slime time!' he announced to a crowd of Telethon supporters. 

Seconds later the crowd started chanting: 'Slime, slime, slime, slime!'  

At this point Karl gave the flame-haired nine-year-old permission to pull the lever to release the sludge.

Karl was then covered in thick, green slim in front of a cheering crowd.

'That is reeko rancho Ollie!' Karl exclaimed.

Ambassador Ollie suffers from a heart defect and has 'endured 28 operations,' according to The Daily Telegraph.

The official Today show Instagram account gave fans a closer look at the aftermath of Karl's slimefest. 

Dripping in bright green gloop, Karl was pictured enjoying a big belly laugh as he pulled a Frankenstein pose.

'Karl Stefanovic went the extra mile to help raise money for the Gold Telethon!' Today show wrote alongside the image.
item.dc:abstract: Today show host, Karl Stefanovic got doused in thick green slime on Monday in the name of charity. The 43-year-old TV star was chosen to get dunked in stinky green goo to help raise funds for the Sydney Children’s Hospital Foundation. During the ninth Gold Telethon LIVE show, Karl received a good-old fashioned sliming by the ambassador of the annual appeal, Ollie Lynch, 9.

item.title: Chasing the winter blues away! Ronan Keating takes his wife Storm and lookalike baby son Cooper to breakfast in chilly Sydney
item.description: Irish-born Ronan and his Australian wife, Storm, 36, were spotted going for breakfast in the morning with their young child, Cooper, 1.
item.content:encoded:
Singer Ronan Keating and his young family brightened up an otherwise cold and gloomy winter day in Sydney on Tuesday.

The Irish-born star and his Australian wife, Storm, 36, were spotted going for breakfast in the morning with their young tot, Cooper, one.

The trio rugged up in style for the inclement weather, with Storm clad in a knee-length blue and grey coat, skintight blue jeans and brown suede boots.

Scroll down for video 

Ronan, 41, looked dapper in dark sunglasses, a dark green jacket and black jeans.

Cooper took off his beanie at one point to reveal his blonde hair, just like his dad's. 

A warm breakfast of coffee and toast may have helped boost the couple's mood about the cold weather. 

The outing comes after the Boyzone singer claimed programs like The Voice Australia recycle the same contestants.

He told The Sunday Telegraph: 'They keep regurgitating talent here on these shows.'

He added: 'I saw The Voice last night, and Trent [Bell] was in one of my bands on X Factor, and Jacinta Gulisano was in a duo I had as well, so it was like, "Jesus Christ … all of these people I've seen before."' 

Trent Bell competed as part of boyband The Collective during the fourth season of The X Factor in 2012. Ronan served as his coach.

Meanwhile, Jacinta Gulisano sang in a pop trio called Third Degree in 2013. They finished the fifth season of The X Factor in fourth place.

Third Degree lost a member after the show and were renamed the The Clique, before parting ways with their music label and disbanding in 2015.

Jacinta has also tried out for Australia's Got Talent, making her appearance on The Voice her third televised singing competition.

Ronan also described the formats of The Voice and The X Factor, which involve a panel of judges mentoring acts and providing feedback, as 'tired'.

The trio rugged up in style for the inclement weather, with Storm clad in a knee-length blue and grey coat, skintight blue jeans and brown suede boots.

item.title: From an immaculate floor plan to avoiding the curse of the 'panic buy': The Block's Shaynna Blaze shares her top tips for snapping up the perfect house first time
item.description: From looking out for an immaculate floor plan to avoiding the curse of the 'panic-buy', the 55-year-old interior designer has revealed all her property secrets.
item.content:encoded:
She has established herself as the queen of renovation after offering her expertise on shows like Selling Houses Australia, The Block and Buying Blind.

And Shaynna Blaze has now shared the tricks of her trade, revealing her top tips for buying the perfect house.

From looking out for an immaculate floor plan to avoiding the curse of the 'panic-buy', the 55-year-old interior designer has revealed all her property secrets. 

'Location is always everything, it is where you want to live,' Shaynna told 9Honey Homes on Tuesday. 

'Usually, the location you want to be, a lot of other people want to be there, so you've got to look at your compromises.'

She advised that making a list of priorities is key, explaining that a floor plan that favours open-plan living is paramount. 

'We all talk about kitchens and bathrooms, but they can be a lot of money. Make sure you have your open plan living with connection to the exterior of the house - that's what everybody wants,' she said. 

Blaze also stressed the importance of waiting and not 'panic buying' when the market is 'hot' and prices are increasing.  

She said a 'cooler' housing market will help to stop impulse buys that budding homeowners will later regret.  

'I feel now, when it's starting to cool and settle, people feel like they can breathe and make a more calculated decision rather than just a quick, spur-of-the-moment decision,' Shaynna explained.   

The presenter is helping couples buy houses on the new Nine property show Buying Blind along with buyer’s agent Rich Harvey and builder and carpenter Marshal Keen.

The show was originally aired on Danish television and is made by the same production company behind the wildly successful Married At First Sight.

It follows six couples, who hand over their all their money to the three experts to buy a house for them that they have never seen.

item.title: Kyle Richards looks cool for the summer in floral dress and Panama hat as she shops in Beverly Hills
item.description: The 49-year-old went shopping in Beverly Hills on Monday with daughter Sophia Umansky, 20
item.content:encoded:
She's made Beverly Hills her own thanks to her role on Bravo's Real Housewives reality series.

And on Monday, Kyle Richards did some shopping in her own backyard keeping cool in the summer heat in a floral dress and Panama hat.

The 49-year-old flashed a little cleavage in her floaty frock that she wore with a blue denim jacket. 

She went bare-legged in flip flops and carried a cream tote over one shoulder. 

Kyle completed her ensemble with a pair of drop pendant earrings and oversized sunglasses. 

The reality star was joined on her outing by her daughter Sophia, 18, who is heading to college in Washington, D.C., in the fall after graduating high school. 

Sophia is the middle of her three daughters with second husband Mauricio Umansky, whom she wed in 1996. She also has a daughter Farrah Aldjufrie, 29, from her first marriage. 

Sophia wore an ensemble of cropped white blouse tied at the bust and matching shorts with frilly hems.

She stepped out in white trainers and carried a blue handbag.

Her loose dark hair was tucked behind he rears and she wore round sunglasses.

Meanwhile, Sophia's younger sister Portia, 10, is focused on following in her mom's footsteps as an actress.

Kyle Richards recently revealed to Page Six about how she feels when her 10-year-old goes out for auditions.

'Portia is the only one who wants to act and it’s very weird for me to take her to auditions,' Kyle recently revealed to Page Six.

'It takes me back in time, all [of] the sudden, I’m my mom and she’s me,' she explained.  

Kyle launched her Hollywood journey in earnest back in 1975, when she landed the role of Alicia Sanderson Edwards in the long-running television series Little House on the Prairie.

She would go on to star in numerous other shows, including the hit medical drama ER.  

She's currently serving as a producer on the new Paramount Network show American Woman which is based on her unconventional childhood growing up in the 1970s.

The TV series stars Jennifer Bartels, Mena Suvari and Alicia Silverstone.

The 49-year-old flashed a little cleavage in her floaty frock that she wore with a blue denim jacket.

item.title: Picnic At Hanging Rock star Madeleine Madden reveals gastro outbreak on set of the reboot TV series
item.description: Picnic At Hanging Rock actress Madeleine Madden has revealed the worst moment of shooting the Foxtel mini-series.
item.content:encoded:
Picnic At Hanging Rock actress Madeleine Madden has revealed the stars of the reboot were hit with gastro while filming the series.

The 21-year-old said things got messy on the drama when a number of the actresses were hit with the stomach bug during a picnic scene. 

Speaking to Woman's Day magazine, the indigenous actress called it one of the 'worst moments' on set.

'We all got gastro when we were shooting our picnic scene,' she said. 

The actress added she learnt to see the lighter side of the not-so-pretty experience. 

'A bunch of girls in white dresses with gastro wasn't funny at the time - but now it's hilarious,' she added. 

The reboot stars Game Of Throne favourite Natalie Dormer, former Home and Away star Samara Weaving and Orange Is The New Black star, Yael Stone.

The actress, who plays bright mathematician Marion Quade in the reboot, also told the publication she is selective of the roles she chooses as an indigenous actress, because she wants to help celebrate indigenous stories.

Based on the 1975 Australian mystery drama by Peter Weir, the series follows the disappearance of several schoolgirls during a picnic on Valentine's Day in 1900.

Speaking to The Daily Telegraph in April, Madeleine said her mixed-race character was a 'trailblazer'.     

'She is a character that is just way before her time, but also a trailblazer for future generations of women,' she revealed.  

The Foxtel drama series has been met with universal acclaim after its international premiere at the Berlin Film Festival earlier this year.
item.dc:abstract: Picnic At Hanging Rock actress Madeleine Madden has revealed the stars of the reboot were hit with gastro while filming the series. The 21-year-old revealed things got messy on the period drama when a number of the actresses were hit with the stomach bug. Speaking to Woman's Day , the indigenous actress called it one of the 'worst moments' on the set of the mini-series.

item.title: Kelly Preston dons day and night ensembles as she hits the town in NYC to promote Gotti
item.description: In separate outings, the actress showed off day and night style as she ventured out to appear on Good Morning America to promote her new film Gotti, then stepped out in Manhattan.
item.content:encoded:
Kelly Preston showed her versatility as a fashionista on Monday in New York City.

In separate outings, the 55-year-old actress showed off her day and night style as she ventured out to appear on Good Morning America to promote her new film Gotti, then stepped out in Manhattan.

During her outing in the daytime, she wore an off white, long-sleeved floral dress with a V-neck, with beige sandals and a pink purse. For her nighttime outing, Kelly was clad in a black skirt with a plunging neck and black pointy-toe heels.

Scroll below for video 

On both outings, Kelly had her blonde locks down and parted.

The 5ft6 beauty chat with Good Morning America's Michael Strahan on Monday, where she said that she and husband John Travolta recently joined Instagram at the urging of their daughter Ella.

'We're on now; it's fun, it's really fun,' said Preston, who admitted keeping up appearances on the social media site can be like 'a job.'

'And it's like, if you don't look good that day, "I'm gonna post some fruit!"'

Preston, who's been married to Travolta, 64, since 1991, was asked by Strahan, 'What is the secret?' in regards to their longtime union, which has weathered nearly three decades in Hollywood, amid scandal and tragedy (their son Jett Travolta died at 16 at the family's Bahamas vacation home in January of 2009).

'I think it's communication,' Preston said. 'Keeping it fresh ... checking in with each other and evolving - you change so you want to change together.'

The Jerry Maguire star said that 'keeping it fun' has been a crucial ingredient to her longtime marriage with the Tinseltown icon.

'It doesn't just happen, you gotta work at it,' she said.

Kelly, who plays Victoria Gotti in the mob biopic, said that it was 'amazing' spending time with Victoria in research for the role.

'First of all, it's daunting to play someone who is alive, her husband was so iconic. She was amazing. She is smart, funny, kind, she was open and warm, she cooked us lunch - a beautiful Italian lunch,' Preston said. 'And we became friends by email, so I could ask her anything I wanted about how she was feeling, what she would say. 

'This movie is so real, there's not one word that's in it that wasn't said, it's a real behind-the-scenes look at this family.'

Gotti opens in theaters Friday.

item.title: That's not like you! Bikini model Annalise Braakensiek, 45, covers up her fabulous figure and goes makeup free during a brisk walk on a very chilly day
item.description: She's the model, actress and television presenter who is known for dedication to fitness.
item.content:encoded:
She's usually seen flaunting her fabulous figure in a bikini. 

But like the rest of Sydney, Annalise Braakensiek, 45, was bundled up when she went for a brisk walk with a pal during a chilly Tuesday in Sydney.  

The fitness enthusiast sported layers of black athletic attire for the leisurely stroll.

Annalise covered her upper frame in a black tank, a coordinating zip-up cardigan and puffer vest.

The blonde teamed the look with full-length leggings that clung to her trim pins and trendy sneakers.

Annalise allowed her long locks to fall effortlessly underneath a khaki beanie and opted to go makeup free.

Joined by pal Gina, the Sydney-based star picked up the pace along the iconic Bondi to Bronte coastal walk.

Annalise revealed to Daily Mail Australia last October that yoga, Pilates and soft sand walks are the secrets behind her trim figure.

'I take my yoga mat with me on my travels and practice every day. When I'm at home, I love to do Pilates three to four times a week,' the brand ambassador said.

'I also do two personal training sessions a week, along with soft sand and coastal walks,' Annalise added. 

The swimsuit model complements her exercise regime with a 'well-balanced organic, meat, dairy and gluten-free diet.'
item.dc:abstract: She's usually seen flaunting her fabulous figure in a bikini. But like the rest of Sydney, Annalise Braakensiek, 45, was bundled up when she went for a brisk walk with a pal in Sydney on Tuesday. The fitness enthusiast sported layers of black athletic attire.
item.dc:creator: Kristy Johnson

item.title: Tracee Ellis Ross stuns in colorful geometric gown with sheer top at ACE Awards in New York City
item.description: The 45-year-old actress was a sheer delight on Monday at the ACE Awards in New York City.
item.content:encoded:
Tracee Ellis Ross was a sheer delight on Monday at the ACE Awards in New York City.

The 45-year-old actress was honored at the 22nd annual ACE Awards at Cipriani 42nd Street with the Style Ambassador Award.

She lived up to the title in a Kevin Germanier gown with a colorful geometric sheer panel over a long black skirt. 

Tracee accessorized with hoop earrings and sported orange lipstick matching a triangle pattern on her gown by the Swiss designer who has become a leader in sustainable fashion.

The Black-ish star completed her outfit with red Louboutin heels and had her dark hair up in a chic high bun. 

Tracee teamed up at the awards ceremony with Lupita Nyong'o, 35, who stunned in an embellished bright yellow Carolina Herrera gown with plunging neckline.

The Girlfriends star earlier on Monday was spotted out and about in New York City in a pink dress with a motif of green peas. 

She accessorized with with a Gucci fanny pack and Gucci backpack and black sunglasses.

Tracee kept it casual with her footwear in a pair of black sandals.

The Los Angeles native is the daughter of singer Diana Ross, 74, and music manager Robert Ellis Silberstein, 72. 

Tracee has been portraying liberal anesthesiologist Doctor Rainbow Johnson on Black-ish since its premiere on ABC in September 2014.

She directed the 20th episode of season four of the show titled Fifty-Three Percent that aired on April 17.

Tracee has won three NAACP Image Awards and a Golden Globe Award for her work on Black-ish.

item.title: 'Worked for it': The Biggest Loser host and mother-of-one Michelle Bridges, 47, flaunts her incredible figure in a skimpy bikini
item.description: Michelle Bridges is one of Australia's most famed fitness stars thanks to her hit weight loss show The Biggest Loser.
item.content:encoded:
She is Australia's most famed fitness stars thanks to her now defunct weight loss show, The Biggest Loser.

And on Monday, Michelle Bridges, 47, showed off her incredibly toned figure in a skimpy bikini selfie.

Wearing a low-cut purple top and pastel mint-hued bottoms, the fitness guru proudly flaunted her gym-honed physique.

'Then I remembered a time when I was chasing sun Jan 2018,' she captioned the throwback snap.

Adding: 'Always good to note the fun times,' and finishing with the hashtag 'worked for it'.

Back in March, youthful Michelle wowed fans when she revealed her noticeably more taut visage and very plump pout.

Taking to Instagram at the time, the mother-of-one posted a candid selfie which showcased her wrinkle-free skin and seemingly fuller lips.

The star's eyebrows appeared more arched than usual and her skin was noticeably smoother.

In 2014, she told News Corp that she is not opposed to Botox, but did not confirm whether she has ever used it.

'I am a fan of anything that makes a person feel good about themselves and more confident,' she said.

She added that sleep is the most powerful beauty tool.

'I am a big believer in [sleep] being majorly anti-ageing. Nothing enhances your features like a gratitude attitude and manners. Sarcasm and judgement is ageing. Compassion is beautiful,' she said.
item.dc:abstract: Michelle Bridges is one of Australia's most famed fitness stars thanks to her hit weight loss show The Biggest Loser. And on Monday, the 47-year-old showed off her incredibly toned figure in a skimpy bikini selfie. Wearing a busty purple top and pastel mint-hued bottoms, the fitness guru flaunted her gym-honed physique while flashing her pearly whites.

item.title: Just another day in Byron Bay! Chris Hemsworth looks every inch the doting father as he grabs lunch with his wife Elsa Pataky and their children
item.description: He's known to Marvel fans as the muscle-bound superhero Thor.
item.content:encoded:
He's known to Marvel fans as the muscle-bound superhero Thor.

But at home in the Australian coastal town of Byron Bay, Chris Hemsworth is just another local.

The Hollywood star, 34, was spotted enjoying a quick family lunch on Monday with his wife Elsa Pataky and their children.

Scroll down for video 

Chris married Elsa, 41, in 2010 and they share three children: daughter India, six, and twin sons Sasha and Tristan, four.

Life as a busy father clearly helps Chris stay in shape, as he maintains his muscular frame all year round.

Even when he doesn't have a blockbuster film on the agenda, he always looks in peak physical condition while surfing in Byron. 

Meanwhile, the Avengers star has been making waves of a different kind recently amid the construction of his massive new home.

As his property transforms into a huge Hollywood-style mansion, locals have expressed fear the development sets an 'inappropriate' tone for the surf town.

Construction is still rumbling on for the $8.7million coastal abode in the hills above Seven Mile Beach at Broken Head, but residents claim it's spoiling the local charm.

'It seems excessive but there's not much we can do about it - nothing surprises me in this town these days,' Darren Birch told the Herald Sun last week. 

Chris and Elsa, who were previously based in Los Angeles, now enjoy a more relaxed lifestyle on Australia's east coast.

Elsa has been rather busy with her own acting career of late, too, filming 10-part Netflix show Tidelands in Queensland.

Tidelands is the first Australian-made Netflix Original Series and will be released globally across the streaming platform.
item.dc:abstract: He's known to Marvel fans as the muscle-bound superhero Thor. But at home in the Australian coastal town of Byron Bay, Chris Hemsworth is just another local. The Hollywood star, 34, was spotted enjoying a quick family lunch on Monday with his wife Elsa Pataky and their children.

item.title: How was the honeymoon? Nick 'The Honey Badger' Cummins returns to Australia from an overseas trip after filming The Bachelor finale
item.description: Australia's new Bachelor has just returned from overseas - but was it a romantic 'honeymoon' with his leading lady?
item.content:encoded:
Australia's new Bachelor has just returned from overseas - but was it a romantic 'honeymoon' with his leading lady?

Nick 'The Honey Badger' Cummins revealed via Instagram on Tuesday morning that he had flown back to his home country.

Sharing a video of his plane touching down, the patriotic former Wallabies star wrote: 'Still call Australia home'.

Scroll down for video 

Instagram posts from last week suggest that Nick, 30, was in Colorado, USA for the GoPro Mountain Games.

While the purpose of the trip appeared to be enjoying some winter sports, it's possible he was joined by The Bachelor's yet-to-be-revealed winner.

Based on paparazzi photos and the research efforts of The Bachelor fan community, the final four contestants are all but confirmed.

The lucky ladies are believed to be: Brooke Blurton, Cassandra Wood, Brittany Hockley and Sophie Tieman. 

The Bachelor recently wrapped filming at an unspecified overseas destination. 

In previous seasons, the winning couple have enjoyed a brief holiday together after the Final Rose Ceremony.

This post-show trip usually takes place near the finale location and lasts for a few days before the pair return to Australia.

Private meetings between the Bachelor and his new girlfriend are then organised by producers in the months before the finale airs.

These rendezvous, known as as Safe House Visits among Bachelor die-hards, are top secret so as not to spoil the show's outcome.

The Bachelor Australia will air on Network Ten later this year

item.title: Katharine McPhee shows off enviable figure in white couture gown as she dazzles for red carpet gala
item.description: She's wowing audiences as the lead in Broadway's Waitress. And Katharine McPhee did the same for onlookers as she commanded attention on the red carpet in New York on Monday.
item.content:encoded:
She's wowing audiences as the lead in Broadway's Waitress. 

And Katharine McPhee did the same for onlookers as she commanded attention on the red carpet in New York on Monday.

The 34-year-old stunner dazzled in a breezy white couture number as she arrived in style at the 2018 WNET Gala. 

Daring to impress, the American Idol beauty showed off her delicate decolletage as the dress featured a low cut neckline.

Her gorgeous gams were thrust on center stage as the fantastic sartorial choice cut just above her knees.

She kept her trademark brunette tresses long and loose as they barely scraped the top of her petite shoulders.  

Recently, Katharine revealed what she finds attractive in a man for the June edition of Men's Health magazine.

'I love stubble,' she explained. 'But it depends on the person. A guy with a softer jawline looks great with a little stubble.

'It just adds something to his face. I don't mind kissing someone with scruff. It feels manly.' 

Her beau - stubble-less David Foster - apparently has other qualities Katharine admires.

For one, both of them have had musical careers - David, 64, is a business mogul in the industry and Katharine starred and sang on the TV show Smash.  

This month she will begin playing Jenna on at New York's Brooks Atkinson Theater in the hit musical Waitress, marking her first Broadway gig, Playbill reported.

David has in his time gone through four marriages - to singer B.J. Cook from 1972-1981, to Rebecca Dyer from 1982 to 1986, to songwriter Linda Thompson from 1991 to 2005 and to model-turned-reality-star Yolanda Hadid from 2011 to last year. 

Katharine and her own ex-husband, producer Nick Cokas, tied the not in 2008. In October 2013, McPhee was photographed kissing her married Smash director Michael Morris.

By May 2014, Cokas and his wife publicly announced their intention to dissolve their union, and the divorce was finalized in February of 2016.

David has sired eight children, whereas Katharine has none at present.
item.dc:abstract: She's wowing audiences as the lead in Broadway's Waitress. And Katharine McPhee did the same for onlookers as she commanded attention on the red carpet in New York on Monday. item.title: Christina Milian enjoys fun in the sun with daughter Violet, eight, and boyfriend Matt Pokora in LA
item.description: The trio enjoyed some frosty treats as they strolled along the streets of the Studio City neighborhood.
item.content:encoded:
They've been romantically linked for almost a year.

And the romance between Christina Milian and French singer Matt Pokora is still going strong.

The hunky 32-year-old Frenchman joined the actress and singer, 36, and her daughter Violet, eight, for some fun in the sun in Los Angeles on Monday. 

The trio enjoyed some frosty treats as they strolled along the streets of the Studio City neighborhood.

They were all dressed for the hot weather with Christina leading the pack in a ripped green Vikings t-short and blue denim shorts.

The Dip It Low hitmaker stepped out in white and gold trainers and wore her hair piled high on top of her head.

Christina's daughter rocked an acid washed t-shirt and matching shorts along with white sneakers.

The star of TV's Grandfathered affectionately cupped Violet's face as they walked and shared some banter together.

Matt followed on behind enjoying his ice cream.

He wore a red and black tye-dye shirt with a huge heart image on the front along with ripped jean shorts and red and white sneakers. 

Violet's father is Christina's ex-husband The-Dream whom she divorced in 2011. 

Christina went on to date Lil Wayne before hooking up with Matt last August in St. Tropez.

Speaking to Life & Style last month, she spoke about her hopes of tying the knot again and having another child.

 'I definitely want to have more kids,' she said. 'And I would love to get married again, too, especially to somebody that I love and that's open and wants to do it. Sure, they can spring the ring on me anytime!'

Meanwhile, she's getting ready to shoot a pilot for Fox TV with Jenna Dewan called Mixtape.

The musical drama revolves around a group of people in LA who are connected through music.

The hunky 32-year-old Frenchman joined the actress and singer, 36, and her daughter Violet, eight, for some fun in the sun in Los Angeles on Monday.

item.title: Who knew! Radio host Jackie 'O' Henderson reveals her incredible beauty hack to give the illusion she is wearing less makeup
item.description: KIIS FM's Kyle Sandilands and Jackie 'O' Henderson never disappoint in the way of on-air spontaneity.
item.content:encoded:
KIIS FM's Kyle Sandilands and Jackie 'O' Henderson never disappoint in the way of on-air spontaneity.

And on Monday, the famed radio duo shared yet another impromptu moment when Jackie applied fake freckles using an eyeliner pencil.  

The blonde radio host, 43, pulled out her makeup bag and began talking Kyle through a step-by-step tutorial.

Scroll down for video  

'So, what you want to do here is dab a few freckles here,' Jackie said as she added dots with the pencil across her nose area.

'See how they're too dark right now?' she said while offering Kyle a close-up visual.

Never one to shy away from a controversial comment, Kyle remarked: 'It looks like you've got a bit of skin cancer there.'

'Or a really brown muddy nose,' Jackie quickly added.

Continuing her brief tutorial, Jackie explained: 'And then you dab them down really lightly so they blend in and look natural'.

Jackie then informed a curious Kyle that fake freckles offer the illusion of wearing less make up.

'You can see the freckles so people think you're wearing less makeup,' she explained.

Quizzing Jackie on her waterproof tactics, Kyle hysterically asked: 'What happens when the rain comes? Do they dribble down like chocolate ice cream?'

Every time it rains I cover my nose,' Jackie jokingly added, before Kyle said: 'That's the cutest thing I've ever heard... and crazy.'

item.title: Cardi B covers her pregnant belly in tight white outfit as her due date is just two months away
item.description: She's weeks away from giving birth. But the Invasion Of Privacy rapper made sure to update fans about her pregnancy on Instagram, sharing a snapshot of her seven-months-along bump.
item.content:encoded:
She's weeks away from giving birth.

But Cardi B made sure to update fans about her pregnancy on Instagram Monday, sharing a snapshot of her seven-months-along bump wrapped in a tight white outfit.

The Invasion Of Privacy rapper, 25, covered her ever-growing belly in a clingy tank and matching leggings in the photo captioned: 'Bomfy.'

Scroll down for video 

While her look was simple, the star sported colorful tresses in blue, pink, and blonde hues.

She also added a manicure of sharp, pink stilettos nails, geometric shades and a chunky chain necklace. 

Earlier in the day, she gave her some 25million Instagram followers a professional update, telling fans about how both her song I Like It and her Maroon 5 collab Girls Like You made the Billboard Hot 100.

Clearly elated, the Bronx-born beauty told fans: 'I'm so happy, I'm so grateful.'

I LIKE IT “NUMBER 3 on the hot 100 “GIRLS LIKE YOU “NUMBER 4 Thank you sooo much .I can’t believe it I’m soooo happy.I love my fans i love my supporters i love God .He sooo amazing to me he really is real .THE DEVIL BE WORKING BUT GOD WORKS HARDERS ALWAYS !!!!!! @jbalvin @badbunnypr @maroon5

A post shared by Cardi B Official IG (@iamcardib) on Jun 11, 2018 at 11:58am PDT

'I swear, if I was to see Jesus Christ in my dreams today, I would kiss his feet. I... wish I could give God a hug, bro, so I'm just gonna hug myself and make pretend... because this man does so much for me.'

The Dinero songstress continued her message of gratitude in the caption, writing: 'Thank you sooo much, I can’t believe it I’m soooo happy.

'I love my fans i love my supporters i love God. He sooo amazing to me he really is real. THE DEVIL BE WORKING BUT GOD WORKS HARDERS ALWAYS !!!!!!'

Cardi B was blessed with another bit of good fortune Monday, as TMZ reported that fiance Offset had recovered a $150k diamond chain that went missing at the Met Gala in May.

The 26-year-old Migos rapper had the expensive piece of jewelry in his possession in a recent clip officials with the New York Police Department saw, leading them to end their grand larceny probe.

The theft reportedly took place around the time of the Met Gala in New York City May 7 at a penthouse suite of the SIXTY LES Hotel where he was staying. 

Offset's manager Danny Zook searched the room but found nothing, Page Six reported at the time.

Authorities concluded that the chain was given back to the rapper, whose real name is Kiari Kendrell Cephus, the outlet reported.

item.title: Khloe Kardashian shares snap of daughter True taking bath... after new mom spotted out with Tristan
item.description: Khloe Kardashian shared a snap of daughter True on Monday. The posting comes after Khloe was seen in a rare outing with her baby's daddy Tristan Thompson in Cleveland on Saturday night.
item.content:encoded:
Khloe Kardashian shared a snap of daughter True on Monday.

The 33-year-old reality star revealed a sweet pic of her newborn baby girl taking a bath with two hearts drawn over the photo via her social media account.

The posting comes after Khloe was seen in a rare outing with her baby's daddy Tristan Thompson in Cleveland on Saturday night.

Their little bundle of joy has her hands in fists with her beautiful dark eyes open as she is held by Khloe in a pink bath tub.  

Meanwhile, the parents of True spent Saturday evening at a friend's birthday party in the hip Ohio city as Tristan plays basketball for the Cleveland Cavaliers.

Tristan recently lost out on a championship ring when his Cavaliers were swept by the Golden State Warriors during the NBA finals.

In addition to basketball woes, Khloe was left devastated at the beginning of April when DailyMail.com broke the news of Tristan's cheating scandal with video footage of Tristan seemingly smooching another woman in a night club in New York.

While multiple women came forward with similar allegations, she's stayed relatively mum on the accusations.

Despite her heartbreak, Khloe allowed Tristan, whom she's been dating since 2016, to be at the April 12 birth of their daughter True before kicking him out of their family home.

But it didn't take long before Tristan had managed to wiggle his way back in as the pair are now living together again and are raising their little girl as a couple, while her family seems intent on getting Khloe back to Los Angeles.

'She'll be home soon, so it's really great,' the Kardashian matriarch Kris Jenner told Us Weekly on Thursday.

When asked if Khloe will be coming back for good, she replied: 'I think so! Yes!'

A source recently told E News: 'Everyone is understanding of her situation and they are all trying to be there for her, but obviously want her home.
item.dc:abstract: Khloe Kardashian shared a snap of daughter True on Monday. The 33-year-old reality star revealed a sweet pic of her newborn baby girl taking a bath with two hearts drawn over the photo via her social media account. The posting comes after Khloe was seen in a rare outing with her baby's daddy Tristan Thompson in Cleveland on Saturday night.

item.title: Age-defying Toni Braxton, 50, looks incredible in flirty frock at the Faith Under Fire screening
item.description: She's the age-defying 90s popstar who recently confirmed her engagement to rapper Birdman (Bryan Christopher Williams). And things seem to be going well for Toni Braxton, looking incredible
item.content:encoded:
She's the age-defying 90s popstar who recently confirmed her engagement to rapper Birdman (Bryan Christopher Williams). 

And things seem to be going well for Toni Braxton, looking incredible at the screening of Faith Under Fire on Monday. 

The 50-year-old flaunted her trim physique and flashed her toned legs in a mini-dress. 

Scroll down for video  

Toni opted for a form-fitting black dress that sported a pleated patterned bottom.

The square cut saw her ample cleavage struggle to contain themselves in the ensemble.

She paired the frock with simple black strappy sandals. 

Toni had her brunette locks out and styled straight. 

The singer and pianist sported a full face of makeup complete with a dramatic eye and bold red lip.

Enjoying a Q&A, at one point, Toni was seen speaking with Billboard Magazine senior correspondent Gail Mitchell. 

And while things seem to be going well for the Un-Break My heart songstress, she recently opened up about her eight year battle from Lupus. 

Toni was diagnosed with the autoimmune disease after collapsing while performing in Las Vegas in 2008. 

Speaking to People, she revealed that her fiancé Birdman was and has always been her biggest support system - even whilst she was married to now ex-husband Keri Lewis. 

'I can get on television when I'm having a terrible day and tell them it's a good day, and he'll say, "No, it's now. I can tell",' she said. 

'I've always had issues dating because I was ashamed to have lupus and felt like no on would want to take care of a woman with lupus - I was insecure.' 

 'With him, I can be comfortable with a little hate or skully on with some lipstick and mascara, but I can just let my hair down a little bit and that feels great,' she continued.

item.title: 'Our prayers were answered!' Radio host Emily Jade O'Keeffe gives birth to a 'miracle' baby boy after undergoing 32 rounds of IVF
item.description: Gold Coast radio host Emily Jade O'Keeffe has given birth to a healthy baby boy after undergoing 32 rounds of IVF.
item.content:encoded:
Gold Coast radio host Emily Jade O'Keeffe has given birth to a healthy baby boy after undergoing 32 rounds of IVF.

The Hot Tomato breakfast presenter, 41, and her husband Gerard Murtagh welcomed Teddy James into the world on Monday, a week before the due date.

Emily offered fans a glimpse of the newborn via Instagram on Tuesday, posting a sweet video of her seven-year-old daughter Millie cradling Teddy in her arms.

Holding her new brother in her arms, Millie says to the camera: 'Everybody this is TJ, Teddy James Murtagh, and I love him. He's the love of my life.'

She adds to her mother: 'He's the second best thing of my life - the first best thing was seeing you.

'And I prayed for it for other people's birthdays, for Easter, for my birthday, for Christmas for every year of month - even Australia Day. Even Halloween.'

Millie then observes that Teddy is 'very calm', adding that the cutest thing about him is 'him sneezing'.

Emily captioned the heartwarming clip: 'Everybody, meet Teddy James as introduced to the world by big sister Millie Valentine. 

'She is half devastated she has to go to school today after spending the day soaking him up yesterday and doesn't want to leave him, and half over the moon that she has the best news to share with her little friends.'

She concluded: 'Her prayers were answered in Teddy and she prayed on all the holiest of days. Seeing them together has been the highlight of our lives.' 

Teddy was born at Pindara Private Hospital, weighing around 4kg and measuring 53cm long.

Emily Jade described her son as a 'big bopper' when she phoned in to the 102.9 Hot Tomato breakfast radio show just hours after the birth. 

'It hurt. I don't want to do that again,' she said. 'I tell you what, half an hour in I was like, "You can get the hell out of me, please".'

Emily Jade revealed that she was a week shy of her due date, but she and husband Gerard helped the process along with some alone time on Sunday evening.

'We decided to try and maybe bring the baby on, and it worked!' she laughed.

The presenter announced her pregnancy in January, writing on Instagram: 'Our miracle Millie is about to be joined by another hard-earned miracle in June 2018.

'Five years, 260 weeks, 1,825 days, 2.3 million minutes. That's how long and desperately we have tried for this little life.'

She lost 32 embryos and suffered a heartbreaking miscarriage before bringing Teddy into the world. 

Emily Jade and Gerard had also tried for two years before she fell pregnant with firstborn Millie.
item.dc:abstract: Gold Coast radio host Emily Jade O'Keeffe has given birth to a healthy baby boy after undergoing 32 rounds of IVF. The Hot Tomato breakfast presenter, 41, and her husband Gerard Murtagh welcomed Teddy James into the world on Monday, a week before the due date. Emily offered fans a glimpse of the newborn via Instagram on Tuesday, posting a sweet video of her seven-year-old daughter Millie cradling Teddy in her arms.
item.dc:creator: Ekin Karasin
item.mi:shortTitle: Emily Jade O'Keeffe gives birth to baby boy after 32 rounds of IVF

item.title: GLOW season two: The ladies of wrestling deal with racism, sexism and newfound fame in Netflix trailer
item.description: Ruth looks to be dealing with sexual harassment, as she's seen looking uncomfortable while being manhandled by an executive, then running away from the scene looking upset.
item.content:encoded:
A trailer for GLOW's second season was released by Netflix on Monday, showing the Gorgeous Ladies of Wrestling grappling with issues ranging from newfound fame to sexual harassment to the promotion's gimmicks that played upon racial stereotypes.

'Ladies, exciting stuff, feels a little different around here,' promoter Sam Sylvia (Marc Maron) announces to the female wrestlers, who are sitting on bleachers.

'I'm excited, aren't you excited?' Ruth Wilder (Alison Brie) tells Maron in the preview, which was underscored to Bonnie Tyler's Holding Out for a Hero amid a montage of clips illustrating the promotion's growth - and growing pains.

Scroll below for video 

Ruth looked to be on shaky ground with Debbie Eagan (Betty Gilpin), who's involved in a complicated divorce as the second season rolls in. Ruth also looks to be dealing with sexual harassment, as she's seen appearing uncomfortable while being manhandled by an executive, then running away from the scene looking upset.

Her rejection of the exec appeared to endanger the promotion's future, as its TV time-slot was in jeopardy of being given to an (unnamed) men's wrestling promotion.

A defiant Sylvia - seen snorting cocaine and smashing someone's car window - said, 'I say we do whatever the hell we want to do: Set the weirdos free and see what happens!'

Bash (Chris Lowell) said: 'I know this is going to be hard but I believe in miracles, and we are going to make this miracle happen.'

WARNING: Language in trailer is explicit  

GLOW's politically-incorrect gimmicks catering to its 1980s audience were also touched upon, as Arthie Premkumar (Sunita Mani) appraised the military costume -  complete with a bullet belt - that she wore as Beirut the Mad Bomber.

'My costume still smells like beer - and racism,' she said.

In another sequence, Tammé Dawson's (Kia Stevens, who was wrestled professionally under the names Awesome Kong and Kharma) had to explain to her college student son why she wasn't offended when a fan came up complimenting her wrestling alter-ego, named Welfare Queen.

Dawson explained to her son, 'I'm not the only offensive character - everyone's offensive!'

The second season of GLOW, which was created by Liz Flahive and Carly Mensch, begins streaming June 29 on Netflix.

'Ladies, exciting stuff, feels a little different around here,' promoter Sam Sylvia (Marc Maron) announces to the female wrestlers, who are sitting on bleachers. 'I'm excited, aren't you excited?' Ruth Wilder (Alison Brie) tells Maron in the preview, which was underscored to Bonnie Tyler's Holding Out for a Hero amid a montage of clips illustrating the promotion's growth - and growing pains.
item.dc:creator: Heather Waugh
item.mi:shortTitle: GLOW ladies deal with big issues in second season trailer

item.title: Samira Wiley flaunts chest in plunging LBD while with wife Lauren Morelli at Trevor Project soiree
item.description: As a prominent LGBTQ actress, Samira Wiley wasn't missing Trevor Project's TrevorLive event in New York Monday.
item.content:encoded:
As a prominent LGBTQ actress, Samira Wiley wasn't missing Trevor Project's TrevorLive event in New York Monday.

The Orange Is The New Black talent, 31, simply stunned on the red carpet at Cipriani Wall Street, where she brought wide Lauren Morelli as her date.

At the event for The Handmaid's Tale actress sizzled in a strapless black number which dipped low to reveal nearly all of her alluring cleavage.

Perfectly tailored to her figure, Samira's dress only covered her chest with slinky straps while hugging her hips and legs like a glove.

The Washington DC native kept her hair in her signature crop while glamming things up with a bit of ruby lip tint. 

Besides Samira, her wife and OITNB writer Lauren dazzled in a short sequined look with high collar and belled sleeves.

She brushed her hair back elegantly while amping up the drama with smokey eyes.

Also there was fellow OITNB styar Natasha Lyonne, who charmed in a thigh-skimming black dress with sheer top revealing a cone-bra beneath.

Her wild curls were a particularly striking auburn and she accessorized with a bejeweled drawstring bag, hoop earrings, and glittering bangles.

Writer/actress/wonder Lena Waithe was typically handsome in a faded blue suit with chain-link patterned blouse below.

The history-making Emmy winner added small stud earrings and dark sneakers as a finishing touch. 

Rita Ora stormed the orange carpet in a powder blue Miu Miu set with scalloped edges. 

The RIP singer asymmetrical crop top was just short enough to flash a hint of her abs with a slim maxi skirt below.

Her hair appeared a lush coral shade, which she first debuted last week.  

The night was particularly memorable for Brian Bristow and his partner Malcom Gage, who got down on one knee to propose while on the orange carpet.

Bristow gave his beau a resounding 'Yes!' before the couple shared a passionate and loving kiss in celebration.

Actress MJ Rodriguez wowed in a ribbed navy gown which was perfectly fit to her figure.

Continuing the glamour, the Pose actress added smokey eyeshadow, pink lips and cascading curls. 

Olympic skater Adam Rippon was handsome in a black patterned suit with metallic shoes.

The athlete had to honor of hosting the event along with Olympic skier Gus Kenworthy. 

Special guests included Dominic Barton, who was being given the 20/20 Award, Lena Waithe, earning the Hero Award and Greg Berlanti, Hero Award Honoree.

TrevorLIVE is the 'signature semi-annual fundraising event hosted by The Trevor Project,' an organization that focuses on suicide prevention among LGBTQ youth.

'TrevorLIVE seeks to offer a celebratory night of impact and awareness for the suicide prevention resources and crisis intervention services offered by The Trevor Project,' according to the event website.
item.dc:abstract: As a prominent LGBTQ actress, Samira Wiley wasn't missing Trevor Project's TrevorLive event in New York Monday. The Orange Is The New Black talent, 31, simply stunned on the red carpet at Cipriani Wall Street, where she brought wide Lauren Morelli as her date, sizzling in a strapless black number.
item.dc:creator: Kelby Vera

item.title: Lupita Nyong'o is summer chic in breezy yellow gown as she arrives at star-studded Ace Awards
item.description: She rocks every red carpet with her alluring style. And Lupita Nyong'o proved on point as she commanded attention in a breezy frock for the Ace Awards in New York City on Monday.
item.content:encoded:
She rocks every red carpet with her alluring style.

And Lupita Nyong'o proved on point as she commanded attention in a breezy frock for the Ace Awards in New York City on Monday.

The 35-year-old stunner was summer ready in the bright yellow couture as she turned heads at the event celebrating the designers, brands, and leaders in the fashion accessories industry.

Daring to impress, the Black Panther star showcased her delicate decolletage in the dress that boasted a plunging neckline.

The ethereal fabric was covered in adorable parrot graphics as a light blue belt cinched her lithe waist. 

Her trademark raven tresses were left short and in braids as she let her natural beauty shine with an impressive pink-hued makeup palette.

As accessories were the star of the show, Lupita carried a pink bejeweled pineapple clutch and a pair of dangling charm earrings.

After her Oscar winning role in 12 Years A Slave, Lupita enjoyed a rise in her fashion and beauty endorsements including the face of Lancome.

She told In Style: '[Beauty] is about what brings you joy. That's it, really. 'Does this bring me joy?' If the answer is yes, then I'm pretty sure it makes you feel beautiful.'

The Oscar winner described her first experience with foundation as 'awful'.

'When I was about 18, my mother let my aunt give me a makeover,' she said. 'She had lighter skin than me and didn't have my foundation shade. I actually don't remember my shade existing, or at least I didn't see it. 

'She applied this lighter foundation to my face and just caked it on. I cried. I was expecting the kind of makeover you see in the movies, but it was far from that.'

Growing up, Lupita attended an all-boys school with a few female students. She rebelled against a rule saying girls were not allowed to wear make-up. 

'This is a school with 700 boys and a handful of girls. I was angry that the powers that be were trying to basically oppress and control the small female population,' she lamented.

'It infuriated me to the point that I started a petition. I said to myself, "Look, if a woman wants to wear make-up to school to feel confident in an environment where she's a minority, why not?" 

'It doesn't actually change whether or not she's able to take in the information being given to her in the classroom.'  

Meanwhile, the stars were out at the annual fete including Tracee Ellis Ross who was an award recipient.

Cheryl Hines and Lorraine Bracco brought all the glamour.

And Hugh Sheridan cut a dapper figure in a classic tuxedo.
item.dc:abstract: She rocks every red carpet with her alluring style. And Lupita Nyong'o proved on point as she commanded attention in a breezy frock for the Ace Awards in New York City on Monday. The 35-year-old stunner was summer ready in the bright yellow couture as she turned heads at the event celebrating the designers, brands, influencers and leaders in the fashion accessories industry.
item.dc:creator: Terry Zeller

item.title: Madison Beer displays fit figure in little red floral print dress during lunch date with Zack Bia
item.description: The 19-year-old singer displayed her fit figure in a little red dress on Monday while out with boyfriend Zack Bia in Beverly Hills, California.
item.content:encoded:
Madison Beer displayed her fit figure in a little red dress on Monday while out with boyfriend Zack Bia in Beverly Hills, California.

The 19-year-old singer stepped out in a red floral print romper for her lunch date with Zack at Il Pastaio restaurant.

Madison teamed her cute dress with black Converse high-top sneakers and completed her ensemble with a matching Chanel bag. 

She accessorized with large hoop earrings, a watch, bracelets, necklace and sunglasses.

Zack kept it casual in a black sweatshirt and black trousers. 

He sported black sneakers and accessorized with funky black sunglasses.

Madison last month wrapped up her international As She Pleases Tour after embarking on the 30-city tour in March.

She released her first studio EP titled As She Pleases in February after recording over a three-year period.

Madison rose to fame after Canadian pop star tweeted a link to a video of her singing.

The Say It To My Face singer has been dating Zack since at least November. 

She was previously romantically linked to Brooklyn Beckham and musician Jack Gilinsky.

Madison started posting videos of herself singing covers on YouTube in early 2012 and Justin tweeted a link to her cover of At Last by Etta James.

Justin signed to Island Records in 2008 and personally delivered Madison to the same label.

item.title: Jodie Foster beams in robes as she accepts honorary degree from American Film Institute
item.description: The American Film Institute conferred an honorary degree on her this Monday. And Jodie Foster beamed as she accepted the bauble, rising to the lectern to give a speech for the AFI.
item.content:encoded:
The American Film Institute conferred an honorary degree on her this Monday.

And Jodie Foster beamed as she accepted the bauble, rising to the lectern to give a speech at the AFI's Conservatory Commencement Ceremony.

The 55-year-old Oscar-winner was decked out in graduation robes for the occasion, which was held at the iconic TCL Chinese Theatre in Hollywood.

Jodie, who rose to fame as a child star and whom the deranged John Hinckley Jr. shot Ronald Reagan to try to impress, glowed as the cameras snapped her.

She posed in front of a red curtain at the ceremony, both solo and with the robes-clad movie editor Matt Chesse, her old collaborator.

Matt was the editor of Money Monster, a Wall Street thriller directed by Jodie and starring a formidable cast including George Clooney and Julia Roberts.

Jodie, who married photographer and filmmaker Alexandra Hedison in 2014, planted a kiss on the grinning Matt's cheek as they posed in front of the red curtain.

Matt earned his one Oscar nomination for editing the J.M. Barrie biopic Finding Neverland, whilst Jodie has been nominated four times, winning twice.

One of her wins was for The Silence Of The Lambs, which is among only three films to have won the top five Oscars - for directing, writing, its two lead performances and the most prestigious award, Best Picture.

The other was for the 1988 film The Accused, in which she plays a gang-rape victim who works with a district attorney to try and get justice.

According to The Hollywood Reporter, Jodie was not the only recipient of an AFI honorary degree Monday - one also went to production designer Dean Tavoularis.

Dean has been nominated for five Oscars - four of which were for films directed by Francis Ford Coppola - and won in 1975 for his work on The Godfather Part II.

The 55-year-old Oscar-winner was decked out in graduation robes for the occasion, which was held at the iconic TCL Chinese Theatre in Hollywood.

item.title: Putting on a show! Ladies' man Hugh Sheridan cuts a dapper figure in a tailored suit as he performs at an awards ceremony in New York City
item.description: He's the hunky actor and singer who is making waves in Hollywood, and has been previously linked to pop songstress Delta Goodrem.
item.content:encoded:
He's the Australian actor and singer who is making waves in Hollywood.

And Hugh Sheridan put on quite the show at the 22nd annual Accessories Council ACE Awards in New York City on Monday.

The 32-year-old heartthrob, who looked dapper in a tailored suit, belted out lyrics in front of a star-studded audience.

Hugh appeared every inch the Hollywood star in a white shirt and double-breasted navy suit jacket with black lapels.

The Adelaide-born entertainer completed the look with slim-fit trousers, black patent dress shoes and a statement bow tie.

Hugh took to the stage in front of a celebrity-packed audience, including such luminaries as US music producer Quincy Jones.

It's been a busy couple of years for Hugh, who left behind his acting career in Australia to chase his musical dreams in America.

He has worked hard to establish himself as a singer in California, after rising to fame on TV series Packed to the Rafters in the late 2000s.

Meanwhile, his enigmatic personal life has attracted plenty of attention.

Last year, Hugh and Delta Goodrem were the subject of persistent, but unconfirmed, romance rumours.

They appeared to enjoy teasing fans and the media with cosy Instagram snaps, but it is believed they never officially dated.

In January, a 'source' told Woman's Day that while they gave a relationship a good shot, they realised they're better off as friends.

'They love each other immensely and did everything they could to make it work but decided they're better off friends,' the insider claimed.

Woman's Day suggested an Instagram post from Hugh's account on New Year's Eve was proof that he was feeling 'reflective'.

The post stated, in part: 'It wasn't the worst year, not the best but not the worst.'

item.title: Mila Kunis keeps it casual in grey sweats as she stops by Walgreens in Los Angeles
item.description: She recently admitted having kids had made her more confident after examining what was really important in life. And Mila Kunis was oozing with assertiveness when she stepped out in sweats
item.content:encoded:
She recently admitted having kids had made her more confident after examining what was really important in life. 

And Mila Kunis was oozing with assertiveness when she stepped out in sweats for a trip to Walgreens in Los Angeles on Monday. 

The 34-year-old kept a low profile with shades on and appeared to be solo. 

Scroll down for video  

Mila opted for a black top underneath the cropped sweater.

She paired her look with matching tracksuit pants and kept comfortable with a pair of white Converse sneakers.

The Bad Mom's actress appeared to be makeup free for the errands run. 

Mila's dark locks were styled back into a high pony-tail. 

At one point she was seen multitasking while on the phone as she walked back to her car. 

Speaking at the Variety Path to Parity Women's Summit last week, the wife of Ashton Kutcher, 40, revealed that she struggled with insecurities prior to having kids. 

The mom to daughter Wyatt, three, and Dimitri, 16-months, admitted that having kids gave her perspective and confidence to advocate for herself and other women after she re-examined what really mattered in life.

'When I became a mom, so many things that I used to be insecure about and concerned myself with, no longer mattered. The ability to say no, had a purpose,' she detailed to Jenelle Riley.

'I had better things to concern myself with than some stranger's opinion of whether or not I was a bitch.' 

After dating for a few years, Mila married her former That 70's Show costar Ashton Kutcher on July 4, 2015.

item.title: Sun's out, buns out! Natalie Roser strips down into a lacy G-string as she flaunts her pert derriere during a behind-the-scenes photo shoot
item.description: Posing for a cheeky behind-the-scenes snap, the stunner donned a see-through white matching lingerie set.
item.content:encoded:
Natalie Roser established herself on the modelling scene at the youthful age of 13.

And on Tuesday, the blonde beauty, 28, proved her natural talent when she stripped down to a lacy G-string and flaunted her pert derriere during a photo shoot.

Posing for a cheeky behind-the-scenes snap, the stunner donned a see-through white matching lingerie set.

With her blonde locks pulled back into a half-up ponytail, she looked flawless.

'Last week's golden hour,' the bombshell captioned the snap.

Noting the makeshift changing room tent in the backdrop of the picture, she added: 'Featuring the photo shoot change tent.'

While Natalie oozes an enviable amount of self confidence, she recently admitted that she has 'always had doubts' about her physique.

Gracing the cover of Women's Health magazine in January, she revealed she's learnt to love her figure, despite facing challenges over the years.

'My body confidence is good now, but there have always been doubts – if you don't get a job, you think, 'Is it because my measurements are bigger than the girl who did?' Natalie told the publication. 

'Little things play on your mind. But I learnt pretty quickly that it's not necessarily me; it's about what the client is looking for to represent their brand.

'Once I realised that perhaps I just didn't fit the bikinis or clothes the way they wanted, I relaxed and started to take care of myself for me.'

Posing for a cheeky behind-the-scenes snap, the stunner donned a see-through white matching lingerie set.

item.title: Scarlet woman! Busty MAFS star Davina Rankin flaunts her ample cleavage in a red jumpsuit as she enjoys a cheeky wine tour on her girls' trip to America
item.description: She's currently enjoying a girls' trip to America and it seems Davina Rankin is making the most of her time overseas.
item.content:encoded:
She's currently enjoying a girls' trip in America and it seems Davina Rankin is making the most of her time overseas.

On Tuesday, the Married At First Sight star took to Instagram share a wine tour in Oregon with her fans. 

The busty brunette was dolled up for the occasion wearing a red jumpsuit - and joked about being a little 'tipsy.'

Scroll down for video 

'I swear I'm only squinty (sic) because the suns in my face... not because this is the third stop on our wine tour,' Davina joked in her Instagram caption.

In the snap, Davina was seen beaming and had her long dark locks out and straightened over her shoulders.

She showcased a golden tan and wore glamorous makeup, including a smokey eye.

For the tour, she kept comfortable in a pair of chic Gucci sneakers.

In a clip shared to her Instagram story, Davina was seen singing with her friend and fellow tourists as they drove around the vineyards in a bus.

She also shared a funny meme, which read: 'Me at any wine tasting - I'm detecting hints of a blackout.' 

Before enjoying the wine tour, Davina said she was 'finally not hungover anymore' and was ready to enjoy the big day. 

Davina jetted to Los Angeles over the weekend and has also been spending time at the iconic Chateau Marmont. 

And it seems Davina's new boyfriend Jaxon Manuel is missing his gorgeous girlfriend, writing on Instagram 'Come home already'. 

Last week, Davina sparked engagement rumours when she was spotted walking through Brisbane Airport with a diamond ring on her left hand. 

However Davina confirmed to Daily Mail Australia that it is not an engagement ring.  

'I've had that ring and worn it since I was 18. It was a gift to myself when I opened my personal training studio,' she explained.

'Trust me, I'd be screaming it from the rooftops if it was a new sparkler from my honey!'
item.dc:abstract: She's currently enjoying a girls' trip to America and it seems Davina Rankin is making the most of her time overseas. On Tuesday, the Married At First Sight star took to Instagram to reveal she is on a wine tour in Oregon. The busty brunette was dolled up for the occasion wearing a red jumpsuit - and joked about being a little 'tipsy.'

item.title: 'It's so full on!' Sophie Monk admits she has watched the raunchy Love Island scenes viewers DIDN'T see on TV... and reveals the three frisky couples that have had sex
item.description: The presenter, 38, said the contestants' sex scenes are 'very full-on' and joked that she watches them 'all the time', during an appearance on the Kyle and Jackie O show.
item.content:encoded:
Speculation has been rife over which couples are getting hot and heavy in the Love Island villa.

But Sophie Monk appeared to set the record straight when she claimed that three couples have gone all the way: Tayla and Grant, Cassidy and Grant and Erin and Eden.

During an appearance on the The Kyle and Jackie O Show on Tuesday, the 38-year-old said the contestants' sex scenes are 'very full-on' and joked that she watches them 'all the time'.

Monday night's evictee Natasha Webster kicked off the raunchy radio discussion by insisting that only Erin and Eden have had sex.

Sophie disagreed, however, saying: 'I'm assuming three couples have.'

Jackie 'O' Henderson clarified that Sophie was referring to Erin and Eden and current couple Tayla and Grant, before asking if she also meant Grant and his ex Cassidy. 

Alluding to Cassidy, Sophie replied: 'Well, why do you think one girl was so upset? Maybe. I don't know for sure.'

Sophie was referring to the moment Cassidy broke down in tears while admitting she regretted spending the night with Grant in the first week.

'You know when you can tell with girls? If they get really, really upset it's usually because they've had sex,' Sophie added.

Appearing doubtful, KIIS FM host Kyle Sandilands interjected: 'I just thought that maybe they'd [Cassidy and Grant] had a fiddle around.'

But Jackie agreed with Sophie, saying: 'I reckon you're right. I picked up on that - that they'd had sex. She was so mortified the next day. I think something else happened.'

Sophie added that the contestants were often naked around the villa, joking that she often replays footage to watch them.

'I go back and watch them all the time!' she joked. 'It's so full-on. [The producers] see basically everything. But they cut it very well.'
item.dc:abstract: Speculation has been rife over which couples are getting hot and heavy in the Love Island villa. But Sophie Monk appeared to set the record straight when she claimed that three couples have gone all the way: Tayla and Grant, Cassidy and Grant and Erin and Eden. During an appearance on the The Kyle and Jackie O Show on Tuesday, the 38-year-old said the contestants' sex scenes are 'very full-on' and joked that she watches them 'all the time'.

item.title: Amy Schumer reveals she's 'a lot happier' now she's 'stopped focusing' on how she looks
item.description: 'I rarely think about how I look anymore. Honestly, it's so freeing and you get a lot more done and are a lot happier,' she told former E! host Catt Sadler in an interview for her new website thecattwalk.com .
item.content:encoded:
She recently starred in the big screen comedy I Feel Pretty that explored and poked fun at how women's feelings about their looks determine their happiness levels.

And on Monday, Amy Schumer revealed that she is 'a lot happier' after making a decision not to focus so much any more on the way she looks.

'I rarely think about how I look anymore. Honestly, it's so freeing and you get a lot more done and are a lot happier,' she told former E! host Catt Sadler in an interview for her new website thecattwalk.com.

Amy, 37, went on:  'You need to do the work to actually love the person you are. Also, we are all gonna die, don't sweat the little dumb stuff. None of it matters.'

On Sunday night, the actress and comedienne had made her first red carpet appearance with new husband Chris Fischer. 

'He's a great partner,' she explained to Sadler. 'We don't complete each other, we compliment and support each other.'

'He makes me laugh and feel supported and has his own life going on. I love that weirdo,' she said.  

She and the chef, 38, tied the knot in February after a whirlwind romance.  

While she doesn't have any movie projects lined up in the near future, the Inside Amy Schumer star is working on a new clothing line with her stylist Leesa Evans.

And she also continues to be actively involved in the movement for gun control through EveryTownForGunSafety.org.
item.dc:abstract: She recently starred in the big screen comedy I Feel Pretty that explored and poked fun at how women's feelings about their looks determine their happiness levels. And on Monday, Amy Schumer revealed that she is 'a lot happier' after making a decision not to focus so much any more on the way she looks. 'I rarely think about how I look anymore. Honestly, it's so freeing and you get a lot more done and are a lot happier,' she told former E! host Catt Sadler in an interview for her new website thecattwalk.com .

item.title: The naked chef! My Kitchen Rules' Pete Evans strips off and lets it all hang out while going skinny dipping
item.description: 'Paleo' Pete Evans is certainly not afraid to let it all hang out - literally.
item.content:encoded:
'Paleo' Pete Evans is certainly not afraid to let it all hang out - literally.

On Tuesday, the My Kitchen Rules judge posted of a video of himself on Instagram dropping his towel and plunging off a boat into a river.

Braving freezing winter temperatures, the stark naked chef captioned the video: 'Jumping into this week raw and ready for all that unfolds.'

Scroll down for video 

Footage of the caper leaves little to the imagination, as the 45-year-old's private parts can be seen jostling about in a startling silhouette.

One follower cheekily wrote: 'Can't unsee the dangly bits.'

There was no word from Pete on how his body reacted to the freezing water, but judging by his buff appearance, he no doubt found the dip refreshing.

Recently, Pete promised he would share a nude photo of himself as proof of his all-natural tan, after being called 'orange' on The Sunday Project.

And true to his word, the Paleo-peddling star soon shared a bizarre snap of himself showing his bottom and tan lines.

Taking to Instagram, Pete claimed he had wanted to show everything - but feared breaking Instagram's rules on nudity.

'Well I went the full monty, but Instagram might have an issue with some low hanging fruit,' Pete joked in the caption.

'So I went for a more conservative approach with this pic instead. I adore the sun and don't use fake tan.'

'And yes that is a natural surfing tan from wearing board shorts.' 

Pete was responding to comments made by The Sunday Project's Tommy Little, who accused him of being 'into fake tan and teeth-whitening'.

'You know what I love about Pete Evans' diet? He says this is what other species are into,' Tommy began.

'I don't reckon other species are into fake tan and teeth whitening - so maybe you should lay off that as well, Pete?'

item.title: Abs-solutely incredible! Bikini model Pia Muehlenbeck proves herself the ultimate glamazon as she flaunts her golden curves and ample bust in a skimpy black bikini
item.description: Pia Muehlenbeck proved herself the ultimate glamazon when she flaunted her golden curves in a sizzling bikini snap on Tuesday.
item.content:encoded:
She's the busty beauty who has managed to amass two million followers on social media thanks to her scantily-clad snaps. 

And social media sensation Pia Muehlenbeck, 26, proved why she turns plenty of heads when she shared another sizzling image on Tuesday.

Taking to Instagram, the raven-haired beauty was the ultimate glamazon as she flaunted her golden curves and ample bust in a skimpy black bikini.  

Scroll down to video  

Appearing to miss the warmer summer weather, the SLINKII bikini founder basked in the sun while walking along the sand of a tropical beach.  

The model added a touch of glamour to the barely-there bikini, accessorising with a pair of statement gold earrings and a silver ring. 

The glamour model recently showed off her dramatic transformation during a photo shoot with health blogger Steph Claire Smith, earlier this month.

The 26-year-old's nose looked noticeably thinner in the candid snaps, with her face heavily contoured by the application of make-up. 

Also on display was her defined brows and plump pout which she enhanced with a vibrant red lipstick.  

In September, the former Gold Coast lawyer-turned-travel blogger admitted to using apps Snapseed, Vsco and Enlight to alter and enhance her appearance online.   

Pia regularly shares scantily-clad selfies with her multi-million followers, often using her online presence to plug products such as protein powder.

The brunette beauty gives credit to her fiancé Kane Vato, who had helped launch and maintain her lucrative online profile.   

Last year, leading cosmetic surgeon Dr Jeremy Hunt weighed in on Pia's surgery rumours and gave his expert opinion on what work she may have had done.

Speaking exclusively to Daily Mail Australia, he said: 'Her appearance is highly suggestive of rhinoplasty, as the nasal bones in the upper part of the nose are narrowed.'

Dr Hunt also revealed that Pia appears to have had lip fillers in both the upper and lower lip, both of which look fuller compared to older photos.
item.dc:abstract: She's the busty beauty who has managed to amass two million followers on social media with her scantily-dressed snaps. And social media sensation Pia Muehlenbeck, 26, proved why she turns plenty of heads when she shared a sizzling snap on Tuesday. Taking to Instagram, the raven haired beauty was the ultimate glamazon as she flaunted her golden curves and ample busty in a skimpy black bikini.
