item.title: Look away now, Chris! Hemsworth's wife Elsa Pataky, 41, passionately kisses Brazilian actor Marco Pigossi while filming scenes for an upcoming Netflix series in Australia
item.description: Having the freedom to act out romantic scenarios for a film or TV show must surely be one of the perks of a Hollywood marriage.
item.content:encoded:
Having the freedom to act out romantic scenarios for a film or TV show must surely be one of the perks of a Hollywood marriage.

And Elsa Pataky certainly appeared to be enjoying herself while filming a passionate kissing scene in Queensland, Australia late last month.

The Spanish actress, who is in a committed relationship with Chris Hemsworth, was seen smooching Brazilian heartthrob Marco Pigossi at the beach.

Scroll down for video 

Elsa, 41, and Marco, 29, appear to play young lovers in the upcoming 10-part Netflix show Tidelands. 

In a series of on-set photos, the mother-of-three is shown leaping into her co-star's muscular arms before sharing a lingering kiss.

She also is seen strolling down the beach in a flowing dress and silk cloak as the wind blows through her hair.

In-between the steamy scenes, Elsa and Marco appeared to share a laugh together and also take direction from a crew member.

While Marco is certainly a sight to behold, he can't possibly compare to Elsa's real-life leading man, Chris Hemsworth.

The genetically-blessed pair married in late 2010 and share three children: daughter India, six, and twin sons Sasha and Tristan, four.

The couple, who were previously based in Los Angeles, now enjoy a blissfully relaxed life in Byron Bay on Australia's east coast.

Last year, Chris and Elsa celebrated a relationship milestone: starring in their first movie together.

They played a married couple in war drama 12 Strong, and the Aussie actor joked that filming 'was like a little holiday away from the kids'.

'We left the kids with their grandparents and went off for a few weeks and shot together,' he said on Good Morning America in January.

'We've been rehearsing that relationship and that on-screen chemistry for seven years so if we didn't have chemistry, we would've been in trouble.'

Tidelands is the first Australian-made Netflix Original Series and will be released globally across the streaming platform.
item.dc:abstract: Having the freedom to act out romantic scenarios for a film or TV show must surely be one of the perks of a Hollywood marriage. And Elsa Pataky (left) certainly appeared to be enjoying herself while filming a passionate kissing scene in Queensland, Australia late last month. The Spanish actress, who is in a committed relationship with Chris Hemsworth (inset left), was seen smooching Brazilian heartthrob Marco Pigossi (right, inset right) at the beach. Elsa, 41, and Marco, 29, appear to play young lovers in the upcoming 10-part series Tidelands, the first Australian-made project for streaming service Netflix. In a series of on-set photos, the mother-of-three is shown leaping into her co-star's muscular arms before sharing a lingering kiss. In-between the steamy scenes, Elsa and Marco also appeared to share a laugh together and take direction from crew members. While Marco is certainly a sight to behold, he can't possibly compare to Elsa's real-life leading man, Chris Hemsworth, whom she married in 2010 and shares three children with.

item.title: Christina Aguilera treats LA Pride to surprise performance as Laverne Cox parties at 1 OAK
item.description: Late in the drag show at Sunday night's LA Pride Music Festival, the audience were treated to an unannounced performance by none other than Christina Aguilera herself.
item.content:encoded:
Late in the drag show at Sunday night's LA Pride Music Festival, the audience were treated to an unannounced performance by Christina Aguilera herself.

The 37-year-old pop diva belted her new song Accelerate (feat. Ty Dolla $ign & 2Chainz) - unveiling a never-before-heard dance remix of it, Billboard reported.

Playing up her zaftig legs in a black miniskirt and a matching pair of leather boots, Christina cut an eye-popping figure in a leopard-print jacket.

Her wrap featured puffed-out sleeves with cinched-in cuffs, as well as an asymmetric cape dribbling down at the back almost to the floor.

Caking her face in an extravagant makeup job including a slick of black lipstick, the Beautiful singer complemented her jacket with leopard-print-rimmed shades.

The Burlesque star swept her signature platinum blonde hair back into a bun, flinging her hands into the air as she delivered her barnstorming performance.

She called the remix 'just for Pride, especially for you guys,' in the presence of drag queens including RuPaul's Drag Race stars Sonique and Morgan McMichaels.

Also there was Farrah Moan, a Drag Race veteran who has impersonated Christina - and once got a surprise visit from the genuine article on RuPaul's show.

Accelerate, which dropped last month and is the lead single of her upcoming album Liberation, cracked the top 10 on the Promusicae chart in Spain.

Liberation is due for release this Friday and is the Etta James super-fan''s sixth studio album overall - her first since the release of Lotus in 2012.

Meanwhile, the same night Christina hit the stage at the LA Pride Music Festival, Laverne Cox was over at the Sunset Blvd outpost of New York club 1 OAK.

The transgender Orange Is The New Back actress was there for the Sunset Tea LA Pride closing party produced by Paul Nicholls, Justin David and Jake Resnicow.

She showed off her legs in a sheer leaf-patterned black dress that eventually detached from its lower half to form a bodysuit.

Laverne flung her blonde hair over her right shoulder, allowing for a glimpse at the gleaming hoop earring she wore at the left side.

The Mobile-born Emmy nominee balanced on a pair of open-toed black stilettos, revealing her scarlet-painted toenails as she made her way about.
item.dc:abstract: Late in the drag show at Sunday night's LA Pride Music Festival, the audience were treated to an unannounced performance by Christina Aguilera herself. The 37-year-old pop diva belted her new song Accelerate (feat. Ty Dolla $ign & 2Chainz) - unveiling a never-before-heard dance remix of it, Billboard reported. Playing her zaftig legs in a black miniskirt and a matching pair of leather boots, Christina cut an eye-popping figure in a leopard-print jacket.

item.title: 'It was like Face/Off the movie': Johnny Ruffo reveals gruesome details of the brain surgery that left him with 27 staples as he continues to battle life-threatening cancer
item.description: The 30-year-old actor is still recovering from an aggressive form of brain canc.
item.content:encoded:
Former Home And Away star Johnny Ruffo has revealed gruesome details of the emergency brain surgery he underwent at Sydney's Royal Prince Alfred Hospital last year, to remove a life-threatening tumour.

The 30-year-old actor is still recovering from an aggressive form of brain cancer.

During an interview with KIIS FM's Kyle and Jackie 'O' on Tuesday, Johnny likened the surgery to the 1997 thriller 'Face/Off.' 

'It was like Face/OFF the movie,' Johnny told the radio hosts.

Johnny was referencing the 90s action flick starring John Travolta, in which the actor's character undergoes a full face transplant. 

But Johnny also told the hosts he 'likes' his scar and is proud of it, regularly making a point of showing it off.

'I like it! (the scar). You know I go to the hairdresser and I say, can you make sure you cut along the scar...make it (the style) so you can see it (the scar),' he said.

'I went through a lot of crap to get this scar.' 

Earlier in the interview, Johnny gave fans an update on his recovery from the life-threatening cancer.

'I still have it (Brain Cancer) and I'm still doing chemotherapy,' he told the Sydney hosts. 

Back in February, Johnny appeared on The Morning Show  and said things were looking up. 

'I've got a little way to go now but everything's looking good and is on the mend,' he revealed. 

'So hopefully it all stays the same way and I'll be back on the horse and causing more trouble.'   

It was in August last year when Johnny first announced that he had undergone surgery at Sydney's Royal Prince Alfred Hospital to remove a brain tumor.

He had 95 per cent of the tumor removed and was given 27 staples in his head - taking to Instagram to reveal a glimpse at the aftermath of the operation.

'So I have the news. It was a bit of a shock and I've got an interesting journey ahead and a bit of a battle. I am starting aggressive treatment for the next few months to fight the diagnosis of brain cancer. Please stay positive for me and ill try to update you guys on my progress,' he wrote online at the time. 

He finished his radiotherapy treatment at Chris O'Brien's Life House in October, but admitted at the time he still had a long road ahead.
item.dc:abstract: Former Home And Away star Johnny Ruffo has revealed gruesome details of the emergency brain surgery he underwent at Sydney's Royal Prince Alfred Hospital last year to remove a life-threatening tumour. The 30-year-old actor is still recovering from an aggressive form of brain cancer. During an interview with KIIS FM's Kyle and Jackie 'O' on Tuesday, Johnny likened the surgery to the 1997 thriller 'Face/Off.'

item.title: Superstore's Nico Santos confirms relationship with Survivor's transgender star Zeke Smith
item.description: He plays Mateo Fernando Aquino Liwanag, a gay Filipino Cloud 9 associate in the NBC series Superstore. And it appears as though Nico Santos is no longer looking for love
item.content:encoded:
He plays Mateo Fernando Aquino Liwanag, a gay Filipino Cloud 9 associate in the NBC series Superstore. 

And it appears as though Nico Santos is no longer looking for love.

Taking to Instagram in celebration of Pride Month, the 25-year-old confirmed he was dating transgender Survivor contestant Zeke Smith, 30.

Scroll down for video  

'We're here! We're queer! We're brunching!' he captioned the sweet selfie. 

'Getting some after parade nomnoms with my love. Happy Pride Los Angeles!!! #Pride,' captioned the Crazy Rich Asians star.

But it's not the first time the pair have appeared together. 

Neither star have been shy over the past few weeks when it comes to sharing selfies during their dates. 

It is however unclear how long Nico and Zeke have been dating.

Zeke initially made headlines one year ago when he he was outed as transgender on Survivor by another contestant.  

Following his elimination, he wrote an article for The Hollywood Reporter where he said he felt 'optimistic about his future'.   

His essay also saw him praise the ABC network for their ongoing commitment in letting him tell his own story on his terms.

He also hopes that the way he has been treated marks a turning point in how the transgender community will be treated by the media especially going forward.

'To the trans person who enters the spotlight next, I hope you get it as good as I did. To the person after, I hope you are met with utter indifference,' he said.
item.dc:abstract: He plays Mateo Fernando Aquino Liwanag, a gay Filipino Cloud 9 associate in the NBC series Superstore. And it appears as though Nico Santos is no longer looking for love. Taking to Instagram in celebration of Pride Month, the 25-year-old confirmed he was dating transgender Survivor contestant Zeke Smith, 30.

item.title: John Schneider faces three-day jail sentence for failure to pay spousal support to estranged wife
item.description: The 58-year-old actor was ordered to serve jail time on Monday for failure to pay spousal support to his estranged wife.
item.content:encoded:
John Schneider was ordered to serve jail time on Monday for failure to pay spousal support to his estranged wife.

The 58-year-old actor was sentenced to three days in Los Angeles County Jail for failure to pay delinquent alimony to his ex Elly Castle, according to an article by TMZ.

The Dukes Of Hazzard star could be jailed as early as Tuesday and also was ordered to perform 240 hours of community service. 

Schneider previously was given a March deadline by the court to pay more than $150,000 in delinquent spousal support.

He was ordered by a judge at the time to transfer his property to Elly to pay his spousal support debt and to resolve tax liens against the property. 

Schneider earlier this year was accused in court documents of missing monthly support payments of $18,911 from September 2016 through May 2017.

Castle, also known as Elvira, filed for divorce in December 2014 after 21 years of marriage. 

She cited irreconcilable differences in the divorce filing.

The couple married in 1993 and share three adult children, including Leah and Chasen from Castle's first marriage and their daughter Kris.

Castle in her divorce petition seeking spousal report stated that she was a stay at home mother throughout their marriage and did not have the skills to compete in the modern workforce. 

Schneider at age 17 won the role of Bo Duke on The Dukes Of Hazzard and starred on the CBS show from 1979 to 1985 opposite Tom Wopat as his older cousin Luke Duke.   

He has worked regularly in TV and film since and was a series regular on Smallville and The Mummy before landing a main role in 2013 on The Haves And The Have Nots on the Oprah Winfrey Network.

Schneider also had recurring roles on Dr. Quinn, Medicine Woman and the reboot of 90210.

The Dukes Of Hazzard star could be jailed as early as Tuesday and also was ordered to perform 240 hours of community service.

item.title: Tim Robards and Anna Heinrich 'personalised wedding vows' revealed as blushing bride 'took his breath away' during their lavish ceremony in Italy
item.description: Anna Heinrich reportedly took Tim Robards 'breath away' as she walked down the aisle during their lavish nuptials in Italy last week.
item.content:encoded:
Anna Heinrich reportedly took Tim Robards 'breath away' when she walked down the aisle during their lavish nuptials in Italy, last week.

A guest at the wedding told NW magazine that the Bachelor star's reaction to seeing his bride-to-be walk down the aisle with her father Les, was absolutely priceless. 

According to the insider, the sunset ceremony took place at 6:30pm and 'Anna looked beautiful and totally at ease' as she walked towards her husband-to-be. 

Scroll down for video  

'She took Tim's breath away - he froze the moment he laid eyes on her!' the insider told the publication.

Tim managed to regain his composure before the 'couple exchanged vows they'd written themselves'.

Buff hunk Tim recently revealed he mapped out what he was looking for in a partner before he made his debut on The Bachelor in 2013.

'(I wrote) 50 things I wanted out of the ideal woman. And pretty much all of those things came true (with Anna). Except I wrote brunette,' he explained.

The newlyweds met in 2013 during the first season of The Bachelor Australia.

Anna beat out 24 other single ladies, including new Bachelorette Ali Oetjen, to capture Tim's heart.

The couple moved in together in mid-2014, and are currently based in the Sydney beachside suburb of Bondi.

Tim had proposed with a diamond ring rumoured to cost $173,000 while the couple were on holiday in Kimberley, WA in May 2017. 

Anna told NW that she and Tim plan to have children 'within a year or two'.

She even hinted at a rather unusual name for the firstborn son, saying they had picked out Rocky Robards.

item.title: Slash agrees to pay estranged wife $6.6 million to help resolve pending divorce
item.description: Slash submitted a proposed settlement agreement in an effort to help speed up his divorce from estranged wife Perla Ferrar. It includes $6.6 million and monthly child and spousal support.
item.content:encoded:
Slash is ready to move on with his life.

The legendary Guns N' Roses guitarist submitted a proposed settlement agreement to the court in an effort to help speed up his divorce from estranged wife Perla Ferrar.

According to documents obtained by The Blast Slash claims, 'Perla has been slow responding, or has deliberately drawn out responding, throughout this matter.' He then makes it clear, 'I want to move on with my life.'

The former couple have been married since 2001, and have two sons, London, 15, and Cash, 13.

The 52-year old musician first filed for divorce in 2010 but they reconciled just two months later. He again filed for divorce in December 2014 but it has been lagging in the courts since then.

Two months after Slash's second divorce filing Ferrar told TMZ that the breakup of her marriage was 'pretty amicable' adding that 'there is no bad blood- at least not yet.' 

Here's how Slash's proposed deal breaks down: Ferrar will maintain primary custody of the couple’s two children but both of them will share joint legal custody.

Slash will be required to pay $6,627,352 within 30 days of the judgement being signed by both parties. He'll also pay $100,000 per month in spousal support until death or remarriage, and $39,000 per month in child support. The children will also collect 1.8% of Slash’s income until the year 2036.

Slash got to keep all his interest in Guns ‘N Roses and his other companies, all his trademarks and residuals as well as a number of fully-loaded bank accounts. 

Slash also listed his monthly income at $345,000 per month. 

Ferrar hasn’t filed her income papers yet, but Slash has been very clear that he does not need to see it and that he just wants the judgement entered into the court as soon as possible.

Homes won't be an issue in any settlement. The former couple both bought new luxury mansions last year with their shared funds that are just four miles apart from each other in Encino, California. 

Slash shelled out $6.25 Million for his new abode, while Ferrar paid $3.5 million

A judge has not yet ruled on Slash’s request to get his judgement entered

According to documents obtained by The Blast Slash claims, 'Perla has been slow responding, or has deliberately drawn out responding, throughout this matter.' He then makes it clear, 'I want to move on with my life.'

item.title: Rob Kardashian 'can't seem to get healthy' and still struggles with his weight going 'up and down'
item.description: He shared an old photo of himself in May along with the caption: 'Lol I've changed a lot, definitely don't look like this anymore.' But People claims he is still struggling to keep the weight off.
item.content:encoded:
He's been battling with his weight for years.

But lately Rob Kardashian has been teasing on Instagram that he no longer looks as heavy as he once did.

He shared an old photo of himself in early May along with the caption: 'Lol I've changed a lot, definitely don't look like this anymore.'

However, according to People Monday, the reality star is still struggling to keep the weight off despite his social media posts.

Rob, 31, shared a pic of himself holding one-year-old daughter Dream in March and he definitely looked slimmer.

But he hasn't been pictured out in public more recently.  

'He can’t seem to get healthy even though he says he wants to be,' People's insider claimed. 'He’s constantly up and down.'

While he did shed pounds following his breakup with former Fiancee and dream's mother Black Chyna last year, he continues to lapse back into his old ways when under stress, the publication reported.

'Things were looking good for him. But then drama comes into his life or he goes through tough times and he gives up,' the source said.

Rob, the only son of Keeping Up With The Kardashians momager Kris Jenner, retreated from his family's reality show after gaining a lot of weight.

And last month, his brother-in-law Kanye West, who is married to his sister Kim, revealed he'd had liposuction because he didn't want to be called fat like Rob.  

Rob’s weight began to spiral out of control in 2015 when he gained 100 pounds in a year due to binging on junk food. 

He has also struggled with depression and in December 2015 was diagnosed with diabetes after being hospitalized.

However, becoming a father has provided motivation for him to adopt a healthier lifestyle.

He shared an old photo of himself in early May along with the caption: 'Lol I've changed a lot, definitely don't look like this anymore.' However, according to People Monday, the reality star is still struggling to keep the weight off despite his social media posts.

item.title: Geordie Shore's Chloe Ferry pokes fun at her surgically-enhanced frame with beau Sam Gowland in Barbie and Ken inspired shoot...as he insists 'every lad loves a fake look'
item.description: The Geordie Shore star, 22, maintained her heavily-sculpted look as she emulated fashion doll Barbie with her partner Sam Gowland in a new photoshoot with Heat magazine.
item.content:encoded:
She recently underwent another set of surgical procedures in a quest to perfect her appearance.  

And Chloe Ferry maintained her heavily-sculpted look as she emulated fashion doll Barbie with her partner Sam Gowland in a new photoshoot with Heat magazine.

The Geordie Shore star, 22, received support from her 22-year-old beau as he lauded her decision to go under the knife, telling the publication: 'Every lad loves a fake look'.

In the shot, the TV personality posed up a storm as she slipped her buxom assets into a pink sequinned dress, which accentuated her killer curves.

Ensuring all eyes were on her, the blonde siren donned a pair of shiny silver stilletoes and toted a blush pink handbag, embellished with delicate feathers.

The Newcastle beauty preserved Barbie's looks as she styled her tresses into volumized waves, while complementing her striking features in heavy strokes of make-up, false lashes and a slash of pink lipstick.

Meanwhile, Love Island's Sam flashed his washboard abs in a black patterned shirt, tied in with a pair of pale pink shorts.

Chloe - who underwent a double operation to sculpt her breasts and nose last month - gushed over her surgery: 'It went amazing. I said I wouldn't get any more, but I probably will.'

Clearly pleased with the results, she added: 'I like to look like a blow-up sex doll... I look like a completely different person. I feel fantastic about that, amazing.'

Agreeing with his lady, the Middlesbrough native said: 'Every lad loves a fake look. If any lad says they don't, they're lying!' 

The blonde bombshell previously opened up about her plastic surgery, admitting that she's spent at least £50,000 in an interview with new! magazine. 

'It's a lot more, I can tell you that. £50,000, I wish. I'm bankrupt, I'm not really! I want more. I just love injections and getting filler, to be honest,' she told the publication.

'If someone says to us they're going to give us free filler, that's totally fine. God, yeah [I'm happy with my looks].'  

As well as her figure, the reality star has transformed her face with lip fillers and cheek fillers as well as an eyebrow lift. 

Chloe's confession comes after her partner Sam shared his upcoming plans to propose to his girlfriend in a recent interview with Daily Star. 

Revealing he is set to pop the question within the next year, the star admitted: 'I am nearly 23 but I want to be engaged by the time I'm 24.' 

The couple - who recently got each other's names tattooed onto their wrists - only made their romance official during the most recent series of the Newcastle-based show.

The TV personality added: 'Chloe asks me every day when I am going to propose and if I have the ring yet...I know exactly how I am going to do it, and I know roughly when. 

Chloe previously confessed the pair have discussed their plans to wed, as she gushed over her relationship with her beau.

Speaking exclusively to MailOnline in January, the Celebrity Big Brother star said: 'We've both talked about it, I've said I never want to be with another man in my life, Sam is definitely the one.
item.dc:abstract: She recently underwent another set of surgical procedures in a quest to perfect her appearance. item.title: Love Island's Wes and Laura share a steamy smooch as they become the first couple to spend the night in the Hideaway
item.description: The Scottish beauty, 29, couldn't keep her hands off of island beau Wes, 20, as they became the first couple voted into the infamous Hideaway during Monday's episode of ITV's saucy reality show.
item.content:encoded:
They've been inseparable since first linking up on the opening episode of Love Island last week. 

And Laura Anderson, 29, couldn't keep her hands off her island beau Wes Nelson, 20, as they became the first couple voted into the infamous Hideaway during Monday's episode of ITV's saucy reality show. 

After the rest of the singletons unanimously voted for the smitten couple to enter the private room, the lovebirds wasted no time jumping under the covers for a steamy lip-lock.

Laura and Wes looked elated to see the rest of their island pals nominate them for a night away from the shared bedroom. 

The couple took to the Beach Hut to share their excitement, and told the camera: 'We're super happy to get some time together.

'We've been waiting for this moment for a bit, we've not had a date, we've not had anything else so this is perfect.'

Fully aware of the privacy they get within the secluded room, Laura jumped at the chance to get intimate, adding: 'I'm just looking forward to hugging and snogging.'

Laura and Wes couldn't stop smiling as they entered the romantic setting, with the king size bed festooned with rose petals. 

The Scottish air hostess mocked herself for her casual bedroom attire as she donned a slouchy shirt and shorts and joked: 'I feel like I'm supposed to wear something a bit more.... sorry this is just me. I'm really not that sexy'.

But her engineer hunk didn't seem to mind the lack of scanty lingerie and proceeded to pop open a bottle of fizz to toast their first night of privacy together.  

'It's our one week anniversary and it feels like a couple of months.' joked Wes.    

Laura poked fun at their whirlwind romance, adding: 'It feels like a year, you're so annoying, I'm so bored of you already.'

But Wes had the blonde beauty blushing again as he cheersed to their relationship and said: 'On a serious note, it feels like it's going to be something amazing, it's the best week that I've had with a girl in my life and that's no exaggeration, honestly.' 

Things appeared to be very going well for the couple, who both affirmed they were looking for 'The One' and even marriage material during an intimate chat in the garden. 

However, the good-looking pair endured their first row on Sunday's show, which saw Laura brand the design engineer a 'd***'.

Wes became caught up in drama between Hayley and Eyal, resulting in a huge fight between them.

Laura then grew angry at Wes for getting involved in the first place, stating: 'Wes has been sly, why would you do that? I don't understand. 

'Obviously I'm annoyed at Wes. I thought I trusted him. I thought he was friends with Hayley. Why is he getting involved? It's got nothing to do with him.' 

Speaking to him in the bedroom, Laura was quick to question him on his motivation for stirring the pot, adding: 'I'm really annoyed, I don't understand. Me, you and Hayley sat and had a private conversation, it's nothing to do with us Wes.

'She trusted both of us. Now I'm annoyed at you, because of them. It makes you look like a d*** - now I'm annoyed at you about them. It's pathetic. It's got nothing to do with us. I just don't think you should have done that. I don't want to fall out with you, but you're making it very difficult.

'I'm not like this. I don't speak to people behind their backs. I'm not sly. I don't create dramas. You're a smart guy. This is why I'm annoyed at you.'

In the end, Wes concluded that out of everything, he is more annoyed that Laura is 'disappointed in him'.
item.dc:abstract: They've been inseparable since first linking up on the opening episode of Love Island last week. And Laura Anderson, 29, couldn't keep her hands off her island beau Wes Nelson, 20, as they became the first couple voted into the infamous Hideaway during Monday's episode of ITV's saucy reality show. After the rest of the singletons unanimously voted for the smitten couple to enter the private room, the lovebirds wasted no time jumping under the covers for a steamy lip-lock.

item.title: Cardi B's fiance Offset retrieves $150K diamond chain that went missing after Met Gala
item.description: Authorities concluded that the chain was given back to the rapper, whose real name is Kiari Kendrell Cephus.
item.content:encoded:
Cardi B's fiance Offset got his bling back.

The 26-year-old Migos rapper, according to TMZ, had the expensive piece of jewelry in his possession in a recent clip officials with the New York Police Department saw, leading them to end their grand larceny probe.

The theft reportedly took place around the time of the Met Gala in New York City May 7 at a penthouse suite of the SIXTY LES Hotel where he was staying. Offset's manager Danny Zook searched the room but found nothing, Page Six reported.

Scroll below for video 

In the online clip, Offset wore the pricey item and boasted, 'Still got my s**t - come on, ya'll know better than that.'

Authorities concluded that the chain was given back to the rapper, whose real name is Kiari Kendrell Cephus, the outlet reported.

The Georgia native was initially missing the chain from his hotel room after the May event, which he attended with his famous fiancee. 

The possible theft took place just hours after one of Cardi B's crew beat up an aggressive fan who wanted an autograph.

'If you check my tag pics I take a lot of pics with fans,' she said when referencing the incident in a recently deleted tweet. 'Some people are not fans and sometimes I don't want no pics and I simply don't want people too close cause of [my pregnancy].'

Police did not identify any suspects in the case, according to TMZ, and it was not immediately clear how the chain made its way back to the rapper.

It was a tumultuous May for the rapper, who crashed his Dodge Challenger May 17 in his native Atlanta, Georgia, leading to him being hospitalized with injuries to his neck and arm. 

The Bodak Yellow songstress, 25, got engaged to the rapper last October onstage at at Philadelphia's Wells Fargo Center during a concert, and is expecting his child this summer. 

She first announced her pregnancy during an episode of Saturday Night Live in April after months of speculation.

The theft reportedly took place around the time of the Met Gala in New York City May 7 at a penthouse suite of the SIXTY LES Hotel where he was staying. Offset's manager Danny Zook searched the room but found nothing, Page Six reported.

item.title: 'It can knock me around': Sam Frost reveals her torment over being trolled for her acting role in Home And Away and how she is coping with the backlash
item.description: Sam Frost has copped harsh criticism since making her acting debut on Home And Away as character Jasmine Delaney, earlier this year.
item.content:encoded:
Sam Frost has copped harsh criticism since making her acting debut on Home And Away as character Jasmine Delaney, earlier this year.

But the former Bachelorette star has revealed she has a coping mechanism for brushing off the backlash.

Speaking to TV Week, the 29-year-old said she moderates her comments on social media - noting that her list of 'banned' words is extensive.

'I have a strict comments moderator - the list [of banned words] is so long, you'd be surprised,' she said.

The blonde-haired beauty admitted that while she thinks her acting is improving, sometimes the negative comments affect her. 

'To be honest, sometimes the criticism does get to me,' she told the publication, adding: 'It depends what is going on in your personal life and your frame of mind, some days, I can brush it off. Other times, it can knock me around.' 

The actress also said that when the savage criticism becomes too much, she takes a break from social media altogether.

Speaking to Who magazine last month, Sam said she's settling into her role as Jasmine and getting 'better and better' at acting.

'I'm getting better and better,' she said, adding: 'I have invested so much time and work into my job, I know I'm getting better.'

The star also explained that she's also 'slowly getting better' at tackling negative backlash and does so by staying true to herself.

'I know who I am, I like who I am and I don't really want anyone to change me,' she candidly told Who magazine.

Adding: 'I've got a really good attitude... When you get older, you stay true to your values and morals.'
item.dc:abstract: Sam Frost has copped harsh criticism since making her acting debut on Home And Away as character Jasmine Delaney, earlier this year. But the former Bachelorette star has revealed she has a coping mechanism for brushing off the backlash. Speaking to TV Week , the 29-year-old said she moderates her comments on social media - noting that her list of 'banned' words is extensive.

item.title: Bella Thorne flashes her flat abs and a hint of underboob while vacationing in Hawaii
item.description: She's been parading her figure in a collection of sexy swimsuits since arriving in Hawaii for vacation last week. And the Disney alum made another sultry on Instagram Monday.
item.content:encoded:
She's been parading her figure in a collection of sexy swimsuits since arriving in Hawaii for vacation last week.

And Bella Thorne made another sultry display on Instagram Monday in a post which was captioned 'I think I'm buying a house here.'

The Famous In Love starlet, 20, looked like she was in paradise as she flaunted her flat abs and a hint of underboob in a butter yellow bikini top while standing in front of a hammock next to the ocean.

She added loose linen pants and a matching shirt as cover-up layers in the photo, which was taken by her pal and photographer Hunter Moreno. 

Bella looked straight from the beach with wet tresses messily combed to one side.

Never one for simplicity, the Disney Channel alum added layers and layers of necklaces of different styles and lengths.

Later she shared snapshots of the outfit on her Instagram Story.

She slung her striped top off a shoulder to offer up another look at her toned center and perky chest.

Her phone's butter yellow case matched her swimwear perfectly and was adorned with a sticker for the star's music label Filthy Fangs.

A Kelly green scrunchie could also be seen on her wrist.

The day earlier Bella made a sultry display of her backside is a tiny red bikini with the Filthy Fangs logo scrawled on it and beautiful palm trees in the background.

The starlet launched her label at this year's Coachella Music Festival with a wild party in the California desert.

And she released two new singles, GOAT and B**** I'm Bella Thorne, last month on May 18.
item.dc:abstract: She's been parading her figure in a collection of sexy swimsuits since arriving in Hawaii for vacation last week. And the Disney alum made another sultry on Instagram Monday, sharing a photo in a yellow bikini which was captioned 'I think I'm buying a house here.'

item.title: Party hard! American rocker Andrew W.K. announces Australian tour... his first since being hit with a bottle on stage in 2012
item.description: Bizarre American rocker Andrew WK has announced his Australia tour dates for 2018.
item.content:encoded:
The last time he was in Australia, he got hit with a bottle while on stage.  

But that hasn't deterred rocker, Andrew WK, who has announced his Australian tour dates for 2018.

The American musician will play Sydney and Melbourne in August to support this fifth studio album, You're Not Alone.

Scroll down for video 

Andrew will be joined on stage by a six-piece backing band.

The party animal is no stranger to mishaps in the line of duty.

In 2012, he was hit by a bottle thrown by an audience member while he was performing at Groovin' the Moo in Bendigo, Victoria. 

Instead of complaining about his treatment, however, Andrew wrote on Twitter: 'He had good aim! It was amazing. Such a fun and intense show!'

He added: 'Thank you, Bendigo, for following my demand to start a party riot!'

It seems the rocker has a history of mishaps - in 2002 he broke his hand during a bizarre studio performance in which he thumped a piano.

In a clip of the incident, the singer, 39, can be seen flailing and headbanging to an imaginary soundtrack.

Andrew - real name Andrew Fetterly Wilkes-Krier - is a singer-songwriter, multi-instrumentalist and music producer.

He is known for his single, Party Hard, and hosted the TV series Destroy Build Destroy.
item.dc:abstract: The last time he was in Australia, he got hit with a bottle while on stage. But that hasn't deterred rocker, Andrew WK, who has announced his Australia tour dates for 2018. item.title: Claire Danes hides burgeoning baby bump as she steps out with Hugh Dancy to the Public Theater Gala
item.description: She drew attention to her burgeoning baby bump at the Tony Awards on Monday night. But Claire Danes opted to conceal her growing stomach on Tuesday when she stepped out at The
item.content:encoded:
She drew attention to her burgeoning baby bump at the Tony Awards on Sunday night.

But Claire Danes opted to conceal her growing stomach on Monday when she stepped out at The Public Theater Annual Gala in New York.

Joined by husband Hugh Dancy, the 39-year-old kept cozy in an oversized ensemble that featured a large scarf. 

Claire wore a white top with burgundy colored wide-legged trousers. 

She completed her look with a long black overcoat and cashmere scarf that hid her baby bump. 

The Homeland actress was glowing and finished her glam with a glossy red lip.

Claire's blonde locks were styled back off her face and she kept comfortable with black strappy open-toed shoes. 

Hugh was seen posing alongside his wife looking incredibly dapper in a taupe colored suit. 

And said to have recently entered her third trimester, last week, Claire admitted that she was feeling slightly drained and was ready to 'retire for a while'. 

Ethan Hawke and his wife Ryan were also at Monday's Gala. 

He opted for a yellow shirt underneath a navy suit. 

Ryan dressed casually in a white top and comfortable blue jeans. 

Actress Katie Finneran was also at the event. The 47-year-old turned heads in her floral maxi-dress.

She complimented the wrap dress with bold red platform wedges.  

Her glam featured a sweep of blush and her blonde curls were tied back into a messy up-do. 

Actress, singer and producer Glen Close, 71, also graced the carpet. 

Glen too opted for a floral ensemble and kept warm with a black cardigan.
item.dc:abstract: She drew attention to her burgeoning baby bump at the Tony Awards on Monday night. But Claire Danes opted to conceal her growing stomach on Tuesday when she stepped out at The Public Theater Annual Gala in New York. Joined by husband Hugh Dancy, the 39-year-old kept cozy in an oversized ensemble that featured a large scarf.

item.title: Red hot! Natasha Oakley flaunts her ample cleavage in a plunging dress during a solo gondola ride in Venice... amid rumours she's reunited with beau Gilles Souteyrand
item.description: She's rumoured to have reunited with Gilles Souteyrand recently, re-following each other on Instagram after their 'split.'
item.content:encoded:
She's rumoured to have reunited with Gilles Souteyrand recently, with the pair re-following each other on Instagram after their 'split.'

But on Tuesday, Australian bikini blogger Natasha Oakley enjoyed a solo gondola ride in Venice.

The buxom blonde put on a busty display, wearing a plunging red thigh-split dress for her cruise around the canals.

Scroll down for video 

'Favorite thing to do at sunset in Venice: see the city by gondola,' part of Natasha's caption read.

In the snap, Natasha looks off camera as she relaxes inside the boat.

Her long hair was styled out and over her shoulders in loose tousled curls, and she showcased a golden glow.

Natasha accessorised with nude heels and a matching quilted Chanel handbag. 

It comes after she posted a shot of herself on the balcony of her hotel in Venice, wearing nothing but a white robe as she sipped wine.

Last week, Natasha and French personal trainer and model, Gilles Souteyrand, re-followed each other on Instagram after fans noticed they unfollowed each other on the site. 

Gilles also praised Natasha for her 'Baywatch' body - saying 'The Baywatch babes have nothing on her.'

Last month, reports surfaced online that Gilles and Natasha - who have a combined social media following of over two million - may have split.  

The genetically-blessed pair had unfollowed each other on Instagram and hadn't shared any photos together or made any reference to their relationship for weeks.

Furthermore, they appeared to be ignoring fans' questions about their status as a couple.

'Did they break up?' asked a concerned follower, while another added: 'It sort of looks like it on her page'.

'That's so so sad. They were perfect together,' read a similar comment.
item.dc:abstract: She's rumoured to have reunited with Gilles Souteyrand recently, re-following each other on Instagram after their 'split.' And on Tuesday, Australian bikini blogger Natasha Oakley enjoyed a solo gondola ride in Venice, flaunting her incredible figure. The buxom blonde put on a busty display, wearing a plunging red thigh-split dress for her cruise around the canals.

item.title: Shakira dazzles in glittering leggings as she wows the crowd at London's O2 during her world tour
item.description: Shakira, 41, put on a showstopping set at London's O2 arena on Monday night.
item.content:encoded:
She's known for her sensational onstage performances.

And Shakira, 41, didn't disappoint as she put on a showstopping set at London's O2 arena on Monday night.

The Hips Don't Lie hitmaker belted out her songs as part of the El Dorado World Tour, wearing a bedazzled t shirt and glittering tights.

The Colombian beauty clutched her gold microphone while wearing a set of knuckledusters.

Shakira wore her long blonde tresses in ringlets, throwing her hair about in the high energy show in the capital. 

Shakira's sixth career tour began in Hamburg on June 3; and will take her across Europe as well as Asia and North and South America.

The artist will conclude her tour on November 3 in her home country of Colombia; the last stop is in Bogota.

In November, Shakira took to Instagram to announce that her tour was delayed until 2018 due to her health.

The superstar said that she 'felt a strange hoarseness' during tour rehearsals and later found out she had suffered a hemorrhage on her right vocal chord.

In the lengthy note, Shakira thanked her fans for their support while she focused on healing and her recovery.

The singer has two children with her longtime partner, soccer player Gerard Pique, 31: sons Milan, five, and Sasha, three.

Shakira and Gerard began dating in 2011; and the lovebirds reside in Barcelona, Spain with their two children.

The Hips Don't Lie hitmaker belted out her songs as part of the El Dorado World Tour, wearing a bedazzled t shirt and glittering tights.

item.title: Kate Upton goes TOPLESS in risque snap as she 'put on birthday suit' to celebrate turning 26
item.description: She shot to fame for modeling her curvaceous figure. And Kate Upton proved she's still got it as she posted a scintillating snap posing topless to her Instagram account on Monday.
item.content:encoded:
She shot to fame for modeling her curvaceous figure.

And Kate Upton proved she's still got it as she posted a scintillating snap posing topless to her Instagram account on Monday. 

The 26-year-old stunner was celebrating her birthday as she captioned the pic: 'Put on my birthday suit to thank you for the birthday wishes!'

Scroll down for video 

Daring to impress, the blonde bombshell rocked a red Wild Ones baseball hat turned backwards as she threw up her hands looking out over a body of water.

She also posted a beautiful picture of herself wearing a light blue denim shirt as she sat cross legged on the balcony. 

Wearing a set of huge over sized earrings and a megawatt smile, Kate captioned the pic: 'Having the best birthday week!'

Kate had much to celebrate as she also landed the cover of Maxim's Hot 100.

The American beauty showed off her ample assets on the cover and flashed the flesh for the inside shots as well. 

A host of other celebrities appear in the magazine, including Kendall and Kylie Jenner and Bella and Gigi Hadid.

The site reports that the Hot 100 issue launches on June 19 and they will be throwing a party on July 21 at the Hollywood Palladium.

Upton told People last year that her figure hasn't always been well-received.

She said: 'I got my first cover when I was 19. After my first cover, critics were discussing whether I was fat or not.

'I had this huge moment in my career and they were tearing it apart. I have to thank the people who did that because it really made me sit back and find out who I was and what meant something to me, and how I thought about my body.

'At 19, I wasn’t thinking about that. I sat there answering all these questions I had about my body because I really didn’t know.'
item.dc:abstract: She shot to fame for modeling her curvaceous figure. And Kate Upton proved she's still got it as she posted a scintillating snap posing topless to her Instagram account on Monday. The 26-year-old stunner was celebrating her birthday as she captioned the pic: 'Put on my birthday suit to thank you for the birthday wishes!'

item.title: Katie Holmes looks chic in floral top and mom jeans as she steps out to run errands around New York
item.description: She's known for her stylish ensembles both on and off the red carpet. And Katie Holmes sure didn't disappoint fans when she stepped out in New York on Monday The 39-year-old looked
item.content:encoded:
She's known for her stylish ensembles both on and off the red carpet. 

And Katie Holmes sure didn't disappoint fans when she stepped out in New York on Monday.

The 39-year-old looked ready for summer, running errands in a lively floral shirt. 

Scroll down for video  

Katie's blouse featured wide-three-quarter sleeves.

She paired the look with high-waisted mom jeans and kept comfortable with white Adidas sneakers.

The actress accessorized her look with large Celine shades and a handbag. 

Katie appeared makeup free and had her short brunette locks styled in a half up half down bun. 

The Dawson's Creek star seemed to be enjoying a rare day off on her solo adventure. 

There was no sign of her 12-year-old daughter, Suri Cruise.

Katie, who is reportedly dating acting Jamie Foxx, 50, has not been seen with Suri's father 55-year-old action star Tom Cruise since their highly publicized 2012 divorce. 

Reports have also revealed that Tom hasn't seen for some years either.

He also has two grown children, Bella, 25, and Connor, 23, with Nicole Kidman, 50, to whom he was married from 1990 to 2001.

item.title: Kate Hudson teams white shirt with jeans as she leaves NYC with boyfriend Danny Fujikawa and son Ryder
item.description: The Almost Famous star, who's expecting a baby girl with Fujikawa, carried a straw hat and had a shoulder-bag with black sunglasses as she ventured through the travel terminal.
item.content:encoded:
Expecting Kate Hudson was snapped leaving New York City's JFK airport on Monday with her son Ryder and boyfriend Danny Fujikawa, after a whirlwind weekend centered on celebrating Danny's birthday.

The 39-year-old actress donned a white collared button-up shirt over a black undershirt with blue jeans and white sneakers, with her short blonde wavy locks combed to the side.

The Almost Famous star, who's expecting a baby girl with Fujikawa, carried a straw hat and had a shoulder-bag with black sunglasses as she ventured through the travel terminal.

Scroll below for video 

Fujikawa, who celebrated his 32nd birthday this past weekend, wore a dark zip-up sweater over a white T-shirt with camouflage pants and blue trainers.

The bearded musician rounded out his travel day ensemble with a grey cap and black sunglasses, as he toted a roll-on suitcase through the Big Apple travel terminal. He and Kate revealed they were expecting a girl in April with a gender reveal party.

Ryder, Kate's 14-year-old son with Black Crowes crooner Chris Robinson, wore a blue Los Angeles Dodgers jersey with black Under Armour sweatpants and grey slippers.

The A-list actress, who also has a six-year-old son named Bingham with Muse's Matthew Bellamy, celebrated her beau's birthday with a group dinner that her mother Goldie Hawn attended.

The How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days star also took time during the weekend to appear at a PopSugar Play/Ground event, according to Page Six, where she touched on contemporary issues select young women face in the age of social media.

'I see beautiful young girls and all of a sudden I look at them, and I’m like, "Did their lips get five times bigger?"' she said. 'And I think, "This poor thing, it’s all about the image" … for me, with my kids, I just want them to feel good.'

item.title: 'It was pretty hot!' Sam Frost reveals things got steamy when filming a 'naughty' scene on Home And Away
item.description: She's the former reality star who has recently turned her hand to acting on Channel Seven's long-running soap, Home And Away.
item.content:encoded:
Sam Frost is a relatively new cast member on Home And Away.

But according to the 29-year-old, things are certainly heating up for her character Jasmine Delaney.

During a chat on Monday's Nova Fitzy & Wippa radio show, the blonde beauty said of filming a 'naughty' scene earlier that day: 'It was pretty hot!' 

A segment called 'Celebrity Screenings' saw co-host Michael 'Wippa' Wipfli call Sam for an impromptu chat on the program.

Pictured behind-the-scenes and seated next to what looked to be a producer, the former Bachelor and Bachelorette star kept warm in a black puffer jacket. 

Sam began to tell Michael and co-host Ryan 'Fitzy' Fitzgerald what she had been up to on-set, prior to taking the call.

'I literally had to do a bit of a naughty scene earlier on today. It was pretty hot I must say,' the beauty confessed.

'First thing in the morning and I'm super cold. But don't worry, I think he was colder,' Sam added with a laugh.     

Last July, Channel Seven made the announcement that Sam would be joining Home And Away as a permanent cast member. 

And just last month, Sam was spotted at Sydney's Palm Beach, filming some steamy scenes for the show with co-star Jake Ryan.  

The pair were pictured walking along the beach and holding hands, before smooching.

Sam and Jake are believed to be good friends outside of the show - with the actor reportedly giving the starlet tips on how to deal with the pressures of fame.

'Jake has been giving Sam advice on how to deal with the negativity, which comes with starring on such a huge show,' a source reportedly told Woman's Day last October.

The insider added: 'They often catch up off screen and really make each other laugh.'

item.title: Scarlett Moffatt calls out Love Island's Hayley Hughes for acting like a five-year-old after suggesting 'favourite animal' question was 'too deep'
item.description: The blonde model, 21, bore the brunt of ridicule from Scarlett Moffatt, who mocked the singleton for her dopey comments on Twitter after Monday night's episode
item.content:encoded:
She's been blasted for faking her stupidity for ratings as she asked what an earlobe was on Monday's Love Island. 

And Hayley Hughes bore the brunt of ridicule from Scarlett Moffatt, who mocked the singleton on Twitter after the episode aired. 

During the episode, TV star Scarlett, 28, blasted the blonde model, 21, for acting like a 'five year old' after she claimed previous conquest Eyal Booker was 'too deep' because he asked her what her favourite animal was.

While on a date with social media host Josh Denzel during Monday's episode, Hayley spoke about why her budding relationship with Eyal fell flat, and explained what she actually looked for in a man. 

When quizzed by Josh about her type, the bombshell responded: 'I just want to have a laugh with someone and not take things too serious and not go too deep.

'Obviously if I start to like them that's when I want to take them serious.' 

When referring to her first and current match-up Eyal, Hayley claimed the muscular hunk was 'too deep' for her, because of his hard line of questioning. 

Of her relationship with Eyal, the model explained: 'He was just too deep for me and [he'd ask me] things. You know, like 'What's your favourite animal?''

Hayley was widely ridiculed online following the dopey comments, and TV personality Scarlett waded into the conversation. 

Taking to Twitter, Scarlett mocked the blonde beauty and compared her to her 5-year-old cousin writing: 'He was too deep for me, asking like- what's your favourite animal?' Hayley

'My 5 year old cousin asks girls in his class questions like this ha!!'

Hayley has also been criticised for asking the definitions of words such as superficial, earlobe, aura and for thinking Brexit would mean the UK wouldn't have any trees. 

The reality TV stars comments have caused a storm online and amongst broadcasters with Loose Women panelist Kelly Brook, 38, claiming that the blonde bombshell was putting on an act.

Speaking on Monday's show, she said: '[The contestants] know what gets headlines. They know what gets airtime. So I think they know that the more stupid they are, the more headlines they get. 

Earlier on in the day, Good Morning Britain presenter Piers Morgan branded the Love Island contestants 'the most stupid people in the world' after referencing a clip of the girls discussing Brexit during Friday night's show. 

Before showing the moment, Piers told viewers: ‘We have had a debate about the mental abilities of those on Love Island. 

'I think they’re the most stupid people in the world. Susanna thinks they’re moral guardians of the nation and we should all be watching.’

item.title: Jennifer Lawrence keeps it low-key as she walks dog Pippi in NYC after going public with new romance
item.description: The actress, 27, hid her face under a baseball cap pulled down over her hair and sunglasses as she walked her beloved pup.
item.content:encoded:
She has a new man in her life.

But it was her constant canine companion Pippi who joined Jennifer Lawrence for a walk in New York's Central Park on Monday.

The actress, 27, hid her face under a baseball cap pulled down over her hair and sunglasses as she walked her beloved pup.

J-Law showcased her slender figure in a white t-shirt and a pair of black Adidas athletic leggings.

She added black trainers that she wore with short white socks. 

The movie star had her dog on an extendable lash attached to a harness and she had her earbuds in as she walked. 

Jennifer has been linked romantically with art director Cooke Maroney, 33, following her breakup with her Mother! director beau Aaron Aronofsky. 

'The relationship has been going on a few weeks,' a source told PageSix.com last week. 'But they have been very private and careful not to be seen together.'

That all changed though when the pair very publicly went for a meal together at the popular Italian eatery Sant Ambroeus in Lower Manhattan on Tuesday June 5.

They were photographed smiling and laughing together as they strolled along the street. 

The Hunger Games star has previously been in a number of high-profile romances including Coldplay frontman Chris Martin in 2014 and actor Nicholas Hoult of X-Men fame around 2012-2014.

item.title: Billionaire, 57, whose estranged wife lives 'in a cupboard' at his £20m Kensington mansion celebrates with her AND his Polish model girlfriend at his daughter's Bat Mitzvah
item.description: Heather Bird was happy to pose with her estranged husband, property tycoon Robert Tchenguiz, at the Bat Mitzvah of their teenage daughter, Violet — despite the presence of his Polish model girlfriend.
item.content:encoded:
Last time that viewers of the BBC's extraordinary documentary Robbie's War: The Rise And Fall Of A Playboy Billionaire saw socialite Heather Bird, she was shown living in a small, dark bedroom, where she allegedly had to cook on a camping stove.

At the weekend, however, the American was happy to pose with her estranged husband, the flamboyant property tycoon Robert Tchenguiz, at the Bat Mitzvah of their teenage daughter, Violet — despite the presence of his Polish model girlfriend Julia Dybowska. In keeping with the dress code, Heather, 48, and Robbie, 57, both wore white, with his jacket emblazoned with flowers, changing outfits later.

'It was the most lavish party,' reports one the guests at the Bat Mitzvah, a Jewish celebration of a girl's coming of age.

Guests included gold bullion dealer James Stunt, the ex-husband of Formula One heiress Petra Ecclestone, restaurant tycoon Richard Caring and colourful property developer Bruce Ritchie.

The party was held at Tchenguiz's £20 million Kensington mansion overlooking the Royal Albert Hall, which has a ballroom, swimming pool and roof terrace.

According to the BBC programme, Heather, who is separated, although not divorced, from Tchenguiz, lived on the first floor and tried to avoid Robbie and his 27-year-old girlfriend who occupy the fourth.

Regarding his wife's living arrangements, Tchenguiz later told this newspaper: 'There is no [camping] stove. It would be a fire hazard.

'This house has two kitchens. Heather has a fully equipped one on the third floor as well as the use of the main kitchen in the basement.

'The children have a cook to prepare their meals.'

The Iranian-born businessman and his brother, Vincent, came to prominence in the Eighties as two of the West End's biggest landlords, with a portfolio of more than 600 buildings said to have been worth £4.5 billion.

But Robbie lost £1.6billion in the Icelandic banking crisis.

He was then wrongly arrested for fraud after the 2008 financial crash, and the Serious Fraud Office has since paid him £1.5 million in damages.

 

Muddy Fox's fun with the Fogles

Silent Witness star Emilia Fox enjoyed a dirty weekend with her chums, TV adventurer Ben Fogle and his wife Marina.

Emilia, 44 next month, was having an early birthday celebration at the Little Welly children's obstacle course in Henley. 'Mud, mud glorious mud,' she wrote beside this photograph.

Clearly being a mother to seven-year-old daughter Rose, combined with her regular therapy sessions, have helped her get in touch with her inner child.

 

Pooch and a pint for Guinness heir tying the knot

Brewing heir Arthur Guinness didn't miss a trick when he married the founder of fashion label, Shrimps, at the weekend.

Tying the knot with 28-year-old Hannah Weiland, whose father is Mr Bean director, Paul Weiland, Arthur, 27, turned the Grade I-listed Belcombe Court in Bradford-on-Avon into a makeshift pub by erecting a sign reading 'The Arthur's Arms' above the door.

They also had their own 'wedding coat of arms' designed by Anna Chancellor's daughter, Poppy, featuring a shrimp and a pint of Guinness.

Guests included former Vogue editor Alexandra Shulman, model Laura Bailey and Love Actually director Richard Curtis accompanied by his partner, Emma Freud.

Also in attendance was one of the Duchess of Cambridge's favourite designers, Penelope Chilvers, who noted that it was 'a first to see dogs in the congregation'. That dog was the couple's poodle, Lionel McGruff, whose curly locks inspired Hannah's brightly coloured faux-fur creations championed by Kate Moss.

After the nuptials, for which the bride designed her own high-neck dress, guests drank Black Velvets — a cocktail of stout and champagne — before playing petanque.
item.dc:abstract: Last time that viewers of the BBC’s extraordinary documentary Robbie’s War: The Rise And Fall Of A Playboy Billionaire saw socialite Heather Bird, she was shown living in a small, dark bedroom, where she allegedly had to cook on a camping stove. At the weekend, however, the American was happy to pose with her estranged husband, the flamboyant property tycoon Robert Tchenguiz, at the Bat Mitzvah of their teenage daughter, Violet — despite the presence of his Polish model girlfriend Julia Dybowska. In keeping with the dress code, Heather, 48, and Robbie, 57, both wore white, with his jacket emblazoned with flowers, changing outfits later.

item.title: Made In Chelsea's Binky Felstead exposes fan 'b******g' about her chest size as she shares her intense workout on social media
item.description: The former Made In Chelsea star, 27, was left shocked after she received a message from a social media user 'b****ing' about her breasts in response to a workout clip she posted on Instagram on Monday.
item.content:encoded:
She's frequently praised for snapping back into shape following the birth of her daughter India.

But Binky Felstead was left shocked after she received a message from a social media user 'b****ing' about her breasts in response to a workout clip she posted on Instagram on Monday.

As the sour comment was intended to be sent to a friend, the former Made In Chelsea star, 27, poked fun at catching the follower out, as she captioned the clip: 'LOL!!!!! When you're busted for b******g!!! (It's a sports bra?!!!)'

Scroll down for video 

In the short clip, the TV personality - who is an ambassador for Reebok - treats her fans to a glimpse of her grueling workout, as she wrote: 'Last 10 minutes after hours circuit.'

The brunette beauty showcases her naturally radiant complexion as she goes make-up free, and flashes a hint of her slender frame and washboard abs in a sporty crop top and matching leggings.

In the awkward exchange, the follower replied to the Binky's story, stating: 'Where have her boobs gone?'

However, the fan - who insists the message was meant to be delivered to a pal - swiftly attempts to rectify her note, penning: 'Oh gosh, I'm so sorry! I was sending that to a friend because the same happened to me since I lost weight. Love seeing your stories.' 

Meanwhile, Binky reminisced on her labour with India as she prepares to celebrate her daughter's first birthday on Tuesday.

Taking to her widely-followed account, the doting mother shared a throwback snap of herself in the delivery room, captioned: 'This time last year...' 

Shortly after India's birth, Binky spoke to Hello! magazine about her 'dream labour', stating: 'There was no screaming or crying and it wasn't like in a movie. It was all over very quickly.'

Chiming in, Josh added: 'When you've seen your partner give birth, you end up feeling emotions for them that you've never felt before...I can't describe how much admiration I have for her for what she's been through ... it's a new feeling in my heart.'

Binky's recent social media activity comes after she revealed she was homeless after floods ravaged her London house.

The reality star revealed she and her family were homeless as work gets underway to repair their home and replace possessions lost in the flood.

In a candid Instagram video with her cherubic daughter India, the mother-of-one gave her followers an update on her housing situation.

The make-up free star, who reclined on a bed and told India 'we're camping out at the moment, aren't we?' said 'Seriously though we are homeless at the moment, we've had to completely chuck everything out of India's nursery.   

She added: 'Just hoping everything will be sorted and rectified. Josh did the itemisation of all our stuff that needs to be replaced. Quite a stressful process, being grown up is not fun.' 

The socialite had been holidaying on the Isle of Wight with her daughter and friends over the weekend, while Josh worked on a photoshoot in Capri, Italy.

But while the family were away, their recently renovated house suffered severe damage.

She told fans the nursery was 'ruined' after water flooded into the lower floor of her property during the 'mother of all thunderstorms' across the country on Saturday.

Lightning struck Britain 62,000 times last month as heavy rain and flash flooding made roads impassable and people's homes sodden.

The Met Office has issued yellow weather warnings for large parts of the country until early Monday morning as drastic conditions continue to sweep the nation.

item.title: Ozzy Osbourne cosies up to wife Sharon as he wins the Golden God award for heavy metal at The Metal Hammer awards in London
item.description: Ozzy Osbourne was honoured as 2018's Golden God at The Metal Hammer Golden God Awards 2018 on Monday, at the O2 in London.
item.content:encoded:
He's one of rock music's legends.

And Ozzy Osbourne, 69, was honoured as 2018's Golden God at The Metal Hammer Golden God Awards 2018 on Monday, at the O2 in London.

The Black Sabbath singer looked like his usual rock star self, wearing a glittering teal coat over an all black outfit and a pair of round sunglasses and two gold chains.

Ozzy's wife Sharon, 65, looked glamorous as ever as she posed next to her husband, wearing black trousers and a floral kimono.

The TV personality wore her trademark red locks in a sleek style, and opted for a fuchsia lip. 

The 69-year-old rock legend was the recipient of the main accolade of the evening during the award ceremony at Indigo at The O2, London, on Monday, 

Ozzy thanked his fans for sticking by him throughout his five-decade-spanning career: 'What an immense honour it is to be getting a second Golden God Award after Sabbath picked one up last year.

'The fans who have supported me and this music mean everything to me, which is why getting this award is so special.'

Previous acceptees of the Golden God included Motörhead legend Lemmy, Megadeth's Dave Mustaine and Rob Zombie amongst others.

The evening was hosted by Hatebreed frontman Jamey Jasta, and rock legends including Judas Priest, Limp Bizkit's Wes Borland, Denmark's Myrkur, and Tool vocalist Maynard James Keenan also scooped up big prizes.

Best New Band was awarded to Japanese metal sensations, Lovebites, whilst gothic metallers Lacuna Coil took home the gong for Best Live Band, and Code Orange won Best Breakthrough.

Performances came from the likes of synthwave sensation Carpenter Brut, who opened the show alongside Baroness, Myrkur and Meshuggah.

The ceremony was closed with a headline set from Parkway Drive, who put on a blistering full-production set.

Fhe Metal Hammer Golden God Awards 2018 winners

Best New Band - Lovebites

Best Underground - Wolves In The Throne Room

Best British Band - Judas Priest

Best Live Band - Lacuna Coil

Best International Band - Arch Enemy

Best Independent Label - Sumerian Records

Best Event - Download Festival

Breakthrough - Code Orange

Riff Lord - Wes Borland

Global Metal - Kaoteon

Inspiration - Meshuggah

Best Album - Myrkur for 'Mareridt'

Spirit Of Hammer - Jessica Pimentel

Icon - Maynard James Keenan

Golden God - Ozzy Osbourne
item.dc:abstract: He's one of rock music's legends. And Ozzy Osbourne was honoured as 2018's Golden God at The Metal Hammer Golden God Awards 2018 on Monday, at the O2 in London. The Black Sabbath singer looked like his usual rock star self, wearing a glittering teal coat over an all black outfit and a pair of round sunglasses and two gold sunglasses.
item.dc:creator: Joanna Crawley
item.mi:shortTitle: Ozzy Osbourne looks loved up with Sharon as he wins Golden God award

item.title: Caroline Flack, 38, and fiancé Andrew Brady, 27 will try for a baby as soon as they are married as his Apprentice co-star insists he's 'desperate to be a dad'
item.description: They shocked fans with news of their engagement in April after a whirlwind three month romance.
item.content:encoded:
They shocked fans with news of their engagement in April after a whirlwind three month romance.

But according to Andrew Brady's pal and former Apprentice co-star Michaela Wain, it won't be long until Andrew, 27, and his fiancee Caroline Flack, 38 are parents too.

Michaela, who is expecting her second child, has spilled to The Sun that her friend is 'desperate to be a dad', and the couple will start trying for a baby as soon as they are married. 

Michaela is pregnant with her second child, her first with fellow Apprentice star Harrison Jones, and the businesswoman thinks it won't be long before Andrew and Caroline follow her into parenthood.  

'Andrew is desperate to be a dad,' she told The Sun this week. 'We spoke about it and I know he is ready. He wants children soon.'

Andrew's pal added that she thinks his romance with Caroline is completely genuine, despite the speed at which they have moved, insisting: 'He is like a loyal puppy and doesn't care about fame.'   

'He is so loving and loves to take care of people and is a real fun character so I know with all my heart it works out for them. He genuinely loves her and I have never known him to cheat,' she added.  

Meanwhile Caroline defended the age gap between herself and her 27-year-old fiancé on Sunday night, as she returned to her ITV2 show Love Island: Aftersun.

She also laughed about her whirlwind engagement to Andrew - and flashed her sparkling diamond ring - as she chatted with a panel of guests that included comedian Joel Dommett last year's Love Island victor Kem Cetinay. 

As Caroline recapped the events on Love Island, she brought up the relationship between Wes Nelson, 20, and Laura Anderson, 29, and the fact that she chose to tell her potential beau that she's looking for a husband just days after they were paired. 

Bringing up the subject, Caroline, said: Lets' talk about Laura and Wes. She brought up the word husband. It's been a week! But he didn't flinch, did he? He liked it.'

Joel, who in December announced that he was engaged to his girlfriend Hannah Cooper after a year of dating, cut in: I mean, both of us can't talk. I mean, we got engaged within a year [of meeting our partners].'

In response, Caroline flashed her glittering engagement ring, raising laughs and cheers from the studio audience.

Soon afterwards, the panel moved their discussion to Laura telling off Wes, after he informed his pal Eyal Booker that Hayley Hughes regretted kissing him - sparking a blazing row between the two in the Majorca villa. 

Kem said of Laura and Wes: 'When she was telling him off about the Hayley situation, I genuinely felt like it was his mum telling him off...'

As the audience and panel audibly agreed, Caroline smiled as she insisted: 'Although there's nothing wrong with an age gap, guys!'

In response, Kem looked playfully sheepish as he simply responded: 'Sorry Caroline!'

At the end of April, Caroline revealed her engaement via an Instagram post in which she proudly displayed her ring as she posed alongside Andrew.

She captioned the heart-warming shot: 'He's put it on my finger and it won't come off... so I've said yes #chooselove .'

The TV beauty was on the receiving end of a barrage of criticism when she embarked on a brief romance with Harry Styles - who is 14 years her junior - when he was aged 17. The pair went their separate ways in January 2012. 

Caroline recently opened up about marriage, body confidence and the new series of Love Island in a cover shoot for the July edition of Women's Health magazine.

The star admitted she always saw herself as a career woman after successfully carving a profession in TV hosting. 

She said that now she has found love with Celebrity Big Brother star Andrew, she sees herself 'having it all', when referring to a future with work, marriage and babies.

Caroline said: 'Of course, it's possible to have it all. Work, marriage, babies – I know a lot of women who do all of it; who have raised families and go to work every day.

'For me, I thought work was always what I wanted to do, but now, I don't know, maybe I just hadn't met the right guy.'

Gushing about her beau Andrew, Caroline said that she loves the feeling of falling in love, after forgetting what it was like to be in that phase.

When it comes to wedding plans she revealed that everything it currently up in the air, as she doesn't know where to begin with planning her big day.

She said: 'I do sort of feel different. But then marriage was something that I'd never... People keep saying to me, 'Oh, do you have your wedding all planned out?' but actually I don't know where to start.

'What do I do first? I forgot what it felt like. When you fall in love, then fall out of love, you forget those first feelings. I love the beginning part of falling in love – it's nice.'
item.dc:abstract: They shocked fans with news of their engagement in April after a whirlwind three month romance. But according to Andrew Brady's pal and former Apprentice co-star Michaela Wain, it won't be long until Andrew, 27, and his fiancee Caroline Flack, 38 are parents.

item.title: Which reality TV bombshell is a former sugar baby? Contestant is the subject of wild rumours about their past
item.description: An Australian reality TV star has a secret past as a 'sugar baby', it has been claimed.
item.content:encoded:
An Australian reality TV star has a secret past as a 'sugar baby', it has been claimed.

According to a blind gossip piece in Woman's Day, a contestant may have had an arrangement with a wealthy older suitor before rising to fame.

The magazine did not reveal the identity of the mystery lady.

'Which [name of program] bombshell is a former sugar baby?' asked Woman's Day in its weekly gossip column, Rumour Has It.

A spokesperson for the relevant network declined to comment.

It's not the first time that wild rumours have circulated about an unidentified reality TV star.

In May, unrelated claims surfaced about another reality TV contestant's alleged campaign to sabotage her rivals.

Several years ago, the memorable participant 'used sneaky tactics in a bid to get the other girls fat'.

The woman in question would 'make brownies, scones and cakes and plant them around all parts of the [set]', a source told Woman's Day at the time.

Apparently, the scheming contestant hoped the other girls 'would overindulge' and gain weight on the show. 

Back in March, the same magazine published an unrelated blind gossip item about yet another former TV star.

The columnist asked: 'Which former [show] contestant's reputation could be seriously damaged by an incriminating video?'

Again, the identity of the woman was not revealed and is still yet to be confirmed.
item.dc:abstract: An Australian reality TV star has a secret past as a 'sugar baby', it has been claimed. According to a blind gossip piece in Woman's Day, a contestant may have had an arrangement with a wealthy older suitor before rising to fame. The magazine did not reveal the identity of the mystery lady.
item.dc:creator: Joe Scrimshire
item.mi:shortTitle: Which reality TV 'bombshell' is a former sugar baby?

item.title: Kendall Jenner and Kourtney Kardashian pick up exclusive new Yeezy shoes from brother-in-law Kanye
item.description: West's shoes are some of the most coveted kicks in fashion. But of course, the ultra-celebs and sisters-in-law were able to snap pairs of his new Yeezy Boost 500 style in Calabasas Monday.
item.content:encoded:
Kanye West's shoes are some of the most coveted kicks in fashion.

But of course, ultra-celebs and sisters-in-law Kourtney Kardashian and Kendall Jenner were able to snap pairs of his new Yeezy Boost 500 style on Monday.

The model, 22, and mom-of-three, 38, stopped by the rapper/fashion designer's office in Calabasas, California.

Scroll down for video 

Kendall was all smiles as she snagged her shoes in a sleeveless brown sundress which she teamed with a black baseball hat featuring yellow letters.

She added simple white sneakers on foot while keeping her face at a natural glow.

Half-sister Kourtney stopped by the office shortly after.

The reality starlet looked cool in a pinstriped set the consisted of a longsleeve top and knee-length shorts.

Ever the trendsetter, she topped things off with a pair of rectangular shades and basic tennis shoes.

She wore her hair down with a slick center part and opted for a make-up minimal beauty look. 

Kourt brought daughter Penelope along with her.

The five-year-old was cute-as-can-be in a white tee shirt and metallic shorts matched with shiny fuchsia slingbacks. 

The starlet walked out of the office holding two boxes under her arm.

A camera crew could be seen nearby, likely shooting for the family's hit E! series Keeping Up With The Kardashians.

The Kardashian/Jenner family aren't the only people excited about Kayne's new Boost 500 colorway: Super Moon Yellow. 

The shoe dropped Saturday June 9 with a retail price of $200, but the kicks are already popping up elsewhere for twice the price.
item.dc:abstract: West's shoes are some of the most coveted kicks in fashion. But of course, the ultra-celebs and sisters-in-law were able to snap pairs of his new Yeezy Boost 500 style on Monday. The model, 22, and mom-of-three, 38, stopped by the rapper/fashion designer's office in Calabasas, California.

item.title: 'He was really generous with me': MAFS star Tracey Jewel reveals she was so broke on the show that 'ex-husband' Dean Wells paid for her meals off-camera
item.description: Married At First Sight star Tracey Jewel has revealed that she was so broke on the show that her 'ex-husband' Dean Wells paid for most of their meals off-camera.
item.content:encoded:
Married At First Sight star Tracey Jewel has revealed that she was so broke during filming of the show that her 'ex-husband' Dean Wells paid for most of their meals off-camera.

The author and reality TV star made the admission this week while speaking toHit105's Stav, Abby and Matt. 

Tracey gushed about her ex Dean, saying he was a 'real gentleman' when he footed most of their bills.

Scroll down for video    

'I didn't get paid,' Tracey said. 

'I did get a really nice bathing suit, which I'm a massive fan of.' 

'Dean was really generous with me on the show, he was a real gentleman,' she added. 

'He paid for a lot of our meals off camera and stuff. I was a bit spoilt by Dean on the show. That's something people don't know about him.'

Last week, Tracey and Dean were reunited at her book launch - with Dean snaring a snap of the pair on Instagram. 

In the caption, he raved at how good it was to see his flame-turned-friend again, but curiously noted: 'Got a couple of sneaky text messages from this one earlier today though.'

Whether Dean was simply joking or referring to their infamous leaked text exchange is unclear - if so, specifying the messages were sent 'earlier today' was odd. 

The series 'villain' didn't elaborate on the nature of the alleged texts either, leaving fans to speculate in the comments.

'Sneaky messages? Elaborate?' one asked, reflecting the general confusion of many of Dean's followers.

Several fans were certain the comment was a joke, made in an attempt to 'stir the pot' now that Tracey is happily back with her former flame Patrick Kedemos. 

'Traccceeeyyyyyy stop it!!! Nah. I thought it was a funny joke... I cannot understand why people can be a**ed writing negative comments. Get a life.'

Added another: 'She's back with another ex it's not Dean it's not Sean, yawn and yawn.' 

Tracey recently announced she was back with Patrick, the man she dated before going on MAFS.

The announcement came three-weeks after she confirmed her split with Sean Thomsen, citing his penchant for 'partying'.
