item.title: Rita Ora wows in bright blue crop top and matching skirt as she leaves NYC hotel to head to performance for LGBTQ gala
item.description: She's in the Big Apple to perform at the star-studded Trevor Project Gala.
item.content:encoded:
She's in the Big Apple to perform at the star-studded Trevor Project Gala.

And Rita Ora made sure to make an entrance to the event, dressing to the nines in a blue crop top and matching bodycon skirt as she headed to the LGBTQ gala on Monday night.

The singer looked sensational in her dressy look, teaming the bright blue ensemble with her orange locks.

Rita flashed a hint of her toned stomach in her scallop-edge top which was teamed with a matching high-waisted skirt.

The tight-fitting skirt featured a thigh-high split, showing off the star's long legs, which she accentuated further with white heels.

She added plenty of bling with a statement bracelet and cocktail ring, while her fiery locks added another bold hit of colour.

Coordinating eye shadow completed the very glam look.

Rita was on her way to the TrevorLive NY event at Ciprani, where she was scheduled to perform.   

Founded in 1998 by the creators of the Academy Award -winning short film TREVOR, The Trevor Project is the leading national organisation in the US, providing crisis intervention and suicide prevention services to lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender and questioning (LGBTQ) young people ages 13–24.

Recently, Rita, who has been dating songwriter Andrew Watt for more than a year, touched on her romantic experiences with men and women following the uproar over her single Girls.

Asked if the song linked to her sexuality, she said: 'I knew people were going to look into it like that. I definitely said it because I can - and it was one of those things where, if I was 50/50… I'm not saying I'm 70/30.'

'I'm 50/50, and I'm not gonna hide it. I'm not hiding what I am, who I am, if I wanna do this, if I wanna do that. That's just how it's gonna be.'

Despite meaning well, the Your Song hitmaker expressed her regret over unintentionally hurting members of the LGBTQ community with her lyrics.

She wrote on Twitter: 'I am sorry how I expressed myself in my song which has hurt anyone. Hello everyone reading this.

'Girls was written to represent my truth and is an accurate account of a very real and honest experience in my life.'

She added: 'I have had romantic relationships with women and men throughout my life and this is my personal journey.

'I would never intentionally cause harm to other LGBTQ+ people or anyone. Looking forward, I hope that continuing to express myself through my art will empower my fans to feel as proud of themselves as I'm learning to feel about who I am.'

However, Rita proved she's standing by her controversial new single as she released the song's raunchy new music video, which sees her share a passionate kiss with collaborator Cardi B, on Wednesday.

Rita, Cardi, Charli XCX and Bebe Rexha ooze sex appeal in the steamy girl-centric video, which isn't afraid to shock as the singers rock their raciest outfits and are frequently flanked by female models wearing the bare minimum.
item.dc:abstract: She's in the Big Apple to perform at the star-studded Trevor Project Gala. And Rita Ora made sure to make an entrance to the event, dressing to the nines in a blue crop top and matching bodycon skirt as she headed to the LGBTQ event on Monday night.
item.dc:creator: Joanna Crawley

item.title: 'They'll go home in their limousines to their mansions and cry into bags of money!' Kyle Sandilands slams 'loser' Robert De Niro and Hollywood elites after the actor delivered an anti-Trump tirade at the Tony Awards
item.description: Kyle Sandilands has slammed actor Robert De Niro for his anti-Donald Trump tirade at the Tony Awards in New York City on Sunday.
item.content:encoded:
Kyle Sandilands has slammed actor Robert De Niro for his anti-Donald Trump tirade at the Tony Awards in New York City on Sunday. 

Speaking on KIIS FM's The Kyle and Jackie O Show on Tuesday, Kyle raged: 'De Niro, such a disappointment. He's like an old, crying nutcase. Shut up, you loser!'

Kyle, 47, also took aim at Hollywood's elite attending the awards, saying: 'They'll go home in their limousines to their million-dollar mansions with all their chandeliers, and cry in their bags of money about how terrible their life is.'

Scroll down for video 

'Meanwhile Trump goes over and denuclearises a terror madman,' Kyle added, referencing the US President's historic meeting with Kim Jong-un in Singapore.

De Niro, 74, received a standing ovation at the Tony Awards when he declared onstage, 'I'm going to say one thing: f**k Trump!' while pumping his fists in the air.

'It's no longer "down with Trump", it's "f** Trump!"' he bellowed.

In 2011, De Niro compared Trump to a used car salesman.

And in May, the Goodfellas star said that he would ban the President from all of his Nobu restaurants. 

Kyle's anger against Hollywood elites may have been worsened by his tiredness after celebrating his 47th birthday over the weekend.

On Monday, Kyle's girlfriend Imogen Anthony, 26, livestreamed her tearful hangover via Instagram and admitted she had consumed two bottles of Baileys at the party.

'God, I've slept for like two days... I'm not OK. I'm so f**king hungry,' she said during the broadcast. 

The birthday party was catered by one of Australia's most exclusive restaurants, Sydney's Rockpool.

Speaking on KIIS FM's The Kyle and Jackie O Show on Tuesday, Kyle raged: 'De Niro, such a disappointment. He's like an old, crying nutcase. Shut up, you loser!' Kyle, 47, also took aim at Hollywood's elite attending the awards, saying: 'They'll go home in their limousines to their million-dollar mansions with all their chandeliers, and cry in their bags of money about how terrible their life is.'

item.title: Ariana Grande's engagement ring from Pete Davidson is 'big' as pop star poses with HUGE diamond
item.description: Ariana Grande's engagement ring is 'big'. The pop star., 24, is set to marry SNL funnyman Pete Davidson, 24, according to multiple sources and it's been reported he lavished her with quite the rock.
item.content:encoded:
Ariana Grande's engagement ring is 'big'.

The 24-year-old pop star is set to marry SNL funnyman Pete Davidson, 24, according to multiple sources and it's been reported he lavished her with quite the rock.

'All I know about the ring is that it’s big,' a source told People on Monday.

This comes hours after the No Tears Left To Cry posted a snap of herself wearing a diamond ring on her engagement finger as she posed with her brother and mother.

In the snap, Ariana is leaning on her mother Joan's shoulder where the gigantic jewel peeks out just below her chin.  

The two 'were telling people that they're engaged' at Robert Pattinson's birthday party in Los Angeles on Saturday, UsWeekly revealed.

And TMZ added that 24-year-old SNL funnyman popped the question 'last week.' 

The two started dating about a month ago. Bang Bang singer Ariana had only just broken up with rapper Mac Miller in April, while Davidson split from his long-time love in May.

'They are a perfect fit. They are not rushing to get married,' one insider said. 'Their friends are really excited and supportive.'

'They are both constantly making each other laugh,' the Us Weekly's first source added.

'Their moms have met. They've been very public with their relationship on social media, and they are very in love.' 

A third source said, 'They are looking forward to a very long engagement together.'

Grande's rep has yet to return calls to DailyMail.com for comment.

People magazine also had sources confirming they were set to wed, with one saying Ariana's ring was 'big'.

'It’s a recent engagement,' a source told the site.

'They’re just two people who found love quickly and make each other happy all the time. They both started talking about it this past weekend. It’s nothing they’ve been hiding.' 

Ariana has been posting on Twitter since the couple's news hit the web and her notes seem to express her joy about being newly engaged.

In one Tweet she wrote, 'Tell them how I'm defying gravity,' which is a line from Wicked; Ariana is rumored to be starring in an upcoming production of the musical.

She quickly followed that with a post that said, 'I love you (14 see-no-evil monkey emoji) sm  (24 see-no-evil monkey emoji) ok bye.'

The couple were seen together at a birthday party on Sunday in images shared to social media.

They were first reported to be dating in late May.

Several days later they became Instagram official with a cute Harry Potter post. 

Davidson has also gotten two tattoos that are a nod to the siren. Sitting just behind and below the comic's left ear, one piece of ink featured a mask with bunny ears symbol that has become synonymous with the Bang Bang singer.

The second tattoo was needled onto his thumb and simply featured the letters A and G, which likely has something to do with Ariana. 

Davidson, who lost his father in the 9/11 attacks, suffers from Borderline Personality Disorder, but has defended his relationship with Ariana.

'I been hearing a lot of "people with bpd can’t be in relationships" talk,' he wrote on Instagram. 'I just wanna let you know that’s not true. Just because someone has a mental illness does not mean they can’t be happy and in a relationship.' 

Ariana had been dating Miller for two years before she announced the end of the relationship on May 10 via a post to Instagram.

She wrote, 'Hi! This is one of my best friends in the whole world and favourite people on the planet Malcolm McCormick. 

'I respect and adore him endlessly and am grateful to have him in my life in any form, at all times regardless of how our relationship changes or what the universe holds for each of us!I can't wait to know and support you forever and I'm so proud of you!!'

Davidson previously dated Larry David's daughter Cazzie, and only confirmed the end of their two-year relationship on May 16. 

As news of the engagement broke, Cazzie posted a selfie of herself drinking a large glass of red wine, and happily winking at the camera.

Davidson and Ariana share more than just show business success - both young artists have dealt with terrorism-related tragedy in their lives. 

Twenty-three people were killed and more than 800 hurt in May 2017 during Ariana's show at Manchester, England's Manchester Arena following an attack by a suicide bomber.

Meanwhile Davidson was seven-years-old when he lost his firefighter father Scott during the September 11, 2001 attacks on the World Trade Center.

His mother, Amy, has talked of his total devastation at the loss, which affected him profoundly throughout his childhood.

She told the New York Times in 2015: ‘It’s sad how sad he was growing up.’

On one occasion, Davidson ended up ripping out all of his hair until he was bald. Amy noted that comedy, which Davidson started at the age of 16, was what made him ‘really, really happy’.

His rise through the comedy circuit was stratospheric, and he was just 20 when in 2014 he joined the SNL cast. 

Also on Monday, Ariana and Nicki Minaj announced a new song together.
item.dc:abstract: Ariana Grande's engagement ring is 'big'. The 24-year-old pop star is set to marry SNL funnyman Pete Davidson, 24, according to multiple sources and it's been reported he lavished her with quite the rock. 'All I know about the ring is that it’s big,' a source told People on Monday.

item.title: 'It's not true! I'm pretty upset about that': Love Island's Natasha Webster denies rumours about having sex with Justin Bieber and insists she is 'the most innocent girl in the villa'
item.description: 'It's not true! I'm pretty upset about that. I definitely didn't hook up or sleep with Justin Bieber,' the 24-year-old protested on the Kyle and Jackie O show on Tuesday.
item.content:encoded:
She previously boasted about being 'lucky enough' to have 'partied' with Justin Bieber for two nights. 

But after being eliminated from Love Island on Monday, Natasha Webster denied rumours she slept with the Canadian pop star.

'It's not true! I'm pretty upset about that. I definitely didn't hook up or sleep with Justin Bieber,' she said on The Kyle and Jackie O Show on Tuesday.

Natasha's repeated denials came after radio presenter Kyle Sandilands declared: 'We all know you've slept with Bieber. Everyone in Australia knows.'

But she insisted: 'No, no. Not at all! It sucks that people are thinking that!'

'What do you mean?' Kyle replied. 'Didn't you sign an NDA [non-disclosure agreement]? You don't have to sign that if you don't have the whoopy-do-dah.'

Stepping in, co-host Jackie 'O' Henderson asked more tactfully: 'Did you party with Justin Bieber?'

Natasha paused for a moment before replying hesitantly: 'I partied with somebody called Justin, but that's all.'

She continued: 'I don't want people to think that I have slept with him when I haven't.'

'Maybe a bit of oral or something?' Kyle asked, to which Natasha responded: 'No! Nothing. No sexual relations at all.'

The blonde bombshell then claimed she hadn't slept with someone for 'ages'.

'I don't sleep with guys unless they're my semi-boyfriend. I'm not that type of girl. I'm the most innocent girl in the villa,' she said.

Meanwhile, Natasha told News.com.au following her Love Island exit that she is not allowed to disclose whether it was Justin Bieber who she spent two nights with. 

'I'm not allowed to confirm whether it was Justin Bieber,' she said cryptically.

'There's lots of Justins out there that I could have partied with, you never know which Justin it was. I'll just keep that a secret for myself!'

Natasha was previously mocked by Love Island's own narrator, Eoghan McDermott, for her connection to Justin.

Earlier in the season, Natasha played a game of 'spin the bottle' with her co-stars, during which she confessed to 'spending two nights with one of the world's biggest pop stars'.

When her fellow Islanders asked Natasha to identify the mystery celebrity, she claimed she couldn't reveal his name.

'Secrets! I'm not allowed to tell. It was a pretty fun two nights,' she said.

Eoghan then dropped several hints for Love Island viewers, leaving no doubt as to who Natasha had supposedly slept with. 

'We can't tell you his name directly, but we might drop some vague clues during the show,' said Eoghan. 'In unrelated news, did you know that Kim has a baby, baby, oh?' 

He added: 'Leave her alone guys! She signed a thing. And if she breached the thing she signed, it would be... too late now to say sorry.'
item.dc:abstract: She previously boasted about being 'lucky enough' to have 'partied' with Justin Bieber for two nights. But after being booted out of Love Island on Monday, Natasha Cherie Webster repeatedly denied having sex with the Canadian megastar. 'It's not true! I'm pretty upset about that. I definitely didn't hook up or sleep with Justin Bieber,' the 24-year-old protested on the Kyle and Jackie O show on Tuesday.
item.dc:creator: Ekin Karasin
item.mi:shortTitle: Love Island's Natasha denies having sex with Justin Bieber again

item.title: Amy Schumer goes makeup-free in skinny jeans as she runs errands in NYC with hubby Chris Fischer
item.description: The couple, who wed in February, walked their first red carpet together on Sunday night at the Tony Awards.
item.content:encoded:
She walked her first red carpet with husband Chris Fischer by her side on Sunday night at the Tony Awards.

And on Monday, Amy Schumer was all smiles as the two went run around together in New York together.

The actress and comedienne, 37, was fresh-faced and casually dressed after glamming it up at the awards show hours earlier.

Amy paired blue skinny jeans with a blue top and blue-and-white cardigan.

She went sock-less in a pair of comfy black trainers and her long blonde hair was swept back from her face.

Chris, 38, was also dressed down, sporting a white tee and dark gray shorts along with black socks and black sneakers. 

The I Feel Pretty star and the chef tied the knot in February after a three-month whirlwind romance. 

'What a good idea to marry a chef,' she said during a recent appearance on Live with Kelly and Ryan. 'I’m sorry, it’s the best.'  

'I never have (to cook) and I never will now, yeah,' she added. 'It’s great. It’s the smartest thing by far.'

The couple scrubbed up to put n a stylish show at the Tony Awards where Amy was nominated for her performance in the play Meteor Shower. 

She showed off her curves in a sleeveless black gown with a halter neck and a slit at the front while Chris looked dapper in a black suit with white shirt and a black tie.

Later on Monday, Amy was seen still running errands, and playing for the cameras.

She wore the same outfit as earlier and had a Time'sUp canvas tote slung over one shoulder.

The Inside Amy Schumer star was accompanied by a female assistant.
item.dc:abstract: She walked her first red carpet with husband Chris Fischer by her side on Sunday night at the Tony Awards. And on Monday, Amy Schumer was all smiles as the two went run around together in New York together. The actress and comedienne, 37, was fresh-faced and casually dressed after glamming it up at the awards show hours earlier.
item.dc:creator: Rachel McGrath

item.title: Rachel McCord flaunts fit figure in crop top and see-through skirt as she attends Rosé Day LA
item.description: Rachel McCord flaunted her summer body as she attended Rose Day LA on Saturday. The 28-year-old beauty left little to the imagination as she donned a white crop top and see-through dress.
item.content:encoded:
Rachel McCord flaunted her summer body as she attended Rosé Day LA on Saturday.

The 28-year-old beauty left little to the imagination as she donned a white crop top and see-through dress.

She joined a slew of celebrities who headed up to Saddlerock Ranch in Malibu, California for the Moet & Chandon headlined event with Bertaud Belieu Rosé as the event’s wine partner. 

Her torso looked slender and toned between the skimpy top and flower emblazoned skirt.

The sister of AnnaLynne McCord showcased her legs beneath the sheer bottom garment.

She attended the pink wine celebration with her husband Rick Schirmer, who donned blue jeans and a white t-shirt along.

The already leggy bombshell added a couple extra inches with a pair of open-toed, beige heels.

She donned three necklaces of different lengths and carried a pink purse as she headed into the wine-filled wonderland.

Pulling her dirty blonde tresses into an easy bun, Rachel added a pair of chic circular sunglasses to complete her ensemble.

She painted her lips a playful rose and was seen toasting the celebratory day with various friend.

Reminding others that rose is not to be treated with snobbish tone that wine often dictates, she sipped the pink nectar from a gold-swirled straw.

Also in attendance for the celebration were models Alessandra Ambrosio and Ludi Delfino, who both looked divine in chic summer wear.

Jeremy Renner cut a classy figure in a grey pant, jacket, shoe combo as he sipped wine along the grass.

Ashlee Simpson and her husband Evan Ross were also in attendance as they opted to don matching hats during the sunny event.

Caroline D'Amore looked stylish in an intricate white dress that featured various textures.

Gilles Marini opted for casual look that was perfect for the event as we wore a black t-shirt along with baby pink chinos.

Rocky Barnes donned a checkered black and white dress that showed off the model's toned torso as she carried a pink parasol.
item.dc:abstract: Rachel McCord flaunted her summer body as she attended Rose Day LA on Saturday. The 28-year-old beauty left little to the imagination as she donned a white crop top and see-through dress. She joined a slew of celebrities who headed up to Saddlerock Ranch in Malibu, California for the Moet & Chandon headlined event.

item.title: Alessandra Ambrosio shows off her model legs in flirty polka-dot mini dress to Rosé Day LA in Malibu
item.description: Alessandra Ambrosio enjoyed a fun-filled weekend. On Saturday, the 37-year-old model attended Rose Day LA at Saddlerock Ranch in Malibu.
item.content:encoded:
Alessandra Ambrosio enjoyed a fun-filled weekend. 

On Saturday, the 37-year-old model attended Rosé Day LA at Saddlerock Ranch in Malibu.

She was spotted wearing a flirty, polka-dot dress and black boots. 

Ambrosio paired her frilly, white frock with gold earrings and red cat-eye sunglasses. 

She had her hair pulled back in a loose bun and her nails were painted a luscious red.  

The Brazil native carried her belongings in a small black purse. 

Alessandra was joined at the event by fellow model Ludi Delfino. 

The former Victoria's Secret model was also seen mingling with DJ Zen Freeman and a slew of other celebrities.  

On Sunday, the Jordache brand ambassador spent the day beachside with her two children—Noah, age six, and Anja, age nine.

She shares her little ones with former fiance Jamie Mazur, 37. 

The couple split back in March after 10 year together.
item.dc:abstract: Alessandra Ambrosio enjoyed a fun-filled weekend. On Saturday, the 37-year-old model attended Rose Day LA at Saddlerock Ranch in Malibu. She was spotted wearing a flirty, polka-dot dress and black boots.

item.title: 'What's in their right ear?' MasterChef Australia fans are left baffled by the judges wearing earpieces during pre-recorded episode
item.description: Fans are left confused by the MasterChef Australia judges wearing ear pieces during Monday night's pre-recorded episode.
item.content:encoded:
Monday night's episode of MasterChef Australia saw the amateur chefs travel to South Australia and reconstruct a truly difficult dessert. 

But during the critique of their desserts, some fans were more baffled as to why the judges were wearing earpieces during the pre-recorded episode.

'What's in all the judges' right ear?' one viewer posted on Twitter. 

Seated at a large dinner table, George and fellow judge Gary Mehigan drew attention to a small audio-type device in their right ear while discussing how to rate their dishes.   

Daily Mail Australia has reached out to Network Ten for comment. 

During the episode, contestants were taken to the space-age Cube Restaurant in McLaren Vale and faced with recreating an innovative 'pie' by chef Brendan Wessels.

There were audible gasps from the cooks as the 'lemon meringue pie,' which was partly made on a 3D printer and looked more like a Lego creation, was unveiled.    

The shocked contestants were told by chef Brendan that the dessert contained: 'Lemon curd parfait balls, and lemon curd gel on the side. Then we have the nitro fennel balls.' 

He added: 'And coconut rocher, and then we have a meringue sheet that sits on the top. On the base, with the 3D printer, we have the caramelised white chocolates.' 

Judge George Calombaris told the stunned cooks: 'Today you'll be using a 3D food printer. There's no other restaurant in Australia that has one. And only a handful of chefs that have ever used one.'
item.dc:abstract: Monday night's episode of MasterChef Australia saw the amateur chefs travel to South Australia and reconstruct a truly difficult dessert. But during the critique of their desserts, fans were more baffled as to why the judges were wearing earpieces during the pre-recorded episode. 'What's in all the judges' right ear?' one viewer posted on Twitter .
item.dc:creator: Kristy Johnson
item.mi:shortTitle: MasterChef fans left baffled by the judges wearing earpieces

item.title: Dawn Ward EXCLUSIVE: Real Housewives of Cheshire star slams 'egotistical' Jonathan Wilkes after heated row at charity ball
item.description: Real Housewives of Cheshire star Dawn Ward has slammed TV star Jonathan Wilkes as 'egotistical' after a heated row at a charity auction over the weekend.
item.content:encoded:
Real Housewives of Cheshire star Dawn Ward has slammed TV star Jonathan Wilkes as 'egotistical' after a heated row at a charity auction over the weekend.

Speaking to MailOnline a representative for the reality star explained that she got into a row with Wilkes who was acting as compere for the auction hosted by the Donna Louise Trust Ball on Friday night in Stoke-On-Trent.

Dawn hit back at claims from onlookers that she arrived drunk and was a 'complete mess,' with her representative insisting that she was trying to donate a prize to the charity auction when the row erupted.

The charity offers end of life care and support for children and young adults with life-limiting conditions, alongside helping their families. 

An eyewitness had previously told the MailOnline that 'Jonathan Wilkes has been involved in the ball for years and she really had a pop at him and when ladies tried to step in she pushed them away.

'The whole room was watching and there was about 500 people there. Jonathan got back on stage after the incident and said that he’s never had that in all the years he’s been hosting the event. 

As video obtained by The Sun shows, Dawn and another woman got into a heated row off stage, with Dawn seen pushing away while exchanging insults with Jonathan before the Real Housewives star walked off. 

Her representative explained to MailOnline: 'Dawn arrived at the event late as she had a work commitment. She jumped in the car and hadn't had drop of alcohol.'

'She was sat at the tale, the auction started. She was talking to friends saying how she could donate a prize from her company Sculpt, a non-surgical company. She had got the price up to £5,000 so she went over and tried to tell him [Wilkes] and offer the prize.'

'It was quite complicated to explain to him while he was on stage so she sat back down, Dawn didn't ask to take the microphone but then he said "nobody's here to steal my thunder."'  

'A lady tried to step in grabbing her arms quite aggressively so Dawn pushed free to leave the situation.' 

'Surely it's about money for the charity rather than anyone's ego? She admits she got frustrated, but there were insults coming both ways, it was quite aggressive.'

'She was trying to explain why she was angry but he was more interested in his ego than the charity. He said he could have her chucked out but she told him "I'm leaving anyway".'

A representative for Jonathan Wilkes has been contacted by MailOnline for comment. 

Dawn has four daughters (Darby, Taylor, Charlie and Aston) who she shares with her footballer husband Ashley.

Dawn and former Manchester City star Ashley met when she was a young model in a car park in Bolton, and the Liz Hurley lookalike admits that she originally went on a date with him to make her ex-boyfriend jealous.

However, the pair hit it off and Ashley asked her to marry him five years later - in the very same car park. She has starred on RHOC since 2015.
item.dc:abstract: Real Housewives of Cheshire star Dawn Ward has slammed TV star Jonathan Wilkes as 'egotistical' after a heated row at a charity auction over the weekend. Speaking to MailOnline a representative for the reality star explained that she got into a row with Wilkes at the Donna Louise Trust Ball on Friday night in in Stoke-On-Trent.

item.title: Is that you, Maximus? Gladiator star Russell Crowe sports a bushy beard as he looks more unrecognisable by the day while sightseeing in Florence
item.description: He was one of Hollywood's most desirable men in the early 2000s.
item.content:encoded:
He was one of Hollywood's most desirable men in the early 2000s.

But it appears Russell Crowe is happy to embrace middle age like a true Australian. 

The 54-year-old actor enjoyed a few glasses of beer in-between sightseeing in  Florence, Italy on Monday. 

Scroll down for video 

Looking more unrecognisable by the day, Russell blended in with other tourists as he stopped for an afternoon drink.

The Gladiator star sported a bushy, grey beard and dressed casually in a black singlet and shorts.

He finished off his look with a baseball cap featuring the logo of his beloved South Sydney Rabbitohs NRL team. 

After stopping for drinks, the New Zealand-born star and his companions resumed their tour of Florence. 

Among Russell's group of friends was a young woman who could possibly be his assistant.

It has certainly been an eventful European getaway for the Oscar winner. 

Last week, Russell attended a charity screening of Gladiator at the Parco Archeologico del Colosseo in Rome.

During the event he reunited with his former co-star Connie Nielsen, who played Lucilla in the 2000 historical epic.

Italian retired soccer player Francesco Totti was also among the celebrity guests at the presentation.
item.dc:abstract: He was one of Hollywood's most desirable men in the early 2000s. But it appears Russell Crowe is happy to embrace middle age like a true Australian. The 54-year-old actor enjoyed a few glasses of beer in-between sightseeing in Florence, Italy on Monday.

item.title: Lauren Scruggs flaunts ample cleavage in low-cut swimsuit on Miami holiday with hubby Jason Kennedy
item.description: They're the loved up couple who've been married for three-and-a-half years. And Lauren Scruggs looked amazing when she joined her husband Jason Kennedy, 36, in Miami on
item.content:encoded:
They're the loved up couple who've been married for three-and-a-half years. 

And Lauren Scruggs looked amazing when she joined her husband Jason Kennedy, 36, in Miami on Monday. 

Enjoying a romantic vacation together, the 29-year-old flaunted her ample cleavage in a red bathing suit while enjoying a cold beverage.  

Scroll down for video  

Lauren, who rose to fame after losing her left arm and left eye after walking into a plane propeller in 2011, paired her revealing one-piece with a pair of cut-off denim shorts.  

She appeared to be makeup free and kept a low profile with large sunglasses. 

The blogger embraced the vacation lifestyle by leaving her blonde locks untamed.

Jason was also seen sitting relaxing by the pool shirtless while shielding himself from the strong Florida sun with a pair of shades.

Lauren and her E! News beau have been vacationing at the 1 Hotel on South Beach since Sunday. 

The couple's time away marks six months since Lauren made headlines for defending her husband's reported $1.2 million salary in comparison to his female co-host Catt Sadler's below $600,000. 

The pay disparity led Catt to leave NBC based on her claim that the gap in salary was rooted in gender based discrimination.

At the time, Lauren released a lengthy blog post defending the company, deeming that 'a network (that truly cares about its employees) is being deemed as sexist when that is simply not true.' 

But it wasn't long until stars such as Amy Schumer, Eva Longoria, Reese Witherspoon and Debra Messing sent their support to the brunette bombshell both online and while on red carpets.   

'We support gender equity and equal pay and we hope that E! follows that lead with Catt as well,' said Eva on the E! network while being interviewed by Ryan Seacrest on the 2018 Golden Globes red carpet.  

'We stand with you, Catt,' she added.

Taking some time out of the spotlight, the much loved mother-of-two has since launched her own podcast series and Monday saw her relaunch her blog site The Cattwalk.

The new and improved blog sees interviews from a variety of the nation's top stars including comedian Amy Schumer and the fiance of Mohamed Hadid - Shiva Safai.
item.dc:abstract: They're the loved up couple who've been married for three-and-a-half years. And Lauren Scruggs looked amazing when she joined her husband Jason Kennedy, 36, in Miami on Monday. Enjoying a romantic vacation together, the 29-year-old flaunted her ample cleavage in a red bathing suit while enjoying a cold beverage.

item.title: Bachelor baby news! Reality TV lovebirds Matty 'J' Johnson and Laura Byrne reveal a bundle of joy is on the way
item.description: Speaking to TV Week magazine, Matty, 30, explained that the pair had become broody after being 'surrounded by babies
item.content:encoded:
She is about to move into his Bondi abode this month.

And now Bachelor stars Matty 'J' Johnson and Laura Byrne have announced some more exciting relationship news. 

The couple have revealed they are going to try for a baby in 12 months.

Speaking to TV Week magazine, Matty, 30, explained that the pair have become broody after being 'surrounded by babies'.

'I'm hoping in 12 months' time we'll be looking to start a family,' the marketing director excitedly told the publication.

'Laura's definitely the person I want to have a family with, but we're just so busy.'

Laura's sister gave birth to baby called Archer last month, while Matty is the proud uncle of two young nephews.

The lovebirds certainly have had a hectic schedule of late.

Laura, 32, recently opened her first standalone jewellery store ToniMay in Paddington, and Matty was busy helping her remodel it. 

Matty revealed in May that Laura was moving in to his Bondi home after the couple celebrated their one year anniversary. 

At the launch of Laura's jewellery store, Matty gleamed with joy when he told Daily Mail Australia: 'She’s moving into my house!'

'It’s a nice little bit to look forward to, we were always umming and ahhing if I would move to Rushcutters Bay or she would move to Bondi and the way it’s worked out, we decided Bondi,' he said.

Coming with Laura will be her adorable three-legged rescue dog Buster, with Matty J hopeful to help the pup combat his fear of the ocean.

'We’ve taken him to North Bondi a few times, he’s afraid of the water and he’s not a great swimmer with only having the three legs, but I will definitely bring him down to Ben Buckler?' he said. 

Matty and Laura found love on The Bachelor last year and have been going strong ever since.
item.dc:abstract: She is about to move into his Bondi pad in the next coming weeks. And now Matty 'J' Johnson and Laura Byrne have announced some more exciting news. The couple have revealed they are going to try for a baby in the next 12 months.
item.dc:creator: Jade Watkins
item.mi:shortTitle: Matty 'J' Johnson and Laura Byrne reveal a bundle of joy is on the way

item.title: Love Island cliffhanger teases HUGE bust-up between Rosie and Adam as his shocking secret is revealed
item.description: Monday's episode of Love Island teased a massive falling-out between Adam Collard and Rosie Williams - and fans are scratching their heads trying to figure out what happened
item.content:encoded:
It's the reality show that knows how to send fans into a frenzy with its high drama and risque scenes. 

And Monday's episode of Love Island teased a massive falling-out between current couple Adam Collard and Rosie Williams ahead of the next episode.

In tumultuous scenes set to air on Tuesday, the Welsh beauty will confront the 23-year-old hunk about a huge secret he's been keeping - and fans are struggling to wait to find out the truth.

In the promo clip, Rosie is comforted by villa pal Georgia Steel, who is seen to be shocked about what the brunette beauty revealed as she gasps 'Are you serious?'

Narrator Iain Stirling hints further at the bust-up, as he asks:  'Is someone hiding a secret?'

Rosie confidently walks up to Adam while hanging out with all the other hopefuls, and boldly faces up to him. 

Clearly seething at the exchange, the frustrated solicitor asks: 'Do you want to tell me something?'

Rosie continued: 'Something that happened today that you should have perhaps had the balls to tell me before.

Adam then sheepishly asks: 'What you on about?' while the rest of the islanders look on in confusion. 

Doing her best to keep a level head, Rosie responds: 'I dunno, what am I on about? Everyone else in the group knows about it, you may as well share it. The group's waiting.'

Clearly devastated by the secret Adam's been concealing, Rosie breaks down in front of the other girls, and through tears says: 'I don't get why I'm not enough for someone...'

Unable to contain their curiosity, viewers at home have been scratching their heads trying to figure out what the secret could possibly be. 

'What a shocker. Adam snakes Rosie according to tomorrow's episode' one unsurprised fan wrote on Twitter. 

 'Can we just find out what Adam has done now pls' commented another. 

Others have been trying to work out what the Geordie lad has done, with many guessing  that Rosie had caught him texting villa newbie Megan, who entered just the day before. 

'I have a feeling that on the sly Adam text Megan and Rosie caught him' quizzed one fan, while another concurred writing: 'I think Adam has text Megan at 4am asking if "she's up" whilst in bed with Rosie'.

Adam earned his bad boy status after harshly dumping Kendall Rae-Knight and quickly latching onto Rosie, who he was spotted kissing just moments after leaving Kendall. 

Meanwhile,  fans were left furious after unlucky-in-love Dr Alex finally saw some action with Essex model Megan on Monday night's Love Island, but their intimate chat was abruptly cut short by Eyal, who swooped in to talk to the blonde beauty too.

Viewers at home vented their frustration for Alex after he failed to find any connection with the original girls, and blasted Eyal for interrupting their sweet moment - before kissing the sexy newbie during a saucy dare challenge.
item.dc:abstract: It's the reality show that knows how to send fans into a frenzy with its high drama and risque scenes. And Monday's episode of Love Island teased a massive falling-out between current couple Adam Collard and Rosie Williams ahead of Tuesday's episode. In tumultuous scenes set to air tomorrow, the Welsh beauty will confront the 23-year-old hunk about a huge secret he's been keeping - and fans are struggling to wait to find out the truth.

item.title: 'We have to go back to Los Angeles': Teresa Palmer is forced to leave her native Australia due to visa issues for her son Bodhi, four
item.description: She's the Australian actress who has made a name for herself in Hollywood.
item.content:encoded:
She's the Australian actress who has made a name for herself in Hollywood. 

And this week, Teresa Palmer has revealed that she must jet out of Australia, where she is shooting her new film, due to visa issues involving her son Bodhi, four.

The 32-year-old, who will finish filming Michelle Payne biopic Ride Like a Girl this week, is heading back to LA because her son is only on an Australian visitor visa.

Scroll down for video 

Speaking to The Daily Telegraph, Teresa explained that she will be in Adelaide for a few more days until she jets to California.

She said her family will then head to Indonesia for a few months, where he will go to school.

'We only get three months which is crazy. I have to get his citizenship taken care of so he's at the end of his visa and we have to go back to LA,' Teresa said. 

Regarding her decision to send Bodhi to school in Indonesia, Teresa added: 'It's a very philanthropic, mindful school.'

Teresa hails from Adelaide but is based in America with her film director husband Mark Webber and their children.

Bodhi was born in the United States.  

Last month, Teresa was reportedly left 'shaken' after being forced to jump from a 'spooked' horse when it bolted while filming Ride Like a Girl. 

'She was shaken but not hurt. Teresa is back riding on set again and doing amazing work as Michelle Payne,' a producer told the Herald Sun at the time. 

He explained how Teresa rode the horse until it slowed down, before jumping off in case it bolted again.

'Teresa had considerable horse riding training before commencing filming and, due to her skill, she rode the horse brilliantly until it slowed down,' they added.

Ride Like A Girl is based on Michelle Payne's life and career, including her historic Melbourne Cup win in 2015.
item.dc:abstract: She's the Australian actress who has made a name for herself in Hollywood. And this week, Teresa Palmer has revealed that she must jet out of Australia, where she is shooting her new film, due to visa issues involving her son Bodhi, four. The 32-year-old, who will finish filming Michelle Payne biopic Ride Like a Girl this week, is heading back to LA because her son is only on an Australian visitor visa.
item.dc:creator: Chloe-Lee Longhetti
item.mi:shortTitle: Teresa Palmer forced to leave her native Australia due to visa issues

item.title: Star Trek vet Jon Paul Steuer's January death at age 33 is ruled a suicide
item.description: The actor-turned-musician, who played Klingon child Alexander Rozhenko, died of a self-inflicted shotgun, according to the Portland, Oregon police on Monday, some six months after he passed away.
item.content:encoded:
The death of former Star Trek actor Jon Paul Steuer has been ruled a suicide.

Jon, who was 33 years old, died on January 1 from a self-inflicted gunshot wound, according to The Blast, citing the Portland, Oregon police on Monday.

As a child, Jon played Alexander Rozhenko, the son of Klingon Worf, an officer on the USS Enterprise in The Next Generation saga of the sci-fi series.

He also held other memorable roles in the 1990s including Johnny Vennaro in pee-wee football classic, Little Giants.

And he was a regular as Quentin Kelly in Grace Under Fire, created by Big Bang Theory's Chuck Lorre and Brett Butler, before quitting acting in 1996.

Jon went on to forge a career as a musician and restaurateur as he bowed out of the spotlight.

However tributes still poured in for the star from loyal Star Trek fans who remembered him from the show.

When news of his death surfaced, the official Facebook account for the show wrote a tribute reading: 'Rest in Peace, Jon Paul Steuer, the first actor to play Alexander in TNG. You will be deeply missed.'

His bandmates from the group P.R.O.B.L.E.M.S confirmed his death in a heartbreaking tribute on Facebook in early January. 

'The addition of Jonny to our dysfunctional band family was one of the best choices that we have ever made, and he brought a much-needed sense of fun and lightheartedness to everything we did,' they wrote. 

 'He was only with us for a little more than a year, but we managed to cram a lifetime of great experiences into his tenure as our singer…

'We’ve lost our singer, but far, far more than that we’ve lost a friend. Rest in peace, Jonny…we love you.” 

Jon was the first actor to play the Alexander, a child Klingon who was the son of The Next Generation regular Worf.

His first appearance in the show was in the 1990 episode of the show, Reunion.

Jon went on to star in ABC sitcom Grace Under Fire, leaving after three seasons.

Two seasons later, the show was canceled, with the final years plagued by lead actress Brett Butler's substance abuse problems.

Jon quit acting partly because of the negative attention the show and Brett received, he said in a 2015 AV Club interview.

'I wanted to forge on with acting after quitting the show, and I went out on a few interviews,' he said. 'But even then they'd turn into question-and-answer sessions with casting agents about Grace Under Fire. 

'I was kind of blown away by how unprofessional people inside the industry were. It really soured me. I didn't want that kind of attention.'

After leaving acting, Jon joined the glam punk band Kill City Thrillers, which changed its name to Soda Pop Kids in 2005.

He used the name Jonny P Jewels when he performed as lead singer for the band before it dissolved in 2009.  He joined P.R.O.B.L.E.M.S. a little over a year ago.

Following the announcement of Jon's death, the legion of fans of the show, known as Trekkies, took to Facebook with tributes.

One person wrote: 'RIP actor Jon Paul Steuer gone too soon in life..Live long and prosper in the heavens.... Too bad they don't allow pictures. I was going to put a pic of the Klingon death roar like I did on another page. :(... 

'So I will just say he was a good actor and he will always be remembered... It would be nice to see a Klingon memorial placed for him too.. May you find your way to StoVoKor!... That sucks. Hopefully he's found some peace finally... Sad news, may he rest in peace.'
item.dc:abstract: The death of former Star Trek actor Jon Paul Steuer has been ruled a suicide. Jon, who was 33 years old, died on January 1 from a self-inflicted gunshot wound, according to The Blast, citing the Portland, Oregon police on Monday. As a child, Jon played Alexander Rozhenko, the son of Klingon Worf, an officer on the USS Enterprise in The Next Generation saga of the sci-fi series.

item.title: Ariana Grande teases Nicki Minaj collaboration... after claims singer, 24, is engaged to Pete Davidson
item.description: They have collaborated on two smash hit singles. And with their upcoming duet Bed, which will be released this Thursday, Nicki Minaj, 35, and Ariana Grande, 24, are together again.
item.content:encoded:
They have collaborated on two smash hit singles. And with their upcoming duet Bed, which will be released this Thursday, Nicki Minaj, 35, and Ariana Grande, 24, are together again.

Ariana announced the single on Monday, posting a sizzling Instagram snap of herself cuddling up to Nicki amid a swirl of foam in a swimming pool.

This news comes the day several outlets claimed Ariana is engaged to her boyfriend of only a few weeks, Pete Davidson. He reportedly proposed less than a week ago.

Scroll down for video 

In the photo, Ariana was moving to give a kiss on the cheek to Nicki, who closed her eyes and leaned her head back on her fellow pop star's shoulder. 

'Bed out Thursday #Queen @nickiminaj i love you forever & ever,' wrote Ariana, who is the featured performer on the forthcoming song.

Also on Monday, she posted a photo of herself hugging Nicki just outside the swimming pool, captioning: 'ugh we so CUTE tho'.

The same day, Nicki announced the release of Rich Sex, her single featuring Lil Wayne. She broke the news by lighting up her Instagram page with the cover art, on which she posed in a skimpy set of underwear.

Ariana had teased Bed near the end of last month, posting a dimly lit Instagram video of herself sitting in the car, listening to a bit of the song.

Showing off her glittering silver fingernails, Ariana mouthed along to Nicki's rap verse, but stopped as soon as her own voice came over the speakers.

Over the weekend, the pair cuddled up to each other on Nicki's Insta Stories, putting on a filter that made their voices sound more high-pitched and nasal than usual. 

'One...two...three - Eat my a**,' said the scintillating double-act for the benefit of Nicki's more than 87 million Instagram followers.

Ariana and Nicki both featured on English singer Jessie J's rollicking 2014 single Bang Bang, which catapulted to No. 3 on the Billboard Hot 100.

Without Jessie, Nicki and Ariana got back together for 2016's Side To Side, which peaked at No. 4 on the Billboard Hot 100 and was on Ariana's album My Everything.

Both pop acts have albums in the works - Ariana's forthcoming record Sweetener and Nicki's Queen are slated for release in August of this year.

Sweetener's lead single No Tears Left To Cry, which contained references to the jihadist suicide bombing that killed 22 people at her Manchester concert last May, was released this April and peaked at No. 3 on the Billboard Hot 100.

This April 12, Nicki double-dropped Queen's lead singles Chun-Li and Barbie Tingz. Queen was originally scheduled to bow this Friday, but is now deferred to August 10.

Ariana referred to another one of her professional ambitions Monday, tweeting: 'tell them how i'm defying gravity' - a lyric from the 2003 Broadway show Wicked.

There was a swirl of rumors in March that Ariana would be entering the show on Broadway in the lead part of Elphaba, the Wicked Wicked Of The West.

Appearing on Carpool Karoake last year, she had told James Corden's guest-host Seth MacFarlane that 'One of my dream roles is to play Elphaba.'

item.title: Ashlee Simpson and Evan Ross look cuddly as they attend first ever Rosé Day LA in Malibu
item.description: Ashlee Simpson, 33, and her husband Evan Ross, 29, appear to like to celebrate good food and wine.
item.content:encoded:
Ashlee Simpson, 33, and her husband Evan Ross, 29, appear to like to celebrate good food and wine.

The singers headed to Rosé Day LA at Saddlerock Ranch in Malibu Saturday to get a little taste of Europe.

The duo easily stood out thanks to their matching black, brimmed hats.

Ashlee wore a boho-inspired, sheer, black and floral dress. Ruffles lined its long sleeves and the front, and the neckline was very modest.

She topped off the look with simple jewelry and black and gold, round sunglasses. 

The Pieces of Me singer wore minimal makeup and her signature blonde locks were placed in a low bun. 

As for Diana Ross' son, he sported orange pants with a brown belt. He wore a ripped, Ramones, white t-shirt that showed off the tattoos on his arms.

The best part about his look had to be the Gunner Foxx hat he was wearing on his head.

Celebs enjoyed an amazing menu curated by famed Iron Chef star Marc Forgione, as well as eats created by Top Chef star Dakota Weiss, who collaborated with Sweetfin Poké. 

And if that wasn’t enough, guests also grabbed a bite from one of the gourmet food trucks on hand!

In between all the delicious treats, celebs including Leonardo diCaprio, Lana Del Ray, Scott Eastwood and Audrina Patridge  danced and partied along to music performances by DJs Zen Freeman, Devin Lucien, and Caroline D’Amore.

Rick Schirmer (L) and Rachel McCord poses on the grass. She wore a fun floral skirt. 

The whole shindig was for a good cause. A portion of the proceeds from ticket sales were donated to the event’s charity partner, The Art of Elysium.

item.title: How romantic! Tim Robards and Anna Heinrich invite their friends along to their honeymoon as they take a cruise around Turkey on a giant yacht
item.description: After their stunning wedding in Puglia over the weekend, the pair have jetted to Turkey, hiring a giant yacht to sail around the Aegean or Mediterranean sea.
item.content:encoded:
Jesinta Campbell and Buddy Franklin did it, and and so did Jennifer Aniston and Justin Theroux after they tied the knot.

And now Tim Robards and Anna Heinrich have followed the increasingly popular trend of inviting their friends on their honeymoon.

After their stunning wedding in Italy over the weekend, the pair have jetted to Turkey, hiring a giant yacht to sail around the Aegean or Mediterranean sea.

Scroll down for video  

Anna posted a video of the couple's impressive boat on Monday, with several of their friends seen on-board sun baking. 

She simply captioned the envy-inducing snap 'wow'.

Meanwhile, her former Bachelor co-star Sarah-Mae Louise Amey, who has joined the couple, also uploaded a video of the beginning of the group's voyage, remarking 'Mate moon = when your mates invite you on their honey moon.'

Anna and Tim were surrounded by their nearest and dearest last Thursday when they exchanged vows in a romantic ceremony held at the Masseria Potenti in Manduria. 

According to an insider, the sunset ceremony took place at 6:30pm and 'Anna looked beautiful and totally at ease' as she walked towards Tim.

The newlyweds met in 2013 during the first season of The Bachelor Australia.

Anna beat out 24 other single ladies, including new Bachelorette Ali Oetjen, to capture Tim's heart.

The couple moved in together in mid-2014, and are currently based in the Sydney beachside suburb of Bondi.

Tim had proposed with a diamond ring rumoured to cost $173,000 while the couple were on holiday in Kimberley, WA in May 2017.

Anna told NW that she and Tim plan to have children 'within a year or two'.

She even hinted at a rather unusual name for the firstborn son, saying they had picked out Rocky Robards.

item.title: Is their bromance over? Claims Karl Stefanovic's friendship with troubled casino mogul James Packer could be strained 'as they have not been seen together for months'
item.description: It looks like one of Australia's most famous 'bromances' could be on the rocks.
item.content:encoded:
It looks like one of Australia's most famous 'bromances' could be on the rocks.

After years of friendship, it has been claimed relations between Karl Stefanovic and James Packer appear strained.

According to Women's Day on Monday, Karl, 43, and James, 50, 'have not been seen together for months'.

Scroll down for video 

Karl and James were apparently most recently seen together on the billionaire casino mogul's yacht last summer.

'Sources' are now wondering about the future of their longtime friendship, the magazine claimed.

Karl has allegedly stayed out of the picture since James entered an exclusive mental health facility in March. 

Both Karl and James have had their share of personal problems in recent months.

James reportedly reached a multi-million dollar financial settlement with his ex-fiancée Mariah Carey last November.

And in March, he checked into a private psychiatric clinic in Boston after stepping down as Chairman of Crown Resorts citing mental health reasons.

He left the facility last month.

As for Karl, his marriage plans have reportedly been cancelled, sources told  Women's Day on Monday.

The Today host was apparently scheduled to marry Jasmine Yarbrough at James'  Argentinian polo ranch in November.

But after James checked into the Boston facility, his team of professionals apparently told him to put some distance between himself and his 'rowdy party mates', including Karl.

James allegedly then told Karl he couldn't marry Jasmine at his newly-purchased ranch in Cabo San Lucas, prompting the TV presenter to 'desperately plead' with him to let them reschedule, sources claimed.

Hours after Woman's Day hit newsstands on Monday, however, Jasmine appeared to deny the magazine's claims.

'Our marriage is apparently off as well. Maybe we should move in together?' she commented below an Instagram post Sylvia Jeffreys wrote in response to a New Idea article suggesting her relationship with Peter Stefanovic was also in trouble.

Daily Mail Australia has contacted James Packer and Karl Stefanovic's representatives for comment.

item.title: Raye looks glamorous in a plunging black blazer as she parties with Tinie Tempah at star-studded GQ dinner
item.description: Men's fashion week is showing no sign of slowing down, with celebrities such as Tinie Tempah and Raye attending the GQ dinner in London on Monday.
item.content:encoded:
Men's Fashion Week has brought out a plethora of fashionistas.

And it's showing no sign of slowing down, with celebrities such as Tinie Tempah, 29, and Raye, 20, attending the GQ dinner in London on Monday.

Raye showed off her incredible curves in a plunging black blazer, and added a pair of cut off denim shorts to complete her look.

The singer piled her blonde curls on top of her head, leaving two tendrils to frame her face as she beamed for the camera.

She opted for a scarlet lip, showing off her pearly whites, and added a statement brow to accentuate her features.

Meanwhile Tinie stood out in a neon orange long sleeved t shirt to the event, paired with black and grey trousers and trainers.

The star studded event was co-hosted by rapper Loyle Carner, who is a rapper and model, at The Principal London.

Loyle cut a suave figure in a tartan suit with a pale blue striped shirt as he mingled with other guests. 

Also in attendance was model David Gandy, who has confirmed he is having a baby with his girlfriend of two years, criminal lawyer Stephanie Mendoros, 32.

The country's highest paid model looked as dapper as ever in a grey double breasted jacket and cream trousers as he posed for the camera. 

Speaking exclusively to MailOnline, Gandy said: 'We're expecting our first in November. We're both thrilled. Absolutely delighted.

'It's our first. It's all very new to us. We're taking every day and week as it comes. It should be fun.

'We don't know I it's a boy or a girl and we're not planning to find out.'

The party was not short of models, with Rosie Huntington-Whiteley's brother Toby making an appearance in a colourful tartan suit with a matching waistcoat.

item.title: Busy Philipps appears to be tired as she goes makeup free for casual stroll with husband in NYC
item.description: Busy Philipps went with the a casual-natural look during a stroll with husband Marc Silverstein through the streets of Manhattan on Monday.
item.content:encoded:
Busy Philipps looked a bit tired in NYC on Monday.

The 38-year old actress pouted a bit as she strolled with husband Marc Silverstein, 46.

The couple, who have been married since 2007, were able get a little alone time while someone else took care of their two daughters Birdie, nine, and Cricket, four. 

It almost looks like Busy and Marc coordinated their wardrobe together; both kept it real casual for their walk.

Busy wore blue jeans that were cropped at the bottom with a baggy brown sweatshirt and sneakers. Her long blond tresses had that wet-look and was parted down the middle. 

She added some dark round-rimmed sunglasses and had a stylish bag strapped around her waist for convenience. 

Marc went with darker blue jeans, an off-purple sweatshirt and checkered pull-on sneakers.

Apparently, the couple had some quality family time together over the weekend.

Busy posted a photo on Instagram of the family's visit on Sunday to a local pastry and cake shop in downtown Manhattan.

The dotting mom is seen hamming it up with her two daughters as they strike their own fun poses.

In the caption mom joked, 'Too bad these kids aren't having any fun in New York. Thanks for having us yesterday @flourshop and for giving Cricket a cup of sprinkles which she drank like water.'   

From the looks of it, The Freaks and Geeks star appears to have fully recovered from sinus surgery back on May 10. She looked like the cool mom in a summer dress with a very stylish black jacket.

Marc has also had a successful career in Hollywood. His resume as a screenwriter includes the movies: Never Been Kissed, How to be Single, and He's Just Not Into You. He recently made his co-directorial debut for the 2018 film I Feel Pretty, starring Amy Schumer.

The couple, who have been married since 2007, were able get a little alone time, while someone else took care of their two daughters Birdie, 9, and Cricket, 4..

item.title: Love Island: Fans left furious after Eyal interrupts an intimate chat between lovelorn Dr Alex and Megan... before KISSING the new arrival in sizzling dare challenge
item.description: And despite Dr Alex finally seeing some action with Essex model Megan on Monday's Love Island, their intimate chat was abruptly cut short by Eyal, who swooped in to talk to the blonde beauty too.
item.content:encoded:
The three new islanders - Charlie, Josh and Megan proved to cause quite a stir as they started to settle into the Love Island villa on Monday night. 

And despite Dr Alex finally seeing some action with Essex model Megan, their intimate chat was abruptly cut short by Eyal, who swooped in to talk to the blonde beauty too.

Viewers at home vented their frustration for Alex after he failed to find any connection with the original girls, and blasted Eyal for interrupting their sweet moment - before kissing the sexy newbie during a saucy dare challenge. 

The usually shy-tempered Dr Alex finally plucked up the courage to whisk Megan off for some alone time after she arrived, which definitely caught the attention to the fellow islanders.

Feeling comfortable with the soft-spoken hunk, Megan bravely opened up about her past as a dancer, and how she gave up her 9-5 job as a legal PA.

But their intimate moment didn't last long as Eyal quickly dived in and left Alex feeling deflated by the situation.  

'I could really do with a break' the A&E doctor admitted.

Eyal wasn't going to let the forlorn doc persuade him to leave Megan alone, and confessed in the Beach hut: 'All is fair in love and war, there'll be some c*** blocking. If Megan is into him then I'll hold my hands up, but I'm going to try, I'm a tryer.'

Feeling completely blindsided, Alex divulged: 'I'm surprised that Eyal approached in that situation, it wasn't as if we'd been there for 20 minutes, half an hour, I'd literally been with her for a few moments and he just came on over. That didn't sit so well with me.' 

Eyal got cosy with the busty model not once, but twice over the course of the episode, after she shared a steamy smooch with the spiritual hunk during their romantic date - and then again during the risque dare challenge.  

Viewers at home weren't pleased with Eyal's attempts to steal Megan away from Alex, who's had an unlucky run since entering the villa last week, with original match Samira quickly laying down that she wanted to just be friends. 

'Eyal back off Megan!!! It's a no from me' tweeted one agitated viewer. 

'Eyal is more slippery than a greased up eel'. said another. 

Others were more sympathetic to the plight of the sweet doctor, with their hopes pinned on the muscular stud finding someone - even comparing him to 2017 hopeful Camilla Thurlow, who struggled to find love until Jamie Jewitt entered the villa.

'Can we just redesign love island so the house is just Alex and a load of girls keep coming in till he finds love whilst Jack and Dani are just chilling in the corner doing impressions of Eyal'. 

'Alex we are all rooting for you!! You save lives for a living man, come one...let this man find love'.

'Alex is this year's Camilla and I don't think I can take it all over again'. 

'Alex putting on fresh socks and giving himself a little pep talk before his date with Megan actually makes me want to cry. He must be protected at all costs'.   

Elsewhere, after choosing Niall for one of the three dates they were requested to make, Megan found herself on the wrong side of Georgia, who was 'fuming' after the blonde bombshell made her decision.

Tensions also started to mount between Wes and Josh after the LADbible host whisked Laura away which the hunk described as a 'brave move'

Taking to the Beach Hut after learning of Megan's move, Georgia ranted: 'No one takes my man away, no. I've never had competition before and I don't like it.'   

Following their huge rift, Hayley and Eyal talked through their explosive argument they had the night before that left Hayley in tears.

Eyal admitted that while romance was out of the question, there was still a chance to be friends, and explained to the blonde beauty: 'I wanted to clear the air, I just wanted to make it less awkward, we're on the same page, we might as well be friends while we're here.'

After receiving the text instructing the newbies to choose three people each to date, Megan, Charlie and Josh were quick to decide, with Josh first opting for Laura, Megan chosing Niall and Charlie asking out Samira.

While on their rustic picnic, Charlie asked Samira what kind of guy she usually goes for, and luckily for him, his blond-hair-blue-eyed combination worked wonders for the West End dancer.

When asked what her type is, Samira told him: 'Blonde. My ex was blonde. I love blonde and blue eyes, that's my thing. But also personality is really important to me and a connection'

Returning to the curious islanders back at the villa, Laura reassured Wes that Josh wasn't her type at all, while Niall and Georgia passed without acknowledging their respective dates.

Chatting to Charlie on their romantic getaway, Georgia made it clear she's leaving her options open.

'If it was an honest feeling, I of course would talk to Niall, because I'm a very honest girl' the student explained to the blond hunk.

Both Hayley and Samira joined Josh for a date, while Megan enjoyed Eyal and Alex's company, and Charlie schmoozed with Georgia and Hayley. 

Up next, a steamy game of Dares between the islanders saw the unlucky-in-love medic get a kiss from the blonde bombshell - but unfortunately love rival Eyal also stole a smooch from the newcomer.

As the night fell over the villa, the Islanders played a game of Dares, with Megan dared to cover Alex's face in lipstick.

The doctor rose to the challenge willingly, blushing furiously as she showered him with kisses.

Rosie was also dared to lick food off of Alex's chest - and he certainly didn't seem to mind.

He said in the Beach Hut later: 'I don't think I've ever been in the situation where five or six pretty girls have been licking honey off my chest so there was definitely something new in that!'

But his euphoria didn't last long since Alex was left feeling jealous when Eyal was dared to suck Megan's finger - only to take matters into his own hands and kiss her instead.

Following their passionate lip lock, the spiritual star reflected: 'I just sensed that it was the right thing to do.'

The rules of the game proved difficult for some of the islanders, however.

Hayley was dared to lick Adam's earlobe. 'What's an earlobe?' the blonde bimbo asked.

After their raunchy game, the 15 islanders received a text which let the group choose which happy couple could spend the night in the hideaway, with the singletons unanimously opting for Wes and Laura who have been happily smitten since first entering the villa

'We've not had a date, we've not had anything else, so this is great' Adam enthused.

Not letting the high wear off, Wes and Laura quickly hopped under the sheets to cheers to their relationship.

'It's been the best week with a girl in my life, and that's not an exaggeration' Wes told the Scottish beauty.
item.dc:abstract: The three new islanders - Charlie, Josh and Megan proved to cause quite a stir as they started to settle into the villa - and certainly ruffled some feathers on their first dates. And despite Dr Alex finally seeing some action with Essex model Megan on Monday's Love Island, their intimate chat was abruptly cut short by Eyal, who swooped in to talk to the blonde beauty too. Viewers at home vented their frustration for Alex after he failed to find any connection with the original girls, and blasted Eyal for interrupting their sweet moment.

item.title: Vince Vaughn picks up lunch as he's seen for the first time following DUI arrest in Los Angeles
item.description: He was arrested for drunk driving on Sunday after failing a field sobriety test. On Monday afternoon, Vince Vaughn was spotted for the first time after being released from jail.
item.content:encoded:
He was arrested for drunk driving on Sunday after failing a field sobriety test.

And on Monday afternoon, Vince Vaughn was spotted for the first time after being released from the Manhattan Beach, California jail. 

The 48-year-old actor, who grabbed lunch in the beach town, was casually dressed in a blue t-shirt, black pants, and cowboy boots.

Scroll down for video 

Vaughn, who must appear in court, is facing DUI charges after being stopped at a police checkpoint in Manhattan Beach around 12:30 a.m. on Sunday, TMZ reported. 

When asked to exit the vehicle, the Wedding Crashers star and his passenger reportedly declined to comply with officer's orders. This led to additional charges including obstructing an officer and public intoxication, it was claimed.

According to CBS News, Vince's vehicle was impounded and he was hauled into the Manhattan Beach jail.  

Once booked, the actor, who refused a Breathalyzer, submitted a blood sample. And was later released after posting bail. 

This isn't Vaughn's first run-in with the law. 

Back in 2001, Vince, Steve Buscemi, and Scott Rosenberg were involved in a bar fight that left four people behind bars and Steve in the hospital, ABC reported at the time.

The trio were in Wilmington, North Carolina filming a movie called Domestic Disturbance. They were spending time together at Firebelly Lounge when two men aggressively approached Vince. 

The actor has reportedly been speaking with one of the men's girlfriends. 

Vince and the other men took the altercation outside where they started to fight.

Police patrolling the area saw the fight and tried to intervene, but were too late. Steve, 60, was stabbed in the eye, jaw, throat, and arm.

Timothy William Fogerty, the 21-year-old attacker, was charged with assault with a deadly weapon with intent to kill.
item.dc:abstract: He was arrested for drunk driving on Sunday after failing a field sobriety test. On Monday afternoon, Vince Vaughn was spotted for the first time after being released from jail. The 48-year-old actor, who grabbed lunch in Manhattan Beach, was casually dressed in a blue t-shirt, black pants, and cowboy boots.

item.title: 'You forget the cameras are there!' Love Island Australia star Natasha Webster reveals she showered NAKED on the show
item.description: She's the 24-year-old busty blonde who was eliminated from Love Island Australia on Monday night, after failing to make any connections.
item.content:encoded:
Blonde bombshell Natasha Webster was eliminated from Love Island Australia on Monday night.

And in an exit interview with News.com.au, the 24-year-old revealed that by the second day of filming, she had no issue with showering naked.

'You forget the cameras are there,' the Perth salon owner said. 

'If the camera is on you having a shower, [at first] you are kind of like, "Oh my gosh they can see me naked",' Natasha said.

'But after like the second day you get used to it, and you forget the cameras are there.'

During her elimination on Monday night's episode, Natasha suffered a rather unfortunate wardrobe malfunction.

Natasha, who was wearing a white bralette and red miniskirt, at one point revealed more than she bargained for.

'It's very sad, I wish I wasn't leaving,' she said as she hugged the cast goodbye.

She later wheeled a suitcase outside the Spanish villa and, while trying to adjust her outfit, accidentally flashed her briefs.

Natasha had an inkling that she would be sent home packing, after it was revealed that one female contestant would be eliminated.

'Hashtag Natasha,' she said after Tayla Damir announced that someone would be going home.

Early on in the competition, Natasha openly declared her desire to attract that a man who owns a boat.

She previously made headlines after suggesting that she slept with Justin Bieber.

'You forget the cameras are there,' the Perth salon owner said.

item.title: Lena Dunham has flirty exchange with ex Jack Antonoff on Instagram... as she shares early morning cat post
item.description: She has said the end of their five-year romance 'nearly killed her'.
item.content:encoded:
She has said the end of their five-year romance 'nearly killed her'.

But Lena Dunham seems to have bounced back, flirting with her ex Jack Antonoff on Instagram.

The exchange was sparked when Lena posted a selfie with her cat, writing: 'I have two cats but only one sleeps on my face and sits on my lap while I pee. The positive effect Gia Maria Carangi has had on my mental health cannot be overestimated.'

Jack commented on the early Monday morning post: 'Why are you awake?' 

Dunham instantly messaged back: 'cuz it's the prime time to catch you on the gram, four eyes.'

Despite the friendly exchange, Lena was left 'broken' by the pair's break-up.

The 'Girls' creator and the 34-year-old musician went their separate ways in December last year after five years together, and whilst the decision to end their relationship was a mutual one, Lena has admitted the 'finality' of their break-up conversation 'nearly killed' her.

In an emotional essay about her love life which was penned for Vogue magazine, Lena wrote: 'It was December when we broke up, that kind of confusing weather where glaring sunlight makes the cold air feel even colder. We sat in our shared kitchen of nearly four years and quietly faced each other, acknowledging what nobody wanted to say. 

'That obsessive connection had turned to blind devotion, and the blinders were coming off to reveal that we had evolved separately (the least shocking reason of all and perhaps the most common). That anger wasn't sexy or sustainable. 

'That our hearts were still broken from trying so hard to fix it but no longer uncertain about whether or not we could. The finality nearly killed me, and I remember muttering, "But what if we still went on dates?" He laughed sadly. "Whatever you want."'

Lena, 31, also admitted she struggled to adjust to single life following their split, as she realized she hadn't been alone for many years.

She wrote: 'So how do you get back your taste for solo life, overcome the fear of your own thoughts? Even when my partner was away for work, the house had always been full with his presence - a wayward red sock, a pile of used earplugs. A Batman watch bought on eBay but never worn.

'Finally, four months after the end, I found myself spending a weekend in the country, and I stepped outside and away from my companions, onto a gravel path, and in the dimming pink of the sunset I began along my way. It was simple - one foot in front of the other, hands swinging at my sides - but I thought, rather dramatically, I will remember this moment all my life.'
item.dc:abstract: She has said the end of their five-year romance 'nearly killed her'. But Lena Dunham seems to have bounced back, flirting with her ex Jack Antonoff on Instagram. The positive effect Gia Maria Carangi has had on my mental health cannot be overestimated.'

item.title: Tamara Ecclestone exudes elegance in a thigh-skimming polka dot dress as she joins husband Jay Rutland for Mayfair dinner on their fifth wedding anniversary
item.description: Celebrations didn't stop for the billionaire heiress, 33, and husband Jay Rutland as the pair enjoyed an upscale dinner at Henry's Bar in Mayfair, London on Monday evening.
item.content:encoded:
She was left in shock after her husband covered their lavish abode in hundreds of pink rose petals to mark their fifth wedding anniversary.

And celebrations didn't stop for Tamara Ecclestone and Jay Rutland as the pair enjoyed an upscale dinner at Henry's Bar in Mayfair, London on Monday evening.

The billionaire heiress, 33, cut a typically glamorous figure as she donned a sophisticated polka dot dress, which slashed at her thighs to reveal her toned legs.

The mother-of-one complemented her envy-inducing figure as the elegant frock was embellished with frills and a trendy cold-shoulder feature.

Upping the style ante, the daughter of business magnate Bernie Ecclestone added to her height in a pair of strappy black heels, and toted a box-shaped clutch bag.

The leggy model continued her stunning display in the make-up department as she wore heavy eyeliner, heavy strokes of foundation and nude lipstick.

Framing her strikingly beautiful face, Tamara styled her chestnut locks into voluminous curls.

Meanwhile, 37-year-old Jay looked every inch the dapper star as he sported an off-black suit with a crisp white shirt.

The businessman took to Instagram to treat their fans to a glimpse of their candlelit dinner, as he shared a snap of their food.

The couple the knot in the South of France in a lavish £7million ceremony in the south of France.  

Earlier in the day, Tamara woke up to find her husband Jay had transformed their multi-million pound home in honour of their anniversary.

The socialite, who had earlier paid tribute to her partner on Instagram, was overwhelmed when she walked down the stairs with her four-year-old daughter Sophia to find a life-sized floral number five, hundreds of pink rose petals and pearl unicorn. 

In the Instagram video, Tamara said: 'Aww its so pretty look fifi,' before describing it as the 'best thing ever'. 

Cameraman Jay followed them through the hallway to the living room, where a giant pearl unicorn stood next to the floral garland, which was surrounded by glass jar candles.

Heading into the kitchen, the youngster exclaimed: 'yummy in my tummy,' upon finding different flavoured cupcakes laid on the table in a heart design. 

And if those grand gestures weren't enough, Jay littered the house with metallic balloons attaching notes of special memories the pair have shared during their five-year marriage.   

Marking the occasion, Tamara posted a black and white picture of her kissing Jay from the wedding day. 

She captioned the snap: '5 years ago the beginning of our adventure.'

The pair married in June, 2013 after a whirlwind romance and splashed out £7million on her nuptials in the South of France, where they were serenaded by Mariah Carey and Elton John. 

Over 150 guests were invited to the lavish three-day event, with the couple famously downed shots and jumping in the sea at the Grand-Hotel du Cap-Ferrat as they laid on a free bar for their partying pals.

Tamara has previously gushed about how her husband spoils her but insisted personalised sentiments impress her more than designer gifts.

She told The Mail On Sunday: 'Jay is brilliant at giving presents, For my birthday he gave me a DVD of pictures of us all, taken since Sophia was born. Personalised gifts mean so much to me.’   

Tamara's post comes after the doting mum admitted that she is so attached to her daughter that she didn't spent a night away from the tot for the first three years of her life.

Speaking on This Morning last month, she said: 'No one can care for your child as well as you can, if I was to leave Fifi I would leave her with my sister, I do have a trust issue, but I like to be there.

'I still breastfeed her in the night, I've talked openly about that, it's a personal decision.

She continued: 'I really don't have a desire to [go away], I go out for dinner with my husband, but I come back to her and I like to make sure she's ready in the morning.'

Meanwhile, Tamara jetted to Dubai with Sophia and husband Jay Rutland earlier this month on their eighth holiday this year.

They enjoyed a magical trip to Disneyland Paris in March, which followed up their envy-inducing getaways to Mexico and the Bahamas. Tamara started the year right by heading to sunny Los Angeles with her daughter Fifi and sister Petra.

The billionaire heiress, 33, cut a typically glamorous figure as she donned a sophisticated polka dot dress, which slashed at her thighs to reveal her toned legs.
