item.title: Michael J. Fox net worth revealed amid Back to the Future 4 rumors
item.description: Rumors of Back to the Future 4 arose recently following a social media post purportedly from actor Michael J. Fox. Here's all you need to know about who he is, his age, net worth, movies and more.
item.content:encoded:
Could we be heading back to the future for a fourth time?

That’s what millions around the world believed from a post on a social media account that purportedly belonged to actor Michael J. Fox, famed for his starring role in the popular film franchise.

Unfortunately for fans of the series, the social media post turned out to be nothing more than a hoax from a fake account created in the actor’s image.

But just who is Michael J. Fox? Here’s all you need to know about who he is, his age, net worth, how he makes his money, family, diagnosis with Parkinson’s disease and movies and TV shows.

Who is Michael J. Fox?

Michael J. Fox is an actor best-known for his role in the popular Back to the Future film series.

He was born as Michael Andrew Fox in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada on June 9, 1961.

After breaking into the entertainment industry in the late 1970s, he became well-known to audiences for his role in the TV series Family Ties starting in 1982 and later became one of Hollywood’s top stars following his lead role in the critical and commercial hit Back to the Future in 1985, reprising his role in its 1989 and 1990 sequels.

Sadly, at the height of his rising success in Hollywood, Fox’s career was cut short when he was diagnosed with early-onset Parkinson’s disease in 1991 at just 29 years old. He later went public with his diagnosis in 1998 before semi-retiring from acting in 2000 to focus on his health and to advocate for those who suffer from the disease. 

He continues to do voiceover work for movies and films and has also appeared occasionally as a live actor, including on The Michael J. Fox Show from 2013 to 2014 and Designated Survivor in 2018.

In addition to his commercial success, Fox has earned critical acclaim, garnering wins and nominations for the Emmy Awards, Golden Globe Awards, SAG Awards, People’s Choice Awards, Critics’ Choice Awards and many others.

How old is Michael J. Fox?

Michael J. Fox is 57 years old.

He was born on June 9, 1961.

It takes < than a min to learn how to save a life. Watch the video at handsonly.nyc #ICanSaveALife with #HandsOnlyCPR

A post shared by Michael J Fox (@realmikejfox) on Jun 5, 2018 at 10:02am PDT

What is Michael J. Fox’s net worth?

Michael J. Fox’s net worth is believed to be about $65 million (£48.6 million), according to Celebrity Net Worth.

How does Michael J. Fox make his money?

Fox’s wealth is the result of his successful acting career.

After starring in the popular TV shows Palmerstown, U.S.A. and Family Ties, he became an international star for his role as Marty McFly in the 1985 film Back to the Future, reprising his role in its sequels Back to the Future II in 1989 and Back to the Future III in 1990.

He was diagnosed with early-onset Parkinson’s disease in 1991, forcing him into semi-retirement in 2000. After his diagnosis, Fox still continued to appear in movies and TV shows, appearing on the TV series Spin City from 1996 to 2000 and in 2001 and also providing voiceover work in movies like 1999’s Stuart Little and 2001’s Atlantis: The Lost Empire.

Who is Michael J. Fox’s wife?

Michael J. Fox’s wife is actress Tracy Pollan.

The couple were married on July 16, 1988 and have four children together: Sam, born on May 30, 1989, twins Schuyler and Aquinnah, born on February 15, 1995 and Esmé, born on November 3, 2001.

Spring has finally sprung, love’s in bloom.

A post shared by Michael J Fox (@realmikejfox) on May 5, 2018 at 1:35pm PDT

Michael J. Fox Parkinson’s disease diagnosis

Fox started to display symptoms of early-onset Parkinson’s disease in 1990 while filming the movie Doc Hollywood, being officially diagnosed with the disease the following year.

He reportedly started drinking heavily after the diagnosis but later quit drinking to become an advocate for people diagnosed with Parkinson’s disease after disclosing to the public his diagnosis in 1998.

Fox established the Michael J. Fox Foundation in 2000 focused on curing the disease and helping those who suffer from it cope better through improved therapy. Along with the late Muhammad Ali, Fox became a strong advocate for finding a cure for the disease, lobbying the United States Congress and endorsing politicians like Senator Claire McCaskill in 2006, citing her support for stem cell research which is believed to be able to advance a cure for Parkinson’s.

Michael J. Fox movies and TV shows

Over the years, Fox has amassed an impressive filmography that includes starring roles on a number of hit movies and TV shows.

He got his start in the entertainment industry in television, appearing on the show The Magic Lie in 1997 in his TV debut. He later starred in the show Palmerstown, U.S.A. from 1980 to 1981 before becoming a household name after landing the lead role on the popular sitcom Family Ties, appearing on the show from 1982 to 1989.

Though he focused more on film in the wake of Back to the Future’s success in 1985, Fox continued to appear in TV series such as such as Spin City from 1996 to 2000 and in 2001 as well as in The Good Wife from 2010 to 2016, The Michael J. Fox Show from 2013 to 2014 and Designated Survivor in 2018.

Fox also made his film debut in Midnight Madness in 1980 before breaking out in Back to the Future and Teen Wolf in 1985, transforming him into one of Hollywood’s top actors practically overnight. 

He later reprised his popular role as Marty McFly in its sequels Back to the Future II in 1989 and Back to the Future III in 1990 before mostly switching to voice acting following his 1991 diagnosis of Parkinson’s disease, appearing in movies such as the Stuart Little and Homeward Bound franchises and Atlantis: The Lost Empire.
item.dc:abstract: Rumors of Back to the Future 4 arose recently following a social media post purportedly from actor Michael J. Fox. Fox starred in the hit 1985 film Back to the Future and its sequels in 1989 and 1990. Here's all you need to know about who he is, his age, net worth, how he makes his money, family, Parkinson's disease diagnosis, movies and TV shows and more.
item.dc:creator: Rachel Quigley
item.mi:shortTitle: Michael J. Fox net worth revealed amid Back to the Future 4 rumors

item.title: Kevin Jonas and wife Danielle can't keep their hands off each other during beach photo shoot at cousin's wedding
item.description: Kevin Jonas and wife Danielle Jonas just oozed love and wedding glamour. The couple posed for photos at his cousin's wedding at a beach resort in Atlantic City.
item.content:encoded:
Kevin Jonas, 30, and wife Danielle Jonas, 31, just oozed love and wedding glamour. 

The couple, along with their four-year old daughter Alena, posed for photos at his cousin's wedding at a beach resort in Atlantic City on Saturday.

From the looks of the photos, the couple seem to be very much in love after more than nine years of marriage. 

Scroll down for video 

Kevin and Danielle couldn't keep their hands off of each other as they walked along the beach during the photo shoot to for his cousin Rachel Tamburelli and her new husband Chris Johnson.

The former Jonas Brothers star looked very stylish in his groomsman outfit that included navy-blue dress pants, a white dress shirt and gray Chuck Taylor sneakers.

Danielle had the honor of being a bridesmaid. She looked sexy and glamorous in a hot pink dress that showed off her tan and toned shoulders and arms.

Alena got to be a flower girl at the family affair. She looked like the picture of cuteness wearing a white dress with her hair tied back in a stylish flower bun.

The wedding celebration also confirmed that Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra are definitely on as an item.

The happy couple looked very stylish and at ease with each other when they arrived in Atlantic City arm-in-arm on Friday.

Priyanka, 35, looked elegant in a gold wrap dress with white pumps, while Nick, 25, looked great in a smart suit and white pull-on sneakers.

The couple were dressed much more casual for a wedding brunch event Saturday morning.

A lot has happened since The Jonas Brothers officially split up as a band back in 2013.

Kevin now works as a contractor and lives in New Jersey with Danielle, Alena and their other daughter Valentina, 19 months. Joe, 28, is engaged to Game of Thrones actress Sophia Turner, and the frontman for the pop rock group DNCE. Nick, 25, has been successful in recent years as a solo singer and as an actor.

There has been a lot of talk of a possible Jonas Brothers reunion since January when they reactivated their Instagram handle. Nick denied the rumors of a reunion. But then talk reignited again when the boys were seen filming something together in Sydney, Australia a couple of weeks ago.

In an Us interview last month, Kevin revealed that when he and his brothers get together they can't help but start jamming.

'There are guitars everywhere around all of our houses. Pianos. Guitars. It’s kind of just in our blood. It’s in our nature. It’s not like we’re trying to do anything special, it’s just that we’re hanging out and music is a part of who we are. It always happens.'

So, fans will just have to wait and see if the guys do in fact get the band back together.

item.title: Margot Robbie and husband Tom Ackerley enjoy California surf with their dog Boo Radley
item.description: Margot Robbie and Tom Ackerley were seen enjoying the Los Angeles coastline on Saturday. The actress walked their dog Boo Radley along the sand while the I, Tonya producer went surfing.
item.content:encoded:
Margot Robbie and Tom Ackerley were seen enjoying the Los Angeles coastline on Saturday.

The 27-year-old actress walked the couple's dog Boo Radley along the sand while the 28-year-old I, Tonya producer went surfing. 

This comes almost two years after they were married in a private ceremony in the beachside town of Byron Bay, Australia. 

Robbie donned a gold sweater with the words 'close to my heart' embroidered across the chest.

Her black, ankle-length skirt blew in the cool evening wind, and featured slits that run up to her thigh.

Pulling some of her blonde locks into a simple bun, the rest of her fell straight to ust above her shoulders.

She capped off her beach-going ensemble with a pair of strappy black sandals and round opalescent shades.

Tom pulled a blue baseball cap backwards as he carried his canary yellow surfboard down to the  aves.

He donned a black t-shirt along with grey Nike sweatpants and had a sturdy-looking backpack pulled around his shoulders.

He added a pair of Adidas sandals to complete his look.

Later in the evening, Robbie walked the pup along the seaweed dabbed coastline.

The summer day had faded into a cool night as the The Wolf of Wall Street actress wrapped herself in a striped blanket. 

The tide was out as Tom, now in a wetsuit, crept along the wet sand behind her with a drone in hand.

Boo, meanwhile, seemed to be having the best time of all as he bounded up and down the beach.
item.dc:abstract: They were married in a private ceremony in the beachside town of Byron Bay, Australia in December 2016. And Margot Robbie and Tom Ackerley were seen enjoying the Los Angeles coastline on Saturday. The 27-year-old actress walked the couple's dog Boo Radley along the sand while the 28-year-old I, Tonya producer went surfing.
item.dc:creator: Heidi Parker

item.title: Kendall Jenner EXCLUSIVE: Model reunites with Ben Simmons at his house after THAT passionate kiss with Anwar Hadid
item.description: Just as her romance with Ben Simmons seemed to be taking off, Kendall Jenner was caught in a passionate clinch with Anwar Hadid.
item.content:encoded:
Just as her romance with Ben Simmons seemed to be taking off, Kendall Jenner was caught in a passionate clinch with Anwar Hadid.

But it seems that the kiss hasn't dented the model's fledgling relationship with NBA star Simmons.

The two spent the day together on Sunday, enjoying a shopping trip before heading back to Ben's home for the evening.

For the day date model Kendall wore a loose white T-shirt and cropped denim jeans, tying her hair in a simple ponytail.

Ben was also dressed in white as the two headed to high-end department store Barneys New York on a shopping trip.

They left together in Kendall's car, heading to Ben's house for the evening.

A source told DailyMail.com: 'They were walking pretty close together and she was happy. She was clearly comfortable in his company and enjoying herself.'

The obvious closeness between the pair will come as a surprise to fans, coming so soon after it appeared the romance had stalled.

It was in late May that pictures of Kendall and Simmons first emerged. 

At the time NBA star Simmons, 21, was in a two-month old relationship with Tinashe, 25,  and according to her brother, he cheated on the singer with the model.

Tinashe's brother, Kudzai, publicly addressed Simmons on Twitter.

'Never met you before in my life,' Kudzai tweeted. 'Days after u break my sis heart u do this … ppl all lied on her talking fake news about my sis 'doing kardashian s***' u cheat on her w a Jenner.'

The whole drama started when Australian-born ball player Simmons was spotted out and about with Kendall. The pair tried to keep a low profile as they were spotted riding bikes at The Grove in Los Angeles, enjoying time together at The Nice Guy for dinner and then later at Hyde nightclub before moving on to a hotel.

After the drama with Tinashe, it had seemed that Kendall had cold feet about Simmons. Indeed she was seen kissing and hanging all over Gigi Hadid's brother Anwar Hadid in New York City late last Monday. 

Then on Friday, Simmons reunited for Tinashe, enjoying a night on the two in Hollywood.

But by Sunday, it was Kendall on his arm again. 

 

Prior to Simmons, Kendall most recently dated former Los Angeles Clippers star Blake Griffin, who was traded to the Detroit Pistons in late January.

In April, the former couple were seen getting dinner together months after it was reported they had broken up, although Blake spent this weekend with bikini designer Francesca Aiello.

Kendall has also been linked to a number of musicians, including ASAP Rocky and Harry Styles.
item.dc:abstract: Just as her romance with Ben Simmons seemed to be taking off, Kendall Jenner was caught in a passionate clinch with Anwar Hadid. But it seems that the kiss hasn't dented the model's fledgling relationship with NBA star Simmons. The two spent the day together on Sunday, enjoying a shopping trip before heading back to Ben's home for the evening.

item.title: Kate Hudson covers her baby bump in a yellow summer dress while out for coffee in NYC
item.description: She is expecting a baby girl. On Monday, Kate Hudson covered her baby bump in a bright yellow, floral frock while out for coffee in NYC.
item.content:encoded:
She is expecting a baby girl. 

On Monday, Kate Hudson covered her baby bump in a bright yellow, floral frock while out for coffee in NYC.  

This outing comes just a day after the 39-year-old actress celebrated boyfriend Danny Fujikawa's 32nd birthday.

Kate teamed her sunny ensemble with a pair of white tennis shoes and wayfarer shades. 

As she carried her coffee, the Bride Wards star had her colorful tote nestled in the crook of her arm.  

The future mom-of-three was seemingly makeup free. 

'06-10-86 Happy birthday baby #LoveOfMyLife,' Hudson captioned a photo of her and Danny on Sunday. 

In honor of the birthday boy, Kate, who has been dating Fujikawa since 2017, organized an intimate dinner with family and friends. 

Hudson's mom Goldie Hawn and son Ryder, 14, were in attendance. 

Fujikawa and Hudson have been dating since 2017. 

The couple announced that they were expecting back in April, when Kate shared video of a gender reveal party on her Instagram.

Confirming it was a girl, pink confetti rained down after the actress, her beau, and older children all popped giant balloons.

Kate shares son Bingham, six, with ex-fiancé Matthew Bellamy of Muse and she's raising Ryder with the help of ex-husband Chris Robinson.
item.dc:abstract: She is expecting a baby girl. On Monday, Kate Hudson covered her baby bump in a bright yellow, floral frock while out for coffee in NYC. This outing comes just a day after the 39-year-old actress celebrated boyfriend Danny Fujikawa's 32nd birthday.

item.title: Kim Zolciak, 40, rocks out to her new song Wig while riding around with her kids
item.description: The 40-year-old Real Housewives Of Atlanta star is re-starting her singing career by promoting her new single, Wig, with video clips on Instagram that she posted on Monday and Saturday.
item.content:encoded:
She shared just 15 seconds from her new dance single, Wig, with her fans on Instagram on Saturday.

But on Monday Kim Zolciak posted another, longer video clip on social media showing her in the passenger seat of a car as two of her children rock out in the back.

The beautiful blonde, 40, captioned it: 'My kids hearing my NEW single Wig for the second time! (Available Soon) on Itunes.'

And the Real Housewives Of Atlanta star, famous for her love of hair pieces, added hashtags crediting songwriter Felippe Biatti and music producer Sean Davis, aka halfstyle.

Felippe, 33, also took to Instagram, posting a snap of himself and Kim sitting at a white baby grand piano.

He captioned it: 'She’s in Key West about to premiere it so I can finally say I wrote a song for @kimzolciakbiermann and you guys are going to flip.

'Thank you @jackketso For letting this flip moment happen ;) Happy Pride. Let your #WIG whip!'

On Saturday, Kim was pictured with a stylist curling her hair and Bravo executive producer Michael Beck playing her single on his cellphone as all three sang along.

Kim, a mother-of-six who is married to pro-American football player Kroy Biermann, 32, hasn’t put out any new music in almost six years.

Her first release was 2009's Tardy For The Party, which she worked on with RHOA co-star Kandi Burruss. It became a hit and charted well on iTunes.

She released two songs after that - 2011's Google Me and Love Me First in 2012.

In her new single, the savvy entrepreneur pushes her cosmetics and perfume line Kashmere in the lyrics.

Meanwhile, Don't Be Tardy is also the title of her spinoff Bravo reality show that started off as Don't Be Tardy For The Weeding and followed her nuptials to Kroy. 

The series was renewed with a shorter title, Don't Be Tardy, and wrapped it's sixth series on December 15. 

She released two songs after that - Google Me and Love Me First.

The beautiful blonde, 40, captioned it: 'My kids hearing my NEW single Wig for the second time! (Available Soon) on Itunes.'

item.title: Kim Kardashian shares her own private jet photo... one week after husband Kanye West did the same with Chicago
item.description: Kim Kardashian launched her new makeup collection on Friday. And the 37-year-old star has been promoting the line ever since as she appears to be taking on sister Kylie Jenner.
item.content:encoded:
Kim Kardashian launched her new makeup collection on Friday.

And the 37-year-old star has been promoting the line ever since as she appears to be taking on sister Kylie Jenner in the makeup department.

On Monday the 37-year-old Mrs Kanye West shared a pretty pouting photo while buckled up in her private jet.

Her caption read, 'Wearing @kkwbeauty lipstick shade 3 in the center and 4 all over with lip liner 2. Available now at kkwbeauty.com.'

She had on a black zip-up jacket with nicely manicured nails, her hair worn down and a Louis Vuitton purse behind her.

Last week her husband also shared a snap from their jet, only he was holding daughter Chicago.

This comes after Kim took to her site kimkardashianwest.com last week to share a clip from the behind-the-scenes of the shoot to plug the new lipsticks and lip liners.

The looker appeared to be topless but she actually had on a see-through nude tube top. 

She didn't say anything but was just posing. 

'I've been working on my KKW Beauty Crème Lipsticks and Liners for such a long time, and I'm so happy that I can finally share them with you,' began the reality TV star.

She added, 'We initially planned on releasing them a while back, but we held off because I wanted to make sure the formula and packaging were absolutely perfect. 

'That's why my hair was still blond in this campaign shoot! 

'The photos are by Brandon Lundby, Chris Appleton did my hair and Ariel Tejada did my glam. 

'Watch the video to get an exclusive behind-the-scenes look at what went on during the shoot.'

Kim sits on a stool and poses away for her shutterbug.

The small screen wonder wears her hair long and blonde with black roots. The locks flow freely down her chest.

She also shared a portrait on her Instagram account with the caption: 'The 8 Nude Lipsticks & 3 Nude Lip Liners, inspired by @kimkardashian’s signature nude lip, is launching TODAY at 12PM PST at KKWBEAUTY.COM.' 

This comes after she said on Thursday that she has a cheat day for her diet every 10 days.

The wife of Kanye West took to her pay site kimkardashianwest.com to explain. 'I've been really strict with my diet, recently. When I grocery shop, I buy lean protein, carbs, fruits and veggies, but every once in a while, I like to treat myself and have a cheat meal.'

The beauty admitted it is not easy being good all the time.

'It can be so hard (and boring) to eat really clean all of the time. A cheat meal allows me to enjoy food without feeling like I'm overindulging. 

'My trainer, Mel, instructs that you should schedule a cheat meal about once every 10 days. This way you won't lose any of the progress you've made at the gym.'

'When you do them too often, your body's hormones are thrown off,' she wrote. 'Your testosterone, which is a muscle-making and fat-loss hormone, can change if you're eating too many calories, which can make you gain weight.

'You can still enjoy your favorite food, as long as you get back on track the next day. Cheat meals work best when you avoid alcohol, since they're empty calories filled with sugar. This part is easy for me since I don't really drink—which means I can just have an extra doughnut or two. Kidding!

'I do have a sweet tooth, though, so normally my cheat meals are desserts or other sweets.'

In April she tried to lose more weight when she hit the Met Gala in NYC.  

'I have the Met Gala coming up and I've worked so hard working out, but I started eating a lot of sweets and I wanted to just change my food patterns to eat healthier and cut sugar out of my life as much as I can,' she said at the time. 'We always have sweets around and it's really hard when there are temptations everywhere.'

Soon after she indulged in an ice cream cone.  

In May the beauty - who used to do Atkins - said on her pay app KimKardashianWest.com that enjoying carbs is just fine.

'There's a myth that eating carbs is bad, but this isn't true!' declared the mother-of-three, who seems to be in the best shape of her life these days. 

In a post titled What to Eat Before and After a Workout, the KKWBeauty mogul began, 'Everyone's body is different, but this is what works for me.

'My trainer Mel always says that before and after you train, you should eat simple carbs, like sweet potatoes, and small amounts of fat and protein, like chicken.

'You should also have veggies with your meals, since you need them to help effectively break down and absorb your protein, fat and carbs.'

Then the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star talked about that 'myth.'

'There's a myth that eating carbs is bad, but this isn't true! 

'After I introduced carbs back into my diet, I felt so much better. What really matters is the amount and quality of the carbs that you eat. Focus on eating nutritional food and avoiding food that's processed.'

And the Selfish author added when to eat. 'The best times to eat are an hour before you work out and then immediately after,' said the sister of Khloe and Kourtney Kardashian.

'You're giving your body a chance to digest some of the pre-workout food and you're feeding it the nutrients it needs immediately after you finish training,' added the Calabasas native.

'If you work out early in the morning like me, you can still train on an empty stomach—just make sure to eat as soon as you're finished!'

item.title: Bachelorette 2018 spoilers: Who got hurt, who goes to hospital and who goes home tonight?
item.description: The drama is heating up on season 14 of The Bachelorette. During the upcoming third episode of the show, two of Becca Kufrin's suitors will be hospitalized while two more will be sent packing.
item.content:encoded:
If you thought season 14 of The Bachelorette was off to a dramatic start, you ain't seen nothing yet.

The upcoming episode 3 of the ABC dating competition series, aired on June 11, 2018, is due to be the most insane to date. It’ll see two of Becca Kufrin’s suitors hospitalized, two more eliminated and the character of another called into question.

It won’t all be bad, however.

During the episode, viewers can also expect to see Becca whisked away on three separate dates: two group dates and one solo date.

What do you need to know before you tune in to episode three of The Bachelorette? Check it out.

Is the Bachelorette on TV tonight?

The NBA finals will not have an effect on ABC’s programming schedule on Monday June 11 though your TV listings and TV Guide’s website may suggest otherwise.

ABC initially announced on their press site that if game five of the NBA finals were to take place on Monday night The Bachelorette would air on Tuesday. That isn't the case, so The Bachelorette will air at 8pm ET as scheduled.

Mike Fleiss, a producer on the show, confirmed this news on Twitter on Sunday.

Attention #BachelorNation this week’s #TheBachelorette is on at it’s regular time MONDAY night!!!! Don’t miss it

— Chris Harrison (@chrisbharrison) June 10, 2018

How long is The Bachelorette tonight?

Monday’s episode of The Bachelorette will air from 8pm ET to 10pm ET.

Bachelorette preview

ABC released a preview for Monday's episode which features a heated confrontation between David Ravitz and Jordan Kimball.

The two are shown in the midst of a sit down during which David questions Jordan’s intentions with Becca, mentioning rumors that he's popular on Tinder and may just be looking to boost his modelling career.

While this is going on, other The Bachelorette cast members can be seen trying to hide their laughter.

What will happen during season 14, episode three of The Bachelorette?

The upcoming episode of The Bachelorette is due to be one of the most dramatic to date. According to Reality Steve, Becca Kufrin will go on three dates during Monday's episode.

Two men will suffer injuries — one more serious than the other — and two men will be eliminated during yet another rose ceremony. The Bachelorette spoiler blogger has also reported that a third man will exit the Bachelor mansion of his volition.

Chris will get the second solo date of season 14 of The Bachelorette. He and Becca will enjoy a visit from musician Richard Marx, who will urge Chris to write Becca a song.

Chris will struggle to come up with words, Reality Steve reports, and that won’t sit well with Becca. His jingle may not wind up the most romantic, but it appears it’ll be enough to win over Becca — for now anyway.

Reality Steve has reported that Chris will get the date rose and survive another week on The Bachelorette.

🌹Don’t miss my performance on tonight’s episode of @BacheloretteABC with @thebkoof + @chrisbharrison. I’ve also got a new song out, my version of the Grammy winning song I wrote with Luther Vandross “Dance With My Father”. Listen now: https://t.co/iogdshtYbe #TheBachelorette pic.twitter.com/oE1RquilQ8

— Richard Marx (@richardmarx) June 11, 2018

Becca will also go on two group dates during episode three. For the first, she and her remaining men will head out for a spa day only it’ll be the men doing the pampering.

When they arrive at the spa they’ll be greeted by a handful of Becca’s friends and fellow Bachelor alumnae, including Tia Booth. ABC’s description of the episode states that one of the men will get ‘the jitters’ due to his romantic past.

While it doesn’t implicitly say it’ll be Colton Underwood, who admitted to having history with Tia during episode two, who gets cold feet at the spa, it seems likely.

After the date, the men who spent the day primping over Becca and her gal pals will gather for a cocktail party. ABC has teased that not long into the party, drama will rear its ugly head as ‘one man’s questionable dating history’ is brought up.

Per the network’s description, it seems Becca’s embattled suitor might just manage to skate by despite the controversy.

According to ABC, ‘one lucky bachelor overcomes his dating past to capture the group date rose’.

Am I the only one excited to see the Colton and Tia drama on tonight’s #TheBachelorette episode?

— American girl (@The_MericanGirl) June 11, 2018

Becca’s second group date during episode three will be equally disaster-filled. Before heading out on the date, one man will suffer a ‘serious injury in a fluke accident’ that will rattle the rest of the season 14 competitors to their cores.

Ten men will set out on the football-themed date anyway and the competition will be serious as they run drills with the Legends Football League and play a full game. 

ABC has teased that ‘one man’s desire to excel turns into a stunning injury as Becca looks on in disbelief’. 

Who gets hurt in the Bachelorette?

Before season 14 of The Bachelorette premiered, Reality Steve reported with some certainty that Clay Harbor would be the one to hurt himself during the football date.

The NFL star will reportedly suffer a broken wrist that will require surgery. Although it’s been said that Clay will get the group date rose for his efforts, the footballer will ultimately decide to pull himself from the competition to seek adequate medical care.

He won’t be the one to get hurt during episode three, however.

Tomorrow night the boys take to the gridiron to fight for the love and attention of #14 #TheBachelorette

A post shared by Chris Harrison (@chrisbharrison) on Jun 10, 2018 at 10:31am PDT

Another contestant will be injured in what the network has described as a ‘fluke accident’. Previews for the episode showed co-stars describing the scene, claiming the victim was ‘lying down in a pool of his own blood’.

Clips of the injured person do little to reveal his identity, but Reality Steve has on good authority that it’s David Ravitz who gets rushed to the hospital. He’ll apparently fall from his bunk bed, break his nose, and suffer bleeding on his brain along with a concussion.

The Bachelorette Tia

Tia Booth, who appeared on The Bachelor with Becca Kufrin, will appear on episode three of The Bachelorette. She’ll join Becca and other friends for a day of pampering by some of the men in the competition.

This day of beauty's got an ugly end.
Don't miss a shocking new episode of #TheBachelorette Monday at 8|7c on ABC! pic.twitter.com/zns485t8pz

— The Bachelorette (@BacheloretteABC) June 10, 2018

Colton Underwood, whom Tia spent a weekend with before he was cast on The Bachelorette, will be present for the date. There’s been some speculation that the two will talk, perhaps with Becca, about their past.

Who gets eliminated during The Bachelorette Season 14, episode 3?

Ryan Peterson and Mike Renner will be sent home during the rose ceremony in episode three of The Bachelorette.   

Clay Harbor will also go home, but he'll be the one to make that difficult decision.

Would you swipe right? Because Jordan sure would! #TheBachelorette pic.twitter.com/HMkZYyqyxZ

— The Bachelorette (@BacheloretteABC) June 9, 2018
item.dc:abstract: The drama is heating up on season 14 of The Bachelorette. During the upcoming third episode of the show, two of Becca Kufrin's suitors will be hospitalized while two more will be sent packing. Another man's character will be called into question after co-stars approach Becca about his behavior when she's not around. The drama-filled episode will air Monday, June 11, 2018 at 8pm ET on ABC.
item.dc:creator: Rachel Quigley
item.mi:shortTitle: Bachelorette 2018 spoilers: Who is sent to hospital and who goes home?

item.title: Jenna Coleman films new scenes for series three of Victoria with on and off screen beau Tom Hughes
item.description: New snaps reveal that filming is underway in Liverpool for ITV drama Victoria, as actors Jenna Coleman, 32, and Tom Hughes, 32, return for the third season.
item.content:encoded:
It's the hotly anticipated show encapturing the Victorian era.

And new snaps reveal that filming is underway in Liverpool for ITV drama Victoria, as actors and real-life couple Jenna Coleman, 32, and Tom Hughes, 32, return for the third season.

The brand new series sees actress Jenna reprise her role as the young Queen, alongside Tom as Prince Albert.

Jenna looks regal in the on set snaps, as she dons a sky blue shawl over a large aquamarine hoop skirt, adding a demure peach bonnet.

Meanwhile her on screen beau cut a darker figure, in a large black overcoat with a tweed waistcoat and black leather gloves. 

Joining the leads, Laurence Fox has been confirmed to play charismatic and wayward Foreign Secretary Lord Palmerston, whilst Tony and Olivier Award nominee Kate Fleetwood will play Victoria's mysterious sister Feodora, who makes an unexpected return into the Queen's life.

In addition, actor and comedian John Sessions will also star as Prime Minister John Russell, whilst Lily Travers, who played Lady Sophie in Kingsman, will play the Duchess of Monmouth.

Nicholas Audsley and David Burnett are also confirmed to be joining the cast as new characters.

Starting in 1848, the third instalment of the lavish drama will depict a turbulent and uncertain time for both Europe and the monarchy.

With revolutions on the continent and the Chartist movement reaching its peak in London, Victoria is under pressure from the government to leave London for her own safety.

Creator Daisy Goodwin said: 'Victoria and Albert are the most famous couple of the nineteenth century, but underneath the united facade, their relationship is at breaking point and it is a struggle for mastery that neither side can win.'

Praised for its opulent production values, Victoria is one of ITV's most successful dramas, with the first series being the highest rating drama of 2016 on the channel.

The second series continued to prove immensely popular, attracting a consolidated average of 6.4 million viewers and a 25% share.

item.title: Little Mix singer Jade Thirlwall's boyfriend Jed Elliot reveals he 'almost killed her' after larking around on a ride at Dollywood
item.description: The Power singer's beau Jed Elliot, 27, almost caused a fatal catastrophe when the couple took a joint visit to Dollywood, Tennessee after riding a water boat too fast.
item.content:encoded:
They've been busy with their respective music careers and make sure to spend as much time together as possible. 

And Little Mix singer Jade Thirlwall's beau Jed Elliot almost caused a fatal catastrophe when the couple took a joint visit to Dollywood, Tennessee.

The Strut's bassist, 27, joined the chart-topping beauty, 25, on a boat ride around the amusement park, but described to The Sun that the trip 'almost killed them'.

Jed told the publication that he - alongside fellow band member Luke Spiller and his girlfriend - had come close to toppling off the water ride after speeding around a corner too fast. 

Dollywood is a theme park curated by country music icon Dolly Parton, and Jed explained how the double date almost ended in catastrophe.

Jed elaborated: 'It was Jade, Luke's girlfriend Laura and our tour manager and we were all riding on this little cart, like a floating mattress and we went round one of these corners. 

'It wasn't on rails – it was like floating, so your life was in your own hands. We were leaning wildly to one side.'   

'We had a scare. That was how it almost ended for us, at Dollywood. It was very scary.'

Meanwhile, Jade - who has been busy recording Little Mix's fifth album with Leigh-Anne Pinnock, Jesy Nelson and Perrie Edwards - previously revealed she was struggling with the constant distance between herself and Jed as she admitted once again that they 'never' see each other. 

The former X Factor star, who has previously revealed her frustrations at not being able to see Jed, admitted it was 's***' and it felt like she was in the early throes of a romance with him. 

Speaking to The Mirror, Jade admitted: 'We’ve been together two years but it feels like we’ve only just started going out because we never see each other.

'It’s been a bit s*** not seeing each other I must admit,' Jade continued. 

The beauty, who endured 38 hours of travel 'hell' to spend time with Jet in Los Angeles last summer, previously admitted she 'hardly ever' gets to see her boyfriend.

Jade is thrilled with how her relationship with the rocker has progressed - but had admitted their busy schedules make it difficult.

She shared: 'We hardly ever see each other as he's signed in the US and I'm always on tour, but we fly to see each other as much as possible.'

item.title: Reese Witherspoon wears flirty summer dress as she joins her husband Jim Toth for lunch in Beverly Hills
item.description: Reese Witherspoon and her husband Jim Toth went out for lunch in Beverly Hills, California Sunday. The actress wore a multicolored patterned sundress and rope wrapped wedge sandals.
item.content:encoded:
Reese Witherspoon and her husband Jim Toth, 48, were caught stepping out for lunch in Beverly Hills, California Sunday. 

The 42-year-old actress wore a multicolored patterned sundress and rope wrapped wedge sandals.

This comes after the family celebrated her two kids having separate graduations. Her son Deacon, 14, finishing junior high school while Ava, 18, completed high school. 

The Legally Blonde actress draped a cream-colored purse around her chest.

She wore her signature blonde hair down, and it flowed freely in the wind. The look was topped off with a pair of big, red, shades and barely-there, if any, makeup.

Jim was dressed down, in khaki pants that stopped at his ankles and then rolled at the bottom.  He accompanied the look with a long-sleeved, button up, baby blue dress shirt.

She wasn't carrying anything in her hands, while he held two iced tea drinks. 

They married couple-of-seven years' drink of choice could have been because they were celebrating Iced Tea Day. 

On Sunday she shared a post and picture of herself on Instagram.

The caption read, 'Since #IcedTea Day... and y'all know I'm a Southern gal who loves me some good, sweet iced tea on a Sunday!'

The mother-of-three threw her two oldest kids, a graduation party on Sunday. 

Ava and Decon are the children Reese has with her ex-husband Ryan Phillippe, 43. 

The star and her former love met at her 21st birthday in 1997 and wed the following year.

Ava was born in 1999 before the pair welcomed their second child Deacon in 2003.

In 2006, the Hollywood star's went their separate ways and filed for divorce.

Reese is now married to talent agent Jim Toth, 48 - they share son Tennessee James Toth, five.
item.dc:abstract: Reese Witherspoon and her husband Jim Toth, 48, were caught stepping out for lunch in Beverly Hills, California Sunday. The 42-year-old actress wore a multicolored patterned sundress and rope wrapped wedge sandals. A casually dressed Toth carried two iced teas back to their car.

item.title: Kate Wright, 27, sizzles in a plunging orange bikini as she puts on a giddy display with beau Rio Ferdinand, 39, during romantic Mykonos getaway
item.description: The former TOWIE star, 27, continued her birthday celebrations with her beau Rio Ferdinand, 39, as the pair jetted off to Mykonos, Greece for an idyllic sun-soaked holiday last week.
item.content:encoded:
She recently rang in her 27th birthday with a cosy bash at her boyfriend's luxurious abode.

And Kate Wright continued the celebrations with her beau Rio Ferdinand, 39, as the pair jetted off to Mykonos, Greece for an idyllic sun-soaked holiday last week.

The former TOWIE star flaunted her gym-honed physique in a burnt orange two-piece, putting her famously ample bust and washboard abs on full display.  

Nearly spilling out of her perilously low-cut bikini top, the TV personality paraded her envy-inducing figure around the island as she topped up on her tan.

The reality star ensured focus remained on her scantily-clad appearance as she opted for minimal make-up, and swept her blonde tresses into a sleek bun.

Appearing in high spirits, Kate grinned from ear-to-ear as she enjoyed a cuddle with her hunky partner. 

Rio proved he's just as in shape as when he was in his football days as he showcased his toned upper body and taut midsection in a pair of bright orange shorts.

Shortly after their romantic display, Kate took to Instagram on Monday as she posed in a sultry race dress beside a picturesque infinity pool.

Accentuating her killer curves, the bombshell's dress featured a series of trendy white stripes, tied in with a pair of designer heels by Gianvito Rossi.

Kate looked every inch the vixen as she complemented her beauty in shimmery gold highlighter, and a slash of bright red lipstick. 

Kate and Rio first met while on holiday in Dubai in early 2017, and embarked on romance shortly after.

The blonde has since moved into Rio's family home, and quit her appearance on TOWIE in order to help care for his three children - Lorenz, 11, Tate, nine, and Tia, seven. 

Rio lost his wife Rebecca, the mother of his kids, in 2010 following her battle with breast cancer, and single-handily raised his brood alone until he met Kate.

Speaking to the Daily Star earlier this year, the footballer revealed his children adore Kate, and gushed of her 'softer touch' with them as kids.

He said: 'My relationship with Kate has helped in that they have got a female in the house now. They run past me sometimes to go to her. I've had to go through a period of being very, very open, and men aren't normally like that naturally.

'So having that extra person in the house who is female, who has that softer touch, I think is vitally important for the kids.'

He even hinted he and Kate may tie the knot in the future, adding: 'We do talk about it [getting engaged and married]. But I'm not going to sit here and give you a date.'

The football pundit recently revealed his children have already started to plan a future wedding between the former centre back and Kate, according to The Sun.

Gushing over his children's wishes, the BT Sport star said: 'My little girl wants a replica dress and all this stuff. The kids talk about that a lot!' "What role am I playing?Am I holding the ring? Who’s doing this?" They have it planned.' 

During the discussion, the doting father shared his admiration for the reality star, who has stepped in as a mother figure following the death of his late wife.

He said: 'I’m proud of her – she’s done an amazing job. People in her position sometimes go unrecognised. She has dealt with it in a mature fashion, in a majestic sort of way.' 

Rio appeared to confirm Kate's confession, as she shared that the youngsters have brought up the idea of marriage and more children, consistently pestering Kate and Rio about when they're getting a baby sibling.

During a recent interview with This Morning, the Essex beauty enthused: 'I couldn't imagine the kids would talk about it before!

'At the school gates, at first they said that’s my aunt, then that’s dad's girlfriend, then that’s my stepmum – and now they say on daily basis, "When are we having a brother or sister?" It's really lovely!'

item.title: Cindy Crawford, 52, looks happy as she lavishes attention on a female friend in NYC... then kisses her goodbye
item.description: The leggy 5ft9in Vogue model looked every inch gorgeous as she strolled side by side with the petite woman who she seemed to be very fond of. Cindy has been in NYC for several days.
item.content:encoded:
Cindy Crawford lavished attention on a female friend in New York City on Monday.

The leggy 5ft9in Vogue model looked every inch gorgeous as she strolled side by side with the petite woman.

Not only did they laugh it up together, but the Versace model also gave the lady a warm hug and kiss while outside an office building.

The pretty ladies had on similar attire as they walked down a very busy street.

Both had on worn-on jeans and jackets suited for the cool temperatures.

But Cindy had a more spring vibe as her jacket was white and she added snakeskin sandals and a beige Gucci purse worn crossbody style.

Her pal opted for black sneakers and a large purse with a tassel as well as an interesting butterfly necklace.

Later Cindy walked alone down the street as she showed off her highlighted hair and chic sunglasses.

The beauty has been in town to visit daughter Kaia, 16, who is now a supermodel. They also have model son Presley, 18.

The day before the swimsuit model was seen holding hands with Rande Gerber in NYC. 

They've been going strong for 20 years and have a family together. 

The twosome looked relaxed and content as they strolled through the Big Apple arm-in-arm. 

Sweetly gazing up at her husband, Cindy placed her hand upon Rande's forearm.

The modelling icon cut an effortlessly casual figure in her green jacket, jeans, striped blouse, and clean grey sneakers. 

Her other half kept it casual as well, opting for a black jacket, white T-shirt, jeans, and sneakers. 

The couple were attached at the hip as they enjoyed some time to themselves in New York that day. 

And it's no wonder the twosome looked as happy as they did either - they just celebrated 20 years of marriage last month.

The couple celebrated their anniversary in late May, and threw a private party in Nashville in honor of the milestone.

'20 years ago today walking down the 'aisle.' I couldn't have chosen a better man to do this thing called life with. I love you!' Cindy said on Instagram.
